h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0001^ea^ ^a^P3.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0001^ea^ ^a^V0.0001^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa vera~njaaya.m viharati na.lerupucimandamuule mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi. assosi kho vera~njo braahma.no -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito vera~njaaya.m viharati na.lerupucimandamuule mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa {bhagavaati (syaa0), dii0 ni0 1.157, abbhuggataakaarena pana sameti}. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m ^a^V0.0002^ea^ saattha.m sabya~njana.m; kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti; saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii'''ti.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ {ito para.m yaava paaraa0 15-16 padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaamiiti paa.tho a0 ni0 8.11} atha ^a^T1.0002^ea^ kho vera~njo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^P3.0002^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vera~njo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bho gotama -- `na sama.no gotamo ^a^M0.0002^ea^ braahma.ne ji.n.ne vu.d.dhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa aasanena vaa nimantetii'ti. tayida.m, bho gotama, tatheva? na hi bhava.m gotamo braahma.ne ji.n.ne vu.d.dhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa aasanena vaa nimanteti? tayida.m, bho gotama, na sampannamevaa''ti.

[03]``naaha.m ta.m, braahma.na, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya yamaha.m abhivaadeyya.m vaa paccu.t.theyya.m vaa aasanena vaa nimanteyya.m. ya~nhi, braahma.na, tathaagato abhivaadeyya vaa paccu.t.theyya vaa aasanena vaa nimanteyya, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaa''ti.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``arasaruupo bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya ^a^T1.0003^ea^ -- `arasaruupo sama.no gotamo'ti. ye te, braahma.na, ruuparasaa saddarasaa gandharasaa rasarasaa pho.t.thabbarasaa te tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa {anabhaavakataa (sii0) anabhaava.mgataa (syaa0)} aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `arasaruupo sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``nibbhogo bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `nibbhogo sama.no gotamo'ti. ye te, braahma.na, ruupabhogaa saddabhogaa gandhabhogaa rasabhogaa pho.t.thabbabhogaa te tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `nibbhogo sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``akiriyavaado ^a^V0.0003^ea^ bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo'ti. aha~nhi, braahma.na, akiriya.m vadaami kaayaduccaritassa ^a^M0.0003^ea^ vaciiduccaritassa manoduccaritassa. anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m akiriya.m vadaami. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``ucchedavaado bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ucchedavaado sama.no gotamo'ti. aha~nhi, braahma.na, uccheda.m vadaami raagassa dosassa mohassa. anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m uccheda.m vadaami. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano ^a^T1.0004^ea^ vadeyya -- `ucchedavaado sama.no gotamo'ti, no ^a^P3.0003^ea^ ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``jegucchii bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `jegucchii sama.no gotamo'ti. aha~nhi, braahma.na, jigucchaami kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena. anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa jigucchaami. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `jegucchii sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``venayiko bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `venayiko sama.no gotamo'ti. aha~nhi, braahma.na, vinayaaya dhamma.m desemi raagassa dosassa mohassa. anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m vinayaaya dhamma.m desemi. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `venayiko sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``tapassii bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `tapassii sama.no gotamo'ti ^a^M0.0004^ea^. tapaniiyaaha.m, braahma.na, paapake akusale dhamme vadaami, kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m. yassa kho, braahma.na ^a^V0.0004^ea^, tapaniiyaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa ^a^T1.0005^ea^ aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa tamaha.m tapassiiti vadaami. tathaagatassa kho, braahma.na, tapaniiyaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `tapassii sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``apagabbho bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `apagabbho sama.no gotamo'ti. yassa kho, braahma.na, aayati.m gabbhaseyyaa punabbhavaabhinibbatti pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa tamaha.m apagabbhoti vadaami. tathaagatassa kho, braahma.na, aayati.m gabbhaseyyaa punabbhavaabhinibbatti pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `apagabbho sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesi''.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa dvaadasa vaa. taanassu kukku.tiyaa sammaa adhisayitaani sammaa pariseditaani sammaa paribhaavitaani. yo nu kho tesa.m kukku.tacchaapakaana.m pa.thamatara.m paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjeyya, kinti svaassa vacaniiyo -- ``je.t.tho ^a^T1.0006^ea^ vaa kani.t.tho vaa''ti? ``je.t.thotissa, bho gotama, vacaniiyo. so hi nesa.m je.t.tho hotii''ti. ``evameva kho aha.m, braahma.na, avijjaagataaya pajaaya a.n.dabhuutaaya pariyonaddhaaya ^a^P3.0004^ea^ avijja.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa ekova loke anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho. svaaha.m, braahma.na, je.t.tho se.t.tho lokassa''.

[03]``aaraddha.m kho pana me, braahma.na, viiriya.m {viriya.m (sii0 syaa0)} ahosi asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa {appamu.t.thaa (sii0 syaa0)}, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m. so ^a^M0.0005^ea^ kho aha.m, braahma.na, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca vihaasi.m sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedesi.m ^a^V0.0005^ea^, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami ^a^T1.0007^ea^, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi, jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi, anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto; so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto; so tato cuto idhuupapannoti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, rattiyaa pa.thame yaame pa.thamaa vijjaa adhigataa, avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa, tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno -- yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, pa.thamaabhinibbhidaa ahosi kukku.tacchaapakasseva a.n.dakosamhaa.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m ^a^P3.0005^ea^. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena {atikkantamaanussakena (ka0)} satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite ^a^M0.0006^ea^ suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne. sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena ^a^T1.0008^ea^ samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa; te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa; te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane ^a^V0.0006^ea^ hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne. sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, rattiyaa majjhime yaame dutiyaa vijjaa adhigataa, avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa, tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno -- yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, dutiyaabhinibbhidaa ahosi kukku.tacchaapakasseva a.n.dakosamhaa.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m ^a^T1.0009^ea^ abbha~n~naasi.m; `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tassa me eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m ahosi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi.m. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, rattiyaa pacchime yaame tatiyaa vijjaa adhigataa, avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa, tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno -- yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, tatiyaabhinibbhidaa ^a^P3.0006^ea^ ahosi -- kukku.tacchaapakasseva a.n.dakosamhaa''ti.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0007^ea^ vutte, vera~njo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``je.t.tho bhava.m gotamo, se.t.tho bhava.m gotamo! abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama!! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti, evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito ^a^T1.0010^ea^. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m. adhivaasetu ca me bhava.m gotamo vera~njaaya.m vassaavaasa.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho vera~njo braahma.no bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0007^ea^ kho pana samayena vera~njaa dubbhikkhaa hoti dviihitikaa seta.t.thikaa salaakaavuttaa na sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. tena kho pana samayena uttaraapathakaa {uttaraahakaa (sii0)} assavaa.nijaa {assava.nijaa (ka0)} pa~ncamattehi assasatehi vera~nja.m vassaavaasa.m upagataa honti. tehi assama.n.dalikaasu bhikkhuuna.m patthapatthapulaka.m {patthapatthamuulaka.m (ka0)} pa~n~natta.m hoti. bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vera~nja.m pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa pi.n.da.m alabhamaanaa assama.n.dalikaasu pi.n.daaya caritvaa patthapatthapulaka.m aaraama.m aaharitvaa udukkhale ko.t.tetvaa ko.t.tetvaa paribhu~njanti. aayasmaa panaanando patthapulaka.m silaaya.m pisitvaa bhagavato upanaameti. ta.m bhagavaa paribhu~njati.

[03]assosi kho bhagavaa udukkhalasadda.m. jaanantaapi tathaagataa pucchanti, jaanantaapi na pucchanti; kaala.m viditvaa pucchanti, kaala.m viditvaa na pucchanti; atthasa.mhita.m ^a^T1.0011^ea^ tathaagataa pucchanti, no anatthasa.mhita.m. anatthasa.mhite setughaato tathaagataana.m. dviihi aakaarehi buddhaa bhagavanto bhikkhuu pa.tipucchanti -- dhamma.m vaa desessaama, saavakaana.m vaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaamaati {pa~n~naapessaamaati (sii0 syaa0)}. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho so, aananda, udukkhalasaddo''ti? atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi ^a^P3.0007^ea^. ``saadhu saadhu, aananda! tumhehi, aananda sappurisehi vijita.m. pacchimaa janataa saalima.msodana.m atima~n~nissatii''ti.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M0.0008^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano {mahaamoggalaano (ka0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etarahi, bhante, vera~njaa dubbhikkhaa dviihitikaa seta.t.thikaa salaakaavuttaa. na sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. imissaa, bhante, mahaapathaviyaa he.t.thimatala.m sampanna.m -- seyyathaapi khuddamadhu.m aniilaka.m evamassaada.m. saadhaaha.m, bhante, pathavi.m parivatteyya.m. bhikkhuu pappa.takoja.m paribhu~njissantii''ti. ``ye pana te, moggallaana, pathavinissitaa paa.naa te katha.m karissasii''ti? ``ekaaha.m, bhante, paa.ni.m abhinimminissaami -- seyyathaapi mahaapathavii. ye pathavinissitaa paa.naa te tattha sa"nkaamessaami. ekena hatthena pathavi.m parivattessaamii''ti. ``ala.m, moggallaana, maa ^a^T1.0012^ea^ te rucci pathavi.m parivattetu.m. vipallaasampi sattaa pa.tilabheyyu''nti. ``saadhu, bhante, sabbo bhikkhusa"ngho uttarakuru.m pi.n.daaya gaccheyyaa''ti. ``ala.m, moggallaana, maa te rucci sabbassa bhikkhusa"nghassa uttarakuru.m pi.n.daaya gamana''nti.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0008^ea^ kho aayasmato saariputtassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``katamesaana.m kho buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m brahmacariya.m na cira.t.thitika.m ahosi; katamesaana.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m brahmacariya.m cira.t.thitika.m ahosii''ti? atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m {saaya.nhasamaya.m (sii0)} pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `katamesaana.m kho buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m brahmacariya.m na cira.t.thitika.m ahosi, katamesaana.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m brahmacariya.m cira.t.thitika.m ahosii'ti. `katamesaana.m nu kho, bhante, buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m brahmacariya.m na cira.t.thitika.m ahosi, katamesaana.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m brahmacariya.m cira.t.thitika.m ahosii'''ti?

[03]``bhagavato ca, saariputta, vipassissa bhagavato ca sikhissa bhagavato ca vessabhussa brahmacariya.m na cira.t.thitika.m ahosi. bhagavato ca, saariputta, kakusandhassa bhagavato ca ko.naagamanassa bhagavato ca kassapassa brahmacariya.m ^a^P3.0008^ea^ cira.t.thitika.m ahosii''ti.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ``ko ^a^M0.0009^ea^ nu kho ^a^T1.0013^ea^, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena bhagavato ca vipassissa bhagavato ca sikhissa bhagavato ca vessabhussa brahmacariya.m na cira.t.thitika.m ahosii''ti? ``bhagavaa ca, saariputta, vipassii bhagavaa ca sikhii bhagavaa ca vessabhuu kilaasuno ahesu.m saavakaana.m vitthaarena dhamma.m desetu.m. appaka~nca nesa.m ahosi sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaathaa udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. apa~n~natta.m saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m. anuddi.t.tha.m paatimokkha.m. tesa.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m antaradhaanena buddhaanubuddhaana.m saavakaana.m antaradhaanena ye te pacchimaa saavakaa naanaanaamaa naanaagottaa naanaajaccaa naanaakulaa pabbajitaa te ta.m brahmacariya.m khippa~n~neva antaradhaapesu.m. seyyathaapi, saariputta, naanaapupphaani phalake nikkhittaani suttena asa"ngahitaani taani vaato vikirati vidhamati viddha.mseti. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa ta.m suttena asa"ngahitattaa. evameva kho, saariputta, tesa.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m antaradhaanena buddhaanubuddhaana.m saavakaana.m antaradhaanena ye te pacchimaa saavakaa naanaanaamaa naanaagottaa naanaajaccaa naanaakulaa pabbajitaa te ta.m brahmacariya.m khippa~n~neva antaradhaapesu.m.

[03]``akilaasuno ca te bhagavanto ahesu.m saavake cetasaa ceto paricca ovaditu.m. bhuutapubba.m, ^a^V0.0009^ea^ saariputta, vessabhuu bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho a~n~natarasmi.m bhi.msanake {bhiisanake (ka0)} vanasa.n.de sahassa.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m cetasaa ^a^T1.0014^ea^ ceto paricca ovadati anusaasati -- `eva.m vitakketha, maa eva.m vitakkayittha; eva.m manasikarotha, maa eva.m manasaakattha {manasaakarittha (ka0)}; ida.m pajahatha, ida.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti. atha kho, saariputta, tassa bhikkhusahassassa vessabhunaa bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena eva.m ovadiyamaanaana.m eva.m anusaasiyamaanaana.m anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msu. tatra suda.m, saariputta, bhi.msanakassa vanasa.n.dassa bhi.msanakatasmi.m hoti -- yo koci aviitaraago ta.m vanasa.n.da.m pavisati, yebhuyyena lomaani ha.msanti. aya.m kho, saariputta, hetu aya.m paccayo yena bhagavato ca vipassissa bhagavato ca sikhissa bhagavato ca vessabhussa brahmacariya.m na cira.t.thitika.m ahosii''ti.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``ko ^a^M0.0010^ea^ pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena bhagavato ca kakusandhassa bhagavato ca ko.naagamanassa bhagavato ca kassapassa brahmacariya.m cira.t.thitika.m ahosii''ti? ``bhagavaa ^a^P3.0009^ea^ ca, saariputta, kakusandho bhagavaa ca ko.naagamano bhagavaa ca kassapo akilaasuno ahesu.m saavakaana.m vitthaarena dhamma.m desetu.m. bahu~nca nesa.m ahosi sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaathaa udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m, pa~n~natta.m saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m, uddi.t.tha.m paatimokkha.m. tesa.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m antaradhaanena buddhaanubuddhaana.m saavakaana.m antaradhaanena ye te pacchimaa saavakaa naanaanaamaa naanaagottaa naanaajaccaa naanaakulaa pabbajitaa te ta.m brahmacariya.m cira.m ^a^T1.0015^ea^ diighamaddhaana.m .thapesu.m. seyyathaapi, saariputta, naanaapupphaani phalake nikkhittaani suttena susa"ngahitaani taani vaato na vikirati na vidhamati na viddha.mseti. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa ta.m suttena susa"ngahitattaa. evameva kho, saariputta, tesa.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m antaradhaanena buddhaanubuddhaana.m saavakaana.m antaradhaanena ye te pacchimaa saavakaa naanaanaamaa naanaagottaa naanaajaccaa naanaakulaa pabbajitaa te ta.m brahmacariya.m cira.m diighamaddhaana.m .thapesu.m. aya.m kho, saariputta, hetu aya.m paccayo yena bhagavato ca kakusandhassa bhagavato ca ko.naagamanassa bhagavato ca kassapassa brahmacariya.m cira.t.thitika.m ahosii''ti.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo! etassa, sugata, kaalo! ya.m bhagavaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napeyya {pa~n~naapeyya (sii0 syaa0)}, uddiseyya paatimokkha.m, yathayida.m brahmacariya.m addhaniya.m assa cira.t.thitika''nti. ``aagamehi tva.m, saariputta ^a^V0.0010^ea^! aagamehi tva.m, saariputta! tathaagatova tattha kaala.m jaanissati. na taava, saariputta, satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napeti uddisati {na uddisati (sii0)} paatimokkha.m yaava na idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti. yato ca kho, saariputta, idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, atha satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m ^a^T1.0016^ea^ pa~n~napeti uddissati paatimokkha.m tesa.myeva aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tighaataaya. na taava, saariputta, idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti yaava na sa"ngho ratta~n~numahatta.m patto hoti. yato ca kho, saariputta, sa"ngho ratta~n~numahatta.m patto hoti atha idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa ^a^M0.0011^ea^ dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, atha, satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napeti ^a^P3.0010^ea^ uddisati paatimokkha.m tesa.myeva aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tighaataaya. na taava, saariputta, idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, yaava na sa"ngho vepullamahatta.m patto hoti. yato ca kho, saariputta, sa"ngho vepullamahatta.m patto hoti, atha idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, atha satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napeti uddisati paatimokkha.m tesa.myeva aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tighaataaya. na taava, saariputta, idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, yaava na sa"ngho laabhaggamahatta.m patto hoti. yato ca kho, saariputta, sa"ngho laabhaggamahatta.m patto hoti, atha idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, atha satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napeti uddisati paatimokkha.m tesa.myeva aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tighaataaya. na taava, saariputta, idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, yaava na sa"ngho baahusaccamahatta.m patto hoti. yato ca kho, saariputta, sa"ngho baahusaccamahatta.m patto hoti, atha idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, atha satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napeti uddisati paatimokkha.m tesa.myeva aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tighaataaya. nirabbudo hi, saariputta, bhikkhusa"ngho niraadiinavo apagatakaa.lako suddho saare pati.t.thito. imesa~nhi, saariputta, pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m yo pacchimako bhikkhu ^a^T1.0017^ea^ so sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no''ti.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aaci.n.na.m kho paneta.m, aananda, tathaagataana.m yehi nimantitaa vassa.m vasanti, na te anapaloketvaa janapadacaarika.m pakkamanti. aayaamaananda, vera~nja.m braahma.na.m apalokessaamaa''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aayasmataa aanandena pacchaasama.nena yena vera~njassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho vera~njo ^a^M0.0012^ea^ braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^V0.0011^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho vera~nja.m braahma.na.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``nimantitamha tayaa, braahma.na ^a^P3.0011^ea^, vassa.mvu.t.thaa {vassa.mvutthaa (sii0 syaa0 ka0)}, apalokema ta.m, icchaama maya.m janapadacaarika.m pakkamitu''nti. ``sacca.m, bho gotama, nimantitattha mayaa vassa.mvu.t.thaa; api ca, yo deyyadhammo so na dinno. ta~nca kho no asanta.m, nopi adaatukamyataa, ta.m kutettha labbhaa bahukiccaa gharaavaasaa bahukara.niiyaa. adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho bhagavaa vera~nja.m braahma.na.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa ^a^T1.0018^ea^ pakkaami. atha kho vera~njo braahma.no tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena vera~njassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho vera~njo braahma.no buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m {o.niitapattapaa.ni.m (ka0)} ticiivarena acchaadesi, ekameka~nca bhikkhu.m ekamekena dussayugena acchaadesi. atha kho bhagavaa vera~nja.m braahma.na.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa vera~njaaya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa anupagamma soreyya.m sa"nkassa.m ka.n.nakujja.m yena payaagapati.t.thaana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa payaagapati.t.thaane ga"nga.m nadi.m uttaritvaa yena baaraa.nasii tadavasari. atha kho bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena vesaalii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena vesaalii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaayanti.
[06] vera~njabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0019^ea^ ^a^M0.0013^ea^ ^a^V0.0012^ea^ kho pana samayena vesaaliyaa aviduure kalandagaamo naama atthi {kalandagaamo naama hoti (sii0), kalandagaamo hoti (syaa0)}. tattha sudinno naama kalandaputto se.t.thiputto hoti. atha kho sudinno kalandaputto sambahulehi {sampahuulehi (sii0)} sahaayakehi saddhi.m vesaali.m agamaasi kenacideva kara.niiyena ^a^P3.0012^ea^. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuto dhamma.m desento nisinno hoti. addasa kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavanta.m mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuta.m dhamma.m desenta.m nisinna.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaahampi dhamma.m su.neyya''nti. atha kho sudinno kalandaputto yena saa parisaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnassa kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa etadahosi -- ``yathaa yathaa kho aha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m; ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya''nti. atha kho saa parisaa bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T1.0020^ea^ kho sudinno kalandaputto aciravu.t.thitaaya parisaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yathaa yathaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami ^a^V0.0013^ea^, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m; icchaamaha.m, bhante, kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. pabbaajetu ma.m bhagavaa''ti. ``anu~n~naatosi pana tva.m, suddinna, maataapituuhi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti? ``na kho aha.m, bhante, anu~n~naato maataapituuhi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^M0.0014^ea^ pabbajjaayaa''ti. ``na kho, sudinna, tathaagataa ananu~n~naata.m maataapituuhi putta.m pabbaajentii''ti. ``soha.m, bhante, tathaa karissaami yathaa ma.m maataapitaro anujaanissanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ atha kho sudinno kalandaputto vesaaliya.m ta.m kara.niiya.m tiiretvaa yena kalandagaamo yena maataapitaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa maataapitaro etadavoca -- ``ammataataa, yathaa yathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m ^a^T1.0021^ea^ sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m; icchaamaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^P3.0013^ea^ pabbajitu.m. anujaanaatha ma.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. eva.m vutte sudinnassa kalandaputtassa maataapitaro sudinna.m kalandaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, taata sudinna, amhaaka.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparihato. na tva.m, taata sudinna, ki~nci dukkhassa jaanaasi. mara.nenapi maya.m te akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama, ki.m pana maya.m ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. dutiyampi kho sudinno kalandaputto maataapitaro etadavoca -- ``ammataataa, yathaa yathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m; icchaamaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. anujaanaatha ma.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. dutiyampi kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa maataapitaro sudinna.m kalandaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, taata sudinna, amhaaka.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparihato. na tva.m, taata sudinna, ki~nci dukkhassa jaanaasi. mara.nenapi maya.m te akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama, ki.m pana maya.m ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti! tatiyampi kho sudinno kalandaputto maataapitaro etadavoca -- ``ammataataa ^a^T1.0022^ea^, yathaa yathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m; icchaamaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m ^a^V0.0014^ea^. anujaanaatha ma.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. tatiyampi ^a^M0.0015^ea^ kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa maataapitaro sudinna.m kalandaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, taata sudinna, amhaaka.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparihato. na tva.m, taata sudinna, ki~nci dukkhassa jaanaasi. mara.nenapi maya.m te akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama, ki.m pana maya.m ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti!

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ atha kho sudinno kalandaputto -- ``na ma.m maataapitaro anujaananti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti, tattheva anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa nipajji -- idheva me mara.na.m bhavissati pabbajjaa vaati. atha kho sudinno kalandaputto ekampi bhatta.m na bhu~nji, dvepi bhattaani na bhu~nji, tii.nipi bhattaani na bhu~nji, cattaaripi bhattaani na bhu~nji, pa~ncapi bhattaani na bhu~nji, chapi bhattaani na bhu~nji, sattapi bhattaani na bhu~nji.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ atha kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa maataapitaro sudinna.m kalandaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, taata sudinna, amhaaka.m ekaputtako ^a^T1.0023^ea^ piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparihato. na tva.m, taata sudinna, ki~nci dukkhassa jaanaasi. mara.nenapi maya.m te akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama, ki.m pana maya.m ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya? u.t.thehi, taata sudinna, bhu~nja ca piva ca paricaarehi ca, bhu~njanto pivanto paricaarento kaame paribhu~njanto pu~n~naani karonto abhiramassu. na ta.m maya.m anujaanaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. eva.m vutte sudinno kalandaputto tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa maataapitaro sudinna.m kalandaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, taata sudinna, amhaaka.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparihato. na tva.m, taata sudinna, ki~nci dukkhassa jaanaasi. mara.nenapi maya.m te akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama, ki.m pana maya.m ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya! u.t.thehi, taata sudinna, bhu~nja ca piva ca paricaarehi ca, bhu~njanto pivanto paricaarento kaame paribhu~njanto pu~n~naani karonto abhiramassu. na ta.m maya.m anujaanaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. tatiyampi kho sudinno kalandaputto tu.nhii ahosi.

[03]atha kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sahaayakaa yena sudinno kalandaputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^V0.0015^ea^ sudinna.m kalandaputta.m etadavocu.m ^a^M0.0016^ea^ -- ``tva.m khosi, samma sudinna, maataapituuna.m ^a^P3.0014^ea^ ekaputtako piyo manaapo ^a^T1.0024^ea^ sukhedhito sukhaparihato. na tva.m, samma sudinna, ki~nci dukkhassa jaanaasi. mara.nenapi te maataapitaro akaamakaa vinaa bhavissanti, ki.m pana ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajaaya! u.t.thehi, samma sudinna, bhu~nja ca piva ca paricaarehi ca, bhu~njanto pivanto paricaarento kaame paribhu~njanto pu~n~naani karonto abhiramassu, na ta.m maataapitaro anujaanissanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. eva.m vutte, sudinno kalandaputto tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sahaayakaa sudinna.m kalandaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, samma sudinna...pe0... tatiyampi kho sudinno kalandaputto tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ atha kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sahaayakaa yena sudinnassa kalandaputtassa maataapitaro tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa maataapitaro etadavocu.m -- ``ammataataa, eso sudinno anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa nipanno -- `idheva me mara.na.m bhavissati pabbajjaa vaa'ti. sace tumhe sudinna.m naanujaanissatha agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya, tattheva mara.na.m aagamissati. sace pana tumhe sudinna.m anujaanissatha agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya, pabbajitampi na.m dakkhissatha. sace sudinno naabhiramissati agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya, kaa tassa a~n~naa gati bhavissati, idheva paccaagamissati. anujaanaatha sudinna.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. ``anujaanaama ^a^T1.0025^ea^, taataa, sudinna.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. atha kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sahaayakaa yena sudinno kalandaputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa sudinna.m kalandaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``u.t.thehi, samma sudinna, anu~n~naatosi maataapituuhi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ atha kho sudinno kalandaputto -- ``anu~n~naatomhi kira maataapituuhi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti, ha.t.tho udaggo paa.ninaa gattaani paripu~nchanto vu.t.thaasi. atha kho sudinno kalandaputto katipaaha.m bala.m gaahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisanno kho sudinno kalandaputto ^a^M0.0017^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``anu~n~naato {anu~n~naatomhi (sii0 syaa0)} aha.m, bhante, maataapituuhi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. pabbaajetu ma.m bhagavaa''ti ^a^P3.0015^ea^. alattha kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno ca panaayasmaa sudinno evaruupe dhutagu.ne samaadaaya vattati, aara~n~niko ^a^V0.0016^ea^ hoti pi.n.dapaatiko pa.msukuuliko sapadaanacaariko, a~n~natara.m vajjigaama.m upanissaaya viharati.

[03] tena kho pana samayena vajjii dubbhikkhaa hoti dviihitikaa seta.t.thikaa salaakaavuttaa, na sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa etadahosi -- ``etarahi kho vajjii dubbhikkhaa ^a^T1.0026^ea^ dviihitikaa seta.t.thikaa salaakaavuttaa, na sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. bahuu kho pana me vesaaliya.m ~naatii a.d.dhaa mahaddhanaa mahaabhogaa pahuutajaataruuparajataa pahuutavittuupakara.naa pahuutadhanadha~n~naa. ya.mnuunaaha.m ~naatii upanissaaya vihareyya.m! ~naatii ma.m {~naatakaapi ma.m (syaa0)} nissaaya daanaani dassanti pu~n~naani karissanti, bhikkhuu ca laabha.m lacchanti, aha~nca pi.n.dakena na kilamissaamii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa sudinno senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena vesaalii tena pakkaami. anupubbena yena vesaalii tadavasari. tatra suda.m aayasmaa sudinno vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. assosu.m kho aayasmato sudinnassa ~naatakaa -- ``sudinno kira kalandaputto vesaali.m anuppatto''ti. te aayasmato sudinnassa sa.t.thimatte thaalipaake bhattaabhihaara.m abhihari.msu. atha kho aayasmaa sudinno te sa.t.thimatte thaalipaake bhikkhuuna.m vissajjetvaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kalandagaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. kalandagaame sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caramaano yena sakapitu nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmato sudinnassa ~naatidaasii aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m cha.d.detukaamaa {cha.t.tetukaamaa (ka0)} hoti. atha kho aayasmaa sudinno ta.m ~naatidaasi.m etadavoca -- ``sace ta.m, bhagini, cha.d.daniiyadhamma.m ^a^T1.0027^ea^, idha me patte aakiraa''ti. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa ~naatidaasii ta.m aabhidosika.m ^a^M0.0018^ea^ kummaasa.m aayasmato sudinnassa patte aakirantii hatthaana~nca paadaana~nca sarassa ca nimitta.m aggahesi. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa ~naatidaasii yenaayasmato sudinnassa maataa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmato sudinnassa maatara.m etadavoca -- ``yaggheyye, jaaneyyaasi, ayyaputto sudinno anuppatto''ti. ``sace, je, tva.m sacca.m bha.nasi, adaasi.m ta.m karomii''ti.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa sudinno ta.m aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m a~n~natara.m ku.t.tamuula.m {ku.d.damuula.m (sii0 syaa0)} nissaaya paribhu~njati. pitaapi kho aayasmato ^a^P3.0016^ea^ sudinnassa kammantaa aagacchanto addasa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m ta.m aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m a~n~natara.m ku.t.tamuula.m nissaaya paribhu~njanta.m ^a^V0.0017^ea^. disvaana yenaayasmaa sudinno tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m etadavoca -- ``atthi naama, taata sudinna, aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m paribhu~njissasi! nanu naama, taata sudinna, saka.m geha.m gantabba''nti? ``agamimha {agamamhaa (ka0)} kho te gahapati, geha.m. tatoya.m aabhidosiko kummaaso''ti. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa pitaa aayasmato sudinnassa baahaaya.m gahetvaa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m etadavoca -- ``ehi, taata sudinna, ghara.m gamissaamaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa sudinno yena sakapitu nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami ^a^T1.0028^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa pitaa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m etadavoca -- ``bhu~nja, taata sudinnaa''ti. ``ala.m, gahapati, kata.m me ajja bhattakicca''nti. ``adhivaasehi, taata sudinna, svaatanaaya bhatta''nti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa sudinno tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho aayasmaa sudinno u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa maataa tassaa rattiyaa accayena haritena gomayena pathavi.m opu~njaapetvaa {opucchaapetvaa (sii0 syaa0)} dve pu~nje kaaraapesi -- eka.m hira~n~nassa, eka.m suva.n.nassa. taava mahantaa pu~njaa ahesu.m, orato .thito puriso paarato .thita.m purisa.m na passati; paarato .thito puriso orato .thita.m purisa.m na passati. te pu~nje kila~njehi pa.ticchaadaapetvaa majjhe aasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa tirokara.niiya.m parikkhipitvaa aayasmato ^a^M0.0019^ea^ sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyika.m aamantesi -- ``tena hi, vadhu, yena ala"nkaarena ala"nkataa puttassa me sudinnassa piyaa ahosi manaapaa tena ala"nkaarena ala"nkaraa''ti. ``eva.m, ayye''ti, kho aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyikaa aayasmato sudinnassa maatuyaa paccassosi.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa sudinno pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena sakapitu nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa ^a^T1.0029^ea^ pitaa yenaayasmaa sudinno tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te pu~nje vivaraapetvaa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m te, taata sudinna, maatu mattika.m itthikaaya itthidhana.m, a~n~na.m pettika.m a~n~na.m pitaamaha.m. labbhaa, taata sudinna, hiinaayaavattitvaa bhogaa ca bhu~njitu.m pu~n~naani ca kaatu.m. ehi tva.m, taata sudinna, hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njassu pu~n~naani ca karohii''ti ^a^P3.0017^ea^. ``taata, na ussahaami na visahaami, abhirato aha.m brahmacariya.m caraamii''ti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho aayasmato sudinnassa pitaa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m te, taata sudinna, maatu mattika.m, itthikaaya itthidhana.m, a~n~na.m pettika.m ^a^V0.0018^ea^, a~n~na.m pitaamaha.m. labbhaa, taata sudinna, hiinaayaavattitvaa bhogaa ca bhu~njitu.m pu~n~naani ca kaatu.m. ehi tva.m, taata sudinna, hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njassu pu~n~naani ca karohii''ti. ``vadeyyaama kho ta.m, gahapati, sace tva.m naatika.d.dheyyaasii''ti. ``vadehi, taata sudinnaa''ti. tena hi tva.m, gahapati, mahante mahante saa.nipasibbake kaaraapetvaa hira~n~nasuva.n.nassa puuraapetvaa saka.tehi nibbaahaapetvaa majjhe ga"ngaaya sote opaatehi {osaadehi (sii0 syaa0)}. ta.m kissa hetu? ya~nhi te, gahapati, bhavissati tatonidaana.m bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa aarakkho vaa so te na bhavissatii''ti. eva.m vutte, aayasmato sudinnassa pitaa anattamano ^a^T1.0030^ea^ ahosi -- ``katha~nhi naama putto sudinno eva.m vakkhatii''ti!

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa pitaa aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyika.m aamantesi -- ``tena hi, vadhu, tva.m piyaa ca manaapaa ca {tvampi yaaca (sii0)}. appeva ^a^M0.0020^ea^ naama putto sudinno tuyhampi vacana.m kareyyaa''ti! atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyikaa aayasmato sudinnassa paadesu gahetvaa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m etadavoca -- ``kiidisaa naama taa, ayyaputta, accharaayo yaasa.m tva.m hetu brahmacariya.m carasii''ti? ``na kho aha.m, bhagini, accharaana.m hetu brahmacariya.m caraamii''ti. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyikaa -- ``ajjatagge ma.m ayyaputto sudinno bhaginivaadena samudaacaratii''ti, tattheva mucchitaa papataa.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa sudinno pitara.m etadavoca -- ``sace, gahapati, bhojana.m daatabba.m detha, maa no vihe.thayitthaa''ti. ``bhu~nja, taata sudinnaa''ti. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa maataa ca pitaa ca aayasmanta.m sudinna.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesu.m sampavaaresu.m. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa maataa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m, taata sudinna, kula.m a.d.dha.m mahaddhana.m mahaabhoga.m pahuutajaataruuparajata.m pahuutavittuupakara.na.m pahuutadhanadha~n~na.m. labbhaa, taata sudinna, hiinaayaavattitvaa bhogaa ca bhu~njitu.m pu~n~naani ca kaatu.m. ehi tva.m, taata sudinna, hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njassu pu~n~naani ca karohii''ti. ``amma, na ussahaami na visahaami ^a^P3.0018^ea^, abhirato ^a^T1.0031^ea^ aha.m brahmacariya.m caraamii''ti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho aayasmato sudinnassa maataa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m, taata sudinna, kula.m a.d.dha.m mahaddhana.m mahaabhoga.m pahuutajaataruuparajata.m pahuutavittuupakara.na.m pahuutadhanadha~n~na.m {pahuutadhanadha~n~na.m (pa0 caraamiiti) itipaa.tho sabbattha natthi, uuno ma~n~ne}. tena hi, taata sudinna, biijakampi dehi -- maa no aputtaka.m saapateyya.m licchavayo atiharaapesu''nti. ``eta.m kho me, amma, sakkaa ^a^V0.0019^ea^ kaatu''nti. ``kaha.m pana, taata sudinna, etarahi viharasii''ti? ``mahaavane, ammaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa sudinno u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa maataa aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyika.m aamantesi -- ``tena hi, vadhu, yadaa utunii hosi, puppha.m te uppanna.m hoti, atha me aaroceyyaasii''ti. ``eva.m ayye''ti kho aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyikaa aayasmato sudinnassa maatuyaa paccassosi. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyikaa nacirasseva ^a^M0.0021^ea^ utunii ahosi, puppha.msaa uppajji. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyikaa aayasmato sudinnassa maatara.m etadavoca -- ``utuniimhi, ayye, puppha.m me uppanna''nti. ``tena hi, vadhu, yena ala"nkaarena ala"nkataa puttassa sudinnassa piyaa ahosi manaapaa tena ala"nkaarena ala"nkaraa''ti. ``eva.m ayye''ti kho aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyikaa aayasmato sudinnassa maatuyaa paccassosi. atha kho aayasmato ^a^T1.0032^ea^ sudinnassa maataa aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyika.m aadaaya yena mahaavana.m yenaayasmaa sudinno tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m, taata sudinna, kula.m a.d.dha.m mahaddhana.m mahaabhoga.m pahuutajaataruuparajata.m pahuutavittuupakara.na.m pahuutadhanadha~n~na.m. labbhaa, taata sudinna, hiinaayaavattitvaa bhogaa ca bhu~njitu.m pu~n~naani ca kaatu.m. ehi tva.m, taata sudinna, hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njassu pu~n~naani ca karohii''ti. ``amma, na ussahaami na visahaami, abhirato aha.m brahmacariya.m caraamii''ti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho aayasmato sudinnassa maataa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m, taata sudinna, kula.m a.d.dha.m mahaddhana.m mahaabhoga.m pahuutajaataruuparajata.m pahuutavittuupakara.na.m pahuutadhanadha~n~na.m. tena hi, taata sudinna, biijakampi dehi -- maa no aputtaka.m saapateyya.m licchavayo atiharaapesu''nti. ``eta.m kho me, amma, sakkaa kaatu''nti, puraa.nadutiyikaaya baahaaya.m gahetvaa mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa apa~n~natte sikkhaapade anaadiinavadasso puraa.nadutiyikaaya tikkhattu.m methuna.m dhamma.m abhivi~n~naapesi. saa tena gabbha.m ga.nhi. bhummaa devaa saddamanussaavesu.m -- ``nirabbudo vata, bho, bhikkhusa"ngho niraadiinavo; sudinnena kalandaputtena abbuda.m uppaadita.m, aadiinavo uppaadito''ti. bhummaana.m devaana.m sadda.m sutvaa caatumahaaraajikaa {caatummahaaraajikaa (sii0 syaa0)} devaa saddamanussaavesu.m...pe0... taavati.msaa devaa... yaamaa devaa ^a^T1.0033^ea^... tusitaa devaa... nimmaanaratii devaa... paranimmitavasavattii ^a^P3.0019^ea^ devaa... brahmakaayikaa devaa saddamanussaavesu.m -- ``nirabbudo vata, bho, bhikkhusa"ngho niraadiinavo; sudinnena kalandaputtena abbuda.m ^a^V0.0020^ea^ uppaadita.m, aadiinavo uppaadito''ti. itiha tena kha.nena tena muhuttena yaava brahmalokaa saddo abbhuggacchi.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0022^ea^ kho aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyikaa tassa gabbhassa paripaakamanvaaya putta.m vijaayi. atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa sahaayakaa tassa daarakassa `biijako'ti naama.m aka.msu. aayasmato sudinnassa puraa.nadutiyikaaya biijakamaataati naama.m aka.msu. aayasmato sudinnassa biijakapitaati naama.m aka.msu. te aparena samayena ubho agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitvaa arahatta.m sacchaaka.msu.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa ahudeva kukkucca.m, ahu vippa.tisaaro -- ``alaabhaa vata me, na vata me laabhaa! dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m! yoha.m eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitvaa naasakkhi.m yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caritu''nti. so teneva kukkuccena tena vippa.tisaarena kiso ahosi luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto antomano liinamano dukkhii dummano vippa.tisaarii pajjhaayi.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmato sudinnassa sahaayakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m sudinna.m etadavocu.m -- ``pubbe kho tva.m, aavuso sudinna, va.n.navaa ahosi pii.nindriyo pasannamukhava.n.no vippasannachaviva.n.no; so daani tva.m etarahi kiso ^a^T1.0034^ea^ luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto antomano liinamano dukkhii dummano vippa.tisaarii pajjhaayasi. kacci no tva.m, aavuso sudinna, anabhirato brahmacariya.m carasii''ti? ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, anabhirato brahmacariya.m caraami. atthi me paapakamma.m kata.m; puraa.nadutiyikaaya methuno dhammo pa.tisevito; tassa mayha.m, aavuso, ahudeva kukkucca.m ahu vippa.tisaaro -- `alaabhaa vata me, na vata me laabhaa; dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m; yoha.m eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitvaa naasakkhi.m yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caritu''nti. ``ala~nhi te, aavuso sudinna, kukkuccaaya ala.m vippa.tisaaraaya ya.m tva.m eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitvaa na sakkhissasi yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. nanu, aavuso, bhagavataa anekapariyaayena viraagaaya dhammo desito, no saraagaaya; visa.myogaaya dhammo desito, no sa.myogaaya; anupaadaanaaya dhammo desito, no saupaadaanaaya. tattha ^a^V0.0021^ea^ naama tva.m, aavuso, bhagavataa ^a^M0.0023^ea^ viraagaaya dhamme desite saraagaaya cetessasi, visa.myogaaya dhamme desite ^a^P3.0020^ea^ sa.myogaaya cetessasi, anupaadaanaaya dhamme desite saupaadaanaaya cetessasi! nanu, aavuso, bhagavataa anekapariyaayena raagaviraagaaya dhammo desito, madanimmadanaaya pipaasavinayaaya aalayasamugghaataaya va.t.tupacchedaaya ta.nhaakkhayaaya ^a^T1.0035^ea^ viraagaaya nirodhaaya nibbaanaaya dhammo desito! nanu, aavuso, bhagavataa anekapariyaayena kaamaana.m pahaana.m akkhaata.m, kaamasa~n~naana.m pari~n~naa akkhaataa, kaamapipaasaana.m pa.tivinayo akkhaato, kaamavitakkaana.m samugghaato akkhaato, kaamapari.laahaana.m vuupasamo akkhaato! neta.m, aavuso, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m vaa bhiyyobhaavaaya. atha khveta.m, aavuso, appasannaana~nceva appasaadaaya pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathattaayaa''ti.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m sudinna.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, sudinna, puraa.nadutiyikaaya methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m {ananucchaviya.m (sii0)}, moghapurisa, ananulomika.m appa.tiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitvaa na sakkhissasi yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m! nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena viraagaaya dhammo desito, no saraagaaya; visa.myogaaya dhammo desito, no sa.myogaaya; anupaadaanaaya dhammo desito, no saupaadaanaaya! tattha naama tva.m, moghapurisa, mayaa viraagaaya dhamme desite saraagaaya cetessasi ^a^T1.0036^ea^, visa.myogaaya dhamme desite sa.myogaaya cetessasi, anupaadaanaaya dhamme desite saupaadaanaaya cetessasi! nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena raagaviraagaaya dhammo desito! madanimmadanaaya pipaasavinayaaya aalayasamugghaataaya va.t.tupacchedaaya ta.nhaakkhayaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya nibbaanaaya dhammo desito! nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena kaamaana.m ^a^M0.0024^ea^ pahaana.m akkhaata.m, kaamasa~n~naana.m pari~n~naa akkhaataa, kaamapipaasaana.m pa.tivinayo akkhaato, kaamavitakkaana.m samugghaato akkhaato, kaamapari.laahaana.m vuupasamo akkhaato! vara.m te, moghapurisa, aasivisassa {aasiivisassa (sii0 syaa0)} ghoravisassa mukhe a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m, na tveva maatugaamassa a"ngajaate a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m. vara.m te, moghapurisa, ka.nhasappassa mukhe a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m, na tveva maatugaamassa a"ngajaate a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m. vara.m te, moghapurisa, a"ngaarakaasuyaa aadittaaya sampajjalitaaya sajotibhuutaaya a"ngajaata.m ^a^V0.0022^ea^ pakkhitta.m, na tveva maatugaamassa a"ngajaate a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m. ta.m kissa hetu? tatonidaana~nhi, moghapurisa, mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m, na tveva tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya. itonidaana~nca kho, moghapurisa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m ^a^P3.0021^ea^ vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya. tattha naama tva.m, moghapurisa, ya.m tva.m asaddhamma.m gaamadhamma.m ^a^T1.0037^ea^ vasaladhamma.m du.t.thulla.m odakantika.m rahassa.m dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti.m samaapajjissasi, bahuuna.m kho tva.m, moghapurisa, akusalaana.m dhammaana.m aadikattaa pubba"ngamo. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m vaa bhiyyobhaavaaya; atha khveta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana~nceva appasaadaaya, pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathattaayaa''ti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m sudinna.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa dubbharataaya dupposataaya mahicchataaya asantu.t.thitaaya {asantu.t.thataaya (syaa0)} sa"nga.nikaaya kosajjassa ava.n.na.m bhaasitvaa anekapariyaayena subharataaya suposataaya appicchassa santu.t.thassa sallekhassa dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa {viiriyaarabbhassa (ka0)} va.n.na.m bhaasitvaa bhikkhuuna.m tadanucchavika.m tadanulomika.m dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaami {pa~n~naapessaami (sii0 syaa0)} dasa atthavase pa.ticca -- sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya, sa"nghaphaasutaaya, dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya, pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya, di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya, samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya, appasannaana.m pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya, saddhamma.t.thitiyaa, vinayaanuggahaaya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo^eb^ ^a^M0.0025^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tiseveyya, paaraajiko hoti asa.mvaaso''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.
[06] sudinnabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0038^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu vesaaliya.m mahaavane makka.ti.m aamisena upalaapetvaa tassaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati. atha kho so bhikkhu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivara.m ^a^V0.0023^ea^ aadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa yena tassa bhikkhuno vihaaro tenupasa"nkami.msu. addasa kho saa makka.tii te bhikkhuu duuratova aagacchante. disvaana yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m purato ka.timpi caalesi cheppampi caalesi, ka.timpi ^a^P3.0022^ea^ o.d.di, nimittampi akaasi. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho so bhikkhu imissaa makka.tiyaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevatii''ti. ekamanta.m niliiyi.msu. atha kho so bhikkhu vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pi.n.dapaata.m aadaaya pa.tikkami.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ atha kho saa makka.tii yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami. atha kho so bhikkhu ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m ekadesa.m bhu~njitvaa ekadesa.m tassaa makka.tiyaa adaasi. atha kho saa makka.tii ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njitvaa tassa bhikkhuno ka.ti.m o.d.di. atha kho so bhikkhu tassaa makka.tiyaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati. atha kho te bhikkhuu ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``nanu, aavuso, bhagavataa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m; kissa tva.m, aavuso, makka.tiyaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevasii''ti? ``sacca.m, aavuso, bhagavataa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m; ta~nca kho ^a^T1.0039^ea^ manussitthiyaa ^a^M0.0026^ea^, no tiracchaanagataayaa''ti. ``nanu, aavuso, tatheva ta.m hoti. ananucchavika.m, aavuso, ananulomika.m appa.tiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, aavuso, eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitvaa na sakkhissasi yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m! nanu, aavuso, bhagavataa anekapariyaayena viraagaaya dhammo desito, no saraagaaya...pe0... kaamapari.laahaana.m vuupasamo akkhaato! neta.m, aavuso, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya pasannaana.m vaa bhiyyobhaavaaya. atha khveta.m, aavuso, appasannaana~nceva appasaadaaya, pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathattaayaa''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu ta.m bhikkhu.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m arocesu.m.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, makka.tiyaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisa, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitvaa na sakkhissasi yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m! nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena viraagaaya dhammo desito, no saraagaaya ^a^V0.0024^ea^ ...pe0... kaamapari.laahaana.m vuupasamo akkhaato! vara.m te, moghapurisa, aasiivisassa ghoravisassa mukhe a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m, na tveva makka.tiyaa a"ngajaate a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m. vara.m te, moghapurisa, ka.nhasappassa mukhe a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m, na tveva makka.tiyaa a"ngajaate a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m. vara.m ^a^T1.0040^ea^ te, moghapurisa, a"ngaarakaasuyaa aadittaaya sampajjalitaaya sajotibhuutaaya a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m, na tveva makka.tiyaa a"ngajaate a"ngajaata.m pakkhitta.m. ta.m kissa hetu? tatonidaana~nhi, moghapurisa, mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m; na tveva tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya. itonidaana~nca kho, moghapurisa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya. tattha naama tva.m, moghapurisa, ya.m tva.m asaddhamma.m gaamadhamma.m vasaladhamma.m du.t.thulla.m odakantika.m rahassa.m dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti.m samaapajjissasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``yo^eb^ ^a^M0.0027^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tiseveyya antamaso tiracchaanagataayapi, paaraajiko hoti asa.mvaaso''ti.^eb^
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.
[06] makka.tiivatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P3.0023^ea^ kho pana samayena sambahulaa vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu yaavadattha.m bhu~nji.msu, yaavadattha.m supi.msu, yaavadattha.m nhaayi.msu. yaavadattha.m bhu~njitvaa yaavadattha.m supitvaa yaavadattha.m nhaayitvaa ayoniso manasi karitvaa sikkha.m apaccakkhaaya dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa methuna.m ^a^T1.0041^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevi.msu. te aparena samayena ~naatibyasanenapi phu.t.thaa bhogabyasanenapi phu.t.thaa rogabyasanenapi phu.t.thaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- ``na maya.m, bhante aananda, buddhagarahino na dhammagarahino na sa"nghagarahino; attagarahino maya.m, bhante aananda, ana~n~nagarahino. mayamevamhaa alakkhikaa maya.m appapu~n~naa, ye maya.m eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitvaa naasakkhimhaa yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. idaani cepi ^a^V0.0025^ea^ {idaanipi ce (syaa0)} maya.m, bhante aananda, labheyyaama bhagavato santike pabbajja.m labheyyaama upasampada.m, idaanipi maya.m vipassakaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhikaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa vihareyyaama. saadhu, bhante aananda, bhagavato etamattha.m aarocehii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa aanando vesaalikaana.m vajjiputtakaana.m pa.tissu.nitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi.
[03]``a.t.thaanameta.m, aananda, anavakaaso ya.m tathaagato vajjiina.m vaa vajjiputtakaana.m vaa kaara.naa saavakaana.m paaraajika.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m samuuhaneyyaa''ti.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0028^ea^ kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yo, bhikkhave {yo pana bhikkhave bhikkhu (sii0) yo kho bhikkhave bhikkhu (syaa0)}, sikkha.m apaccakkhaaya dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati so aagato na upasampaadetabbo ^a^T1.0042^ea^; yo ca kho, bhikkhave {yo ca kho bhikkhave bhikkhu (sii0 syaa0)}, sikkha.m paccakkhaaya dubbalya.m aavikatvaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati so aagato upasampaadetabbo. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno sikkha.m apaccakkhaaya dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tiseveyya antamaso tiracchaanagataayapi, paaraajiko hoti asa.mvaaso''^eb^ti.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso yathaayutto yathaajacco yathaanaamo yathaagotto ^a^P3.0024^ea^ yathaasiilo yathaavihaarii yathaagocaro thero vaa navo vaa majjhimo vaa. eso vuccati `yo panaa'ti.

[03] {vibha0 510, jhaanavibha"ngepi} ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti bhikkhakoti bhikkhu, bhikkhaacariya.m ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu, bhinnapa.tadharoti bhikkhu, sama~n~naaya bhikkhu, pa.ti~n~naaya bhikkhu, ehi bhikkhuuti bhikkhu, tiihi sara.nagamanehi upasampannoti bhikkhu, bhadro bhikkhu, saaro bhikkhu, sekho bhikkhu, asekho bhikkhu, samaggena sa"nghena ~natticatutthena kammena akuppena .thaanaarahena upasampannoti bhikkhu. tatra yvaaya.m bhikkhu samaggena sa"nghena ~natticatutthena kammena akuppena .thaanaarahena upasampanno, aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.

[03] {dii0 ni0 3.305} ^b^sikkhaa^eb^ti ^a^V0.0026^ea^ tisso sikkhaa -- adhisiilasikkhaa, adhicittasikkhaa, adhipa~n~naasikkhaa ^a^T1.0043^ea^. tatra yaaya.m adhisiilasikkhaa, aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippetaa sikkhaati.
[03]^b^saajiiva.m^eb^ naama ya.m bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m sikkhaapada.m, eta.m saajiiva.m naama. tasmi.m sikkhati, tena vuccati saajiivasamaapannoti.

[03]^b^sikkha.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0029^ea^ ^b^apaccakkhaaya dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa^eb^ti atthi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca apaccakkhaataa; atthi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca paccakkhaataa.

[03]``katha~nca, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca apaccakkhaataa. idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukka.n.thito anabhirato saama~n~naa cavitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano gihibhaava.m patthayamaano upaasakabhaava.m patthayamaano aaraamikabhaava.m patthayamaano saama.nerabhaava.m patthayamaano titthiyabhaava.m patthayamaano titthiyasaavakabhaava.m patthayamaano assama.nabhaava.m patthayamaano asakyaputtiyabhaava.m patthayamaano -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m buddha.m paccakkheyya'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca apaccakkhaataa.

[03]``atha vaa pana ukka.n.thito anabhirato saama~n~naa cavitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano gihibhaava.m patthayamaano...pe0... asakyaputtiyabhaava.m patthayamaano -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m dhamma.m paccakkheyya'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... ya.mnuunaaha.m sa"ngha.m... ya.mnuunaaha.m sikkha.m... ya.mnuunaaha.m ^a^T1.0044^ea^ vinaya.m... ya.mnuunaaha.m paatimokkha.m... ya.mnuunaaha.m uddesa.m... ya.mnuunaaha.m ^a^P3.0025^ea^ upajjhaaya.m... ya.mnuunaaha.m aacariya.m... ya.mnuunaaha.m saddhivihaarika.m... ya.mnuunaaha.m antevaasika.m... ya.mnuunaaha.m samaanupajjhaayaka.m... ya.mnuunaaha.m samaanaacariyaka.m ya.mnuunaaha.m sabrahmacaari.m paccakkheyya'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti. `ya.mnuunaaha.m gihii assa'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti. `ya.mnuunaaha.m upaasako assa'nti... `ya.mnuunaaha.m aaraamiko assa'nti... `ya.mnuunaaha.m saama.nero assa'nti... `ya.mnuunaaha.m titthiyo assa'nti... `ya.mnuunaaha.m titthiyasaavako assa'nti... `ya.mnuunaaha.m assama.no assa'nti... `ya.mnuunaaha.m asakyaputtiyo assa'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca apaccakkhaataa.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^V0.0027^ea^ vaa pana ukka.n.thito anabhirato saama~n~naa cavitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano gihibhaava.m patthayamaano...pe0... asakyaputtiyabhaava.m patthayamaano -- `yadi panaaha.m buddha.m paccakkheyya'nti vadati ^a^M0.0030^ea^ vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `yadi panaaha.m asakyaputtiyo assa'nti ^a^T1.0045^ea^ vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `apaaha.m buddha.m paccakkheyya'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `apaaha.m asakyaputtiyo assa'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `handaaha.m buddha.m paccakkheyya'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `handaaha.m asakyaputtiyo assa'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `hoti me buddha.m paccakkheyya'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `hoti me asakyaputtiyo assa'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca apaccakkhaataa.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ ``atha vaa pana ukka.n.thito anabhirato saama~n~naa cavitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano gihibhaava.m patthayamaano...pe0... asakyaputtiyabhaava.m patthayamaano `maatara.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `pitara.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `bhaatara.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `bhagini.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `putta.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `dhiitara.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `pajaapati.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `~naatake saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `mitte saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `gaama.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `nigama.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `khetta.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `vatthu.m saraami'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `hira~n~na.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `suva.n.na.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `sippa.m saraamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `pubbe hasita.m lapita.m kii.lita.m samanussaraamii'ti ^a^T1.0046^ea^ vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva ^a^P3.0026^ea^ hoti sikkhaa ca apaccakkhaataa.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``atha vaa pana ukka.n.thito anabhirato saama~n~naa cavitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano gihibhaava.m patthayamaano...pe0... asakyaputtiyabhaava.m patthayamaano -- `maataa me atthi, saa mayaa posetabbaa'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `pitaa me atthi, so mayaa posetabbo'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `bhaataa me atthi, so mayaa posetabbo'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `bhaginii me atthi, saa mayaa posetabbaa'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `putto me atthi, so mayaa posetabbo'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `dhiitaa me atthi, saa mayaa posetabbaa'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `pajaapati me atthi, saa mayaa posetabbaa'ti ^a^V0.0028^ea^ vadati vi~n~naapeti ^a^M0.0031^ea^... `~naatakaa me atthi, te mayaa posetabbaa'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `mittaa me atthi, te mayaa posetabbaa'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca apaccakkhaataa.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ``atha vaa pana ukka.n.thito anabhirato saama~n~naa cavitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano gihibhaava.m patthayamaano...pe0... asakyaputtiyabhaava.m patthayamaano -- `maataa me atthi, saa ma.m posessatii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `pitaa me atthi, so ma.m posessatii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `bhaataa me atthi, so ma.m posessatii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `bhaginii me atthi, saa ma.m posessatii'ti ^a^T1.0047^ea^ vadati vi~n~naapeti... `putto me atthi, so ma.m posessatii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `dhiitaa me atthi, saa ma.m posessatii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `pajaapati me atthi, saa ma.m posessatii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `~naatakaa me atthi, te ma.m posessantii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `mittaa me atthi, te ma.m posessantii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `gaamo me atthi, tenaaha.m jiivissaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `nigamo me atthi, tenaaha.m jiivissaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `khetta.m me atthi, tenaaha.m jiivissaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `vatthu me atthi, tenaaha.m jiivissaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `hira~n~na.m me atthi, tenaaha.m jiivissaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `suva.n.na.m me atthi, tenaaha.m jiivissaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `sippa.m me atthi, tenaaha.m jiivissaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca apaccakkhaataa.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ ``atha vaa pana ukka.n.thito anabhirato saama~n~naa cavitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano gihibhaava.m patthayamaano...pe0... asakyaputtiyabhaava.m patthayamaano `dukkara'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `na sukara'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `duccara'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `na sucara'nti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `na ussahaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `na visahaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `na ramaamii'ti vadati ^a^T1.0048^ea^ vi~n~naapeti... `naabhiramaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi kho, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca apaccakkhaataa.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca ^a^M0.0032^ea^, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca paccakkhaataa? idha ^a^V0.0029^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukka.n.thito anabhirato saama~n~naa cavitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano gihibhaava.m patthayamaano...pe0... asakyaputtiyabhaava.m patthayamaano -- `buddha.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca paccakkhaataa.

[03]``atha vaa pana ukka.n.thito anabhirato saama~n~naa cavitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano gihibhaava.m patthayamaano...pe0... asakyaputtiyabhaava.m patthayamaano -- `dhamma.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `sa"ngha.m ^a^P3.0027^ea^ paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `sikkha.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `vinaya.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `paatimokkha.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `uddesa.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `upajjhaaya.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `aacariya.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `saddhivihaarika.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `antevaasika.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `samaanupajjhaayaka.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `samaanaacariyaka.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `sabrahmacaari.m paccakkhaamii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `gihiiti ma.m dhaarehii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `upaasakoti ma.m dhaarehii'ti ^a^T1.0049^ea^ vadati vi~n~naapeti... `aaraamikoti ma.m dhaarehii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `saama.neroti ma.m dhaarehii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `titthiyoti ma.m dhaarehii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `titthiyasaavakoti ma.m dhaarehii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `assama.noti ma.m dhaarehii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `asakyaputtiyoti ma.m dhaarehii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca paccakkhaataa.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ``atha vaa pana ukka.n.thito anabhirato saama~n~naa cavitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano gihibhaava.m patthayamaano...pe0... asakyaputtiyabhaava.m patthayamaano -- `ala.m me buddhenaa'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `ala.m me sabrahmacaariihii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi...pe0... atha vaa pana...pe0... `ki.m nu me buddhenaa'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `ki.m nu me sabrahmacaariihii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `na mamattho buddhenaa'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `na mamattho sabrahmacaariihii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti... `sumuttaaha.m buddhenaa'ti ^a^M0.0033^ea^ vadati vi~n~naapeti...pe0... `sumuttaaha.m sabrahmacaariihii'ti vadati vi~n~naapeti. evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca paccakkhaataa.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ``yaani ^a^V0.0030^ea^ vaa pana~n~naanipi atthi buddhavevacanaani vaa dhammavevacanaani vaa sa"nghavevacanaani vaa sikkhaavevacanaani vaa vinayavevacanaani vaa paatimokkhavevacanaani vaa uddesavevacanaani vaa upajjhaayavevacanaani vaa ^a^T1.0050^ea^ aacariyavevacanaani vaa saddhivihaarikavevacanaani vaa antevaasikavevacanaani vaa samaanupajjhaayakavevacanaani vaa samaanaacariyakavevacanaani vaa sabrahmacaarivevacanaani vaa gihivevacanaani vaa upaasakavevacanaani vaa aaraamikavevacanaani vaa saama.neravevacanaani vaa titthiyavevacanaani vaa titthiyasaavakavevacanaani vaa assama.navevacanaani vaa asakyaputtiyavevacanaani vaa, tehi aakaarehi tehi li"ngehi tehi nimittehi vadati vi~n~naapeti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca paccakkhaataa.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa? idha, bhikkhave, yehi aakaarehi yehi li"ngehi yehi nimittehi sikkhaa paccakkhaataa hoti tehi aakaarehi tehi li"ngehi tehi nimittehi ummattako sikkha.m paccakkhaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. ummattakassa santike sikkha.m paccakkhaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. khittacitto sikkha.m paccakkhaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. khittacittassa santike sikkha.m paccakkhaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. vedanaa.t.to sikkha.m paccakkhaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. vedanaa.t.tassa santike sikkha.m paccakkhaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. devataaya santike sikkha.m paccakkhaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. tiracchaanagatassa santike sikkha.m paccakkhaati, apaccakkhaataa ^a^T1.0051^ea^ hoti sikkhaa. ariyakena milakkhassa {milakkhakassa (sii0 syaa0) milakkhussa (ka0)} santike sikkha.m paccakkhaati, so ca na pa.tivijaanaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. milakkhakena ariyakassa santike sikkha.m paccakkhaati, so ca na pa.tivijaanaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. ariyakena ariyassa santike sikkha.m paccakkhaati, so ca na pa.tivijaanaati ^a^M0.0034^ea^, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. milakkhakena milakkhassa ^a^P3.0028^ea^ santike sikkha.m paccakkhaati, so ca na pa.tivijaanaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. davaaya sikkha.m paccakkhaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. ravaaya sikkha.m paccakkhaati, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. asaavetukaamo saaveti, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. saavetukaamo na saaveti, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. avi~n~nussa saaveti, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. vi~n~nussa na saaveti, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. sabbaso ^a^V0.0031^ea^ vaa pana na saaveti, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, apaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa''.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ {mahaani0 49, 50, 51} ^b^methunadhammo^eb^ naama yo so asaddhammo gaamadhammo vasaladhammo du.t.thulla.m odakantika.m rahassa.m dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti, eso methunadhammo naama.
[03]^b^pa.tisevati^eb^ naama yo nimittena nimitta.m a"ngajaatena a"ngajaata.m antamaso tilaphalamattampi paveseti, eso pa.tisevati naama.

[03]^b^antamaso^eb^ ^a^T1.0052^ea^ ^b^tiracchaanagataayapii^eb^ti tiracchaanagatitthiyaapi methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitvaa assama.no hoti asakyaputtiyo, pageva manussitthiyaa. tena vuccati -- `antamaso tiracchaanagataayapii'ti.

[03]^b^paaraajiko hotii^eb^ti seyyathaapi naama puriso siisacchinno abhabbo tena sariirabandhanena jiivitu.m, evameva bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitvaa assama.no hoti asakyaputtiyo. tena vuccati -- `paaraajiko hotii'ti.
[03]^b^asa.mvaaso^eb^ti sa.mvaaso naama ekakamma.m ekuddeso samasikkhataa -- eso sa.mvaaso naama. so tena saddhi.m natthi. tena vuccati -- `asa.mvaaso'ti.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ tisso itthiyo -- manussitthii, amanussitthii, tiracchaanagatitthii. tayo ubhatobya~njanakaa -- manussubhatobya~njanako, amanussubhatobya~njanako, tiracchaanagatubhatobya~njanako. tayo pa.n.dakaa -- manussapa.n.dako, amanussapa.n.dako ^a^M0.0035^ea^, tiracchaanagatapa.n.dako. tayo purisaa -- manussapuriso, amanussapuriso, tiracchaanagatapuriso.

[03]manussitthiyaa tayo magge methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa aapatti paaraajikassa -- vaccamagge, passaavamagge, mukhe. amanussitthiyaa...pe0... tiracchaanagatitthiyaa tayo magge methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa aapatti paaraajikassa -- vaccamagge, passaavamagge, mukhe. manussubhatobya~njanakassa... amanussubhatobya~njanakassa... tiracchaanagatubhatobya~njanakassa tayo ^a^T1.0053^ea^ magge methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa aapatti paaraajikassa -- vaccamagge, passaavamagge, mukhe. manussapa.n.dakassa dve magge ^a^V0.0032^ea^ methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa aapatti paaraajikassa -- vaccamagge, mukhe. amanussapa.n.dakassa... tiracchaanagatapa.n.dakassa... manussapurisassa... amanussapurisassa... tiracchaanagatapurisassa dve magge methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa aapatti paaraajikassa -- vaccamagge, mukhe.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ bhikkhussa ^a^P3.0029^ea^ sevanacitta.m upa.t.thite manussitthiyaa vaccamagga.m a"ngajaata.m pavesentassa aapatti paaraajikassa. bhikkhussa sevanacitta.m upa.t.thite manussitthiyaa passaavamagga.m... mukha.m a"ngajaata.m pavesentassa aapatti paaraajikassa. bhikkhussa sevanacitta.m upa.t.thite amanussitthiyaa... tiracchaanagatitthiyaa... manussubhatobya~njanakassa... amanussubhatobya~njanakassa... tiracchaanagatubhatobya~njanakassa... vaccamagga.m passaavamagga.m mukha.m a"ngajaata.m pavesentassa aapatti paaraajikassa. bhikkhussa sevanacitta.m upa.t.thite manussapa.n.dakassa vaccamagga.m mukha.m a"ngajaata.m pavesentassa aapatti paaraajikassa. bhikkhussa sevanacitta.m upa.t.thite amanussapa.n.dakassa... tiracchaanagatapa.n.dakassa... manussapurisassa... amanussapurisassa... tiracchaanagatapurisassa vaccamagga.m mukha.m a"ngajaata.m pavesentassa aapatti paaraajikassa.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ bhikkhupaccatthikaa manussitthi.m bhikkhussa santike aanetvaa vaccamaggena ^a^T1.0054^ea^ a"ngajaata.m abhinisiidenti. so ce pavesana.m saadiyati {pavisana.m saadayati (ka0)}, pavi.t.tha.m saadiyati, .thita.m saadiyati, uddhara.na.m saadiyati, aapatti paaraajikassa. bhikkhupaccatthikaa manussitthi.m bhikkhussa santike aanetvaa vaccamaggena a"ngajaata.m abhinisiidenti. so ce pavesana.m na saadiyati, pavi.t.tha.m saadiyati, .thita.m saadiyati, uddhara.na.m saadiyati, aapatti paaraajikassa. bhikkhupaccatthikaa manussitthi.m bhikkhussa santike ^a^M0.0036^ea^ aanetvaa vaccamaggena a"ngajaata.m abhinisiidenti. so ce pavesana.m na saadiyati, pavi.t.tha.m na saadiyati, .thita.m saadiyati, uddhara.na.m saadiyati, aapatti paaraajikassa. bhikkhupaccatthikaa manussitthi.m bhikkhussa santike aanetvaa vaccamaggena a"ngajaata.m abhinisiidenti. so ce pavesana.m na saadiyati, pavi.t.tha.m na saadiyati, .thita.m na saadiyati, uddhara.na.m saadiyati aapatti paaraajikassa. bhikkhupaccatthikaa manussitthi.m bhikkhussa santike aanetvaa vaccamaggena a"ngajaata.m abhinisiidenti. so ce pavesana.m na saadiyati, pavi.t.tha.m na saadiyati, .thita.m na saadiyati, uddhara.na.m na saadiyati, anaapatti.

[03]bhikkhupaccatthikaa manussitthi.m bhikkhussa santike aanetvaa passaavamaggena... mukhena a"ngajaata.m abhinisiidenti. so ce pavesana.m saadiyati, pavi.t.tha.m saadiyati, .thita.m saadiyati, uddhara.na.m saadiyati, aapatti paaraajikassa...pe0... na saadiyati, anaapatti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu saaratto lepacittassa nimitta.m a"ngajaatena chupi. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa. aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
