[03] 193^b^.^eb^ {ida.m vatthu paaci0 67} tena ^a^T1.0165^ea^ ^a^P3.0087^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa sandi.t.thaa sambhattaa bhikkhuu vaggumudaaya nadiyaa tiire vassa.m upagacchi.msu. tena kho pana samayena vajjii dubbhikkhaa hoti dviihitikaa seta.t.thikaa salaakaavuttaa, na sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``etarahi kho vajjii dubbhikkhaa dviihitikaa seta.t.thikaa salaakaavuttaa, na sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. kena nu kho maya.m upaayena samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vaseyyaama, na ca pi.n.dakena kilameyyaamaa''ti? ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``handa maya.m, aavuso, gihiina.m kammanta.m adhi.t.thema, eva.m te amhaaka.m daatu.m ma~n~nissanti. eva.m maya.m samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasissaama, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamissaamaa''ti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``ala.m, aavuso, ki.m gihiina.m ^a^M0.0113^ea^ kammanta.m adhi.t.thitena! handa maya.m ^a^T1.0166^ea^, aavuso, gihiina.m duuteyya.m haraama, eva.m te amhaaka.m daatu.m ma~n~nissanti. eva.m maya.m samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasissaama, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamissaamaa''ti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``ala.m, aavuso, ki.m gihiina.m kammanta.m adhi.t.thitena! ki.m gihiina.m duuteyya.m ha.tena! handa maya.m, aavuso, gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasissaama -- `asuko bhikkhu pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhii, asuko bhikkhu dutiyassa jhaanassa laabhii, asuko bhikkhu tatiyassa jhaanassa laabhii, asuko bhikkhu catutthassa jhaanassa laabhii, asuko bhikkhu sotaapanno, asuko bhikkhu sakadaagaamii, asuko bhikkhu anaagaamii, asuko bhikkhu arahaa, asuko bhikkhu tevijjo, asuko bhikkhu cha.labhi~n~no'ti. eva.m te amhaaka.m daatu.m ma~n~nissanti. eva.m maya.m samaggaa sammodamaanaa ^a^P3.0088^ea^ avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasissaama, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamissaamaa''ti. ``esoyeva kho, aavuso, seyyo yo amhaaka.m gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.no bhaasito''ti.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ ^a^V0.0108^ea^ atha kho te bhikkhuu gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasi.msu -- ``asuko bhikkhu pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhii...pe0... asuko bhikkhu cha.labhi~n~no''ti. atha kho te manussaa -- ``laabhaa vata no, suladdha.m vata no, yesa.m vata no evaruupaa bhikkhuu vassa.m upagataa; na vata no ito pubbe evaruupaa bhikkhuu vassa.m upagataa yathayime bhikkhuu siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa''ti, te na taadisaani bhojanaani attanaa paribhu~njanti maataapituuna.m denti puttadaarassa denti daasakammakaraporisassa denti mittaamaccaana.m denti ~naatisaalohitaana.m denti, yaadisaani bhikkhuuna.m ^a^T1.0167^ea^ denti. te na taadisaani khaadaniiyaani saayaniiyaani paanaani attanaa khaadanti saayanti pivanti maataapituuna.m denti puttadaarassa denti daasakammakaraporisassa denti mittaamaccaana.m denti ~naatisaalohitaana.m denti, yaadisaani bhikkhuuna.m denti. atha kho te bhikkhuu va.n.navaa ahesu.m pii.nindriyaa pasannamukhava.n.naa vippasannachaviva.n.naa.

[03]aaci.n.na.m kho paneta.m vassa.mvu.t.thaana.m bhikkhuuna.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu vassa.mvu.t.thaa temaasaccayena senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivara.m aadaaya yena vesaalii tena pakkami.msu. anupubbena yena vesaalii mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0114^ea^ kho pana samayena disaasu vassa.mvu.t.thaa bhikkhuu kisaa honti luukhaa dubba.n.naa uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa dhamanisanthatagattaa; vaggumudaatiiriyaa pana bhikkhuu va.n.navaa honti pii.nindriyaa pasannamukhava.n.naa ^a^T1.0168^ea^ vippasannachaviva.n.naa. aaci.n.na.m kho paneta.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammoditu.m. atha kho bhagavaa vaggumudaatiiriye bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kacci, bhikkhave, khamaniiya.m kacci yaapaniiya.m kacci samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasittha na ca pi.n.dakena kilamitthaa''ti? ``khamaniiya.m, bhagavaa, yaapaniiya.m, bhagavaa. samaggaa ca maya.m, bhante, sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasimhaa, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamimhaa''ti. jaanantaapi tathaagataa pucchanti, jaanantaapi ^a^P3.0089^ea^ na pucchanti...pe0... dviihaakaarehi buddhaa bhagavanto bhikkhuu pa.tipucchanti -- dhamma.m vaa desessaama, saavakaana.m vaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~naapessaamaati. atha kho bhagavaa vaggumudaatiiriye bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``yathaa katha.m pana tumhe, bhikkhave, samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasittha na ca pi.n.dakena kilamitthaa''ti? atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^V0.0109^ea^ -- ``kacci pana vo, bhikkhave, bhuuta''nti? ``abhuuta.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisaa, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, udarassa kaara.naa gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasissatha! vara.m tumhehi, moghapurisaa, ti.nhena govikantanena ^a^T1.0169^ea^ {govikattanena (sii0 ka0)} kucchi.m parikanto, na tveva udarassa kaara.naa gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.no bhaasito! ta.m kissa hetu? tato nidaana~nhi, moghapurisaa, mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m, na tveva tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeya. ito nidaana~nca kho, moghapurisaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya. neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya''...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, mahaacoraa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa mahaacorassa eva.m hoti -- `kudaassu naamaaha.m satena vaa sahassena vaa parivuto gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu ^a^M0.0115^ea^ aahi.n.dissaami hananto ghaatento chindanto chedaapento pacanto paacento'ti! so aparena samayena satena vaa sahassena vaa parivuto gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu aahi.n.dati hananto ghaatento chindanto chedaapento pacanto paacento. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekaccassa paapabhikkhuno eva.m hoti -- `kudaassu naamaaha.m satena vaa sahassena vaa parivuto gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu caarika.m carissaami sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito gaha.t.thaana~nceva pabbajitaana~nca, laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana'nti ^a^T1.0170^ea^! so aparena samayena satena vaa sahassena vaa parivuto gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu caarika.m carati sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito ^a^P3.0090^ea^ gaha.t.thaana~nceva pabbajitaana~nca, laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo mahaacoro santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[21] tapodaa raajagahe yuddha.m, naagaanogaahanena ca.
[22] sobhito araha.m bhikkhu, pa~ncakappasata.m sareti..

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu adhimaanena a~n~na.m byaakaasi. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi -- ``bhagavataa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m. kacci nu kho aha.m paaraajika.m aapatti.m aapanno''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, adhimaanenaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu pa.nidhaaya ara~n~ne ^a^P3.0101^ea^ viharati -- ``eva.m ma.m jano sambhaavessatii''ti. ta.m jano sambhaavesi. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa. na ca, bhikkhave, pa.nidhaaya ara~n~ne vatthabba.m. yo vaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu pa.nidhaaya pi.n.daaya carati -- ``eva.m ma.m jano sambhaavessatii''ti. ta.m jano sambhaavesi. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa. na ca, bhikkhave, pa.nidhaaya pi.n.daaya caritabba.m. yo careyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^T1.0203^ea^ ^a^V0.0136^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``ye, aavuso, amhaaka.m upajjhaayassa saddhivihaarikaa sabbeva arahanto''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``ki.mcitto tva.m, bhikkhuu''ti? ``ullapanaadhippaayo ^a^M0.0140^ea^ aha.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa; aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``ye, aavuso, amhaaka.m upajjhaayassa antevaasikaa sabbeva mahiddhikaa mahaanubhaavaa''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``ki.mcitto tva.m, bhikkhuu''ti? ``ullapanaadhippaayo aha.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa; aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu pa.nidhaaya ca"nkamati... pa.nidhaaya ti.t.thati... pa.nidhaaya nisiidati... pa.nidhaaya seyya.m kappeti -- ``eva.m ma.m jano sambhaavessatii''ti. ta.m jano sambhaavesi. tassa ^a^T1.0204^ea^ kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa. na ca, bhikkhave, pa.nidhaaya seyyaa kappetabbaa. yo kappeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapati. sopi evamaaha -- ``mayhampi, aavuso, sa.myojanaa pahiinaa''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``aapatti.m tva.m, bhikkhu, aapanno paaraajika''nti.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu rahogato uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapati. paracittaviduu bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhu.m apasaadesi -- ``maa, aavuso, evaruupa.m abha.ni. nattheso tuyha''nti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa; aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro ^a^P3.0102^ea^ bhikkhu rahogato uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapati. devataa ta.m bhikkhu.m apasaadesi -- ``maa, bhante, evaruupa.m abha.ni. nattheso tuyha''nti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa; aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu a~n~natara.m upaasaka.m etadavoca -- ``yo, aavuso ^a^V0.0137^ea^, tuyha.m vihaare vasati so bhikkhu arahaa''ti ^a^T1.0205^ea^. so ca tassa vihaare vasati. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``ki.mcitto tva.m, bhikkhuu''ti? ``ullapanaadhippaayo aha.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa; aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0141^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu a~n~natara.m upaasaka.m etadavoca -- ``ya.m tva.m, aavuso, upa.t.thesi ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena so bhikkhu arahaa''ti. so ca ta.m upa.t.theti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``ki.mcitto tva.m, bhikkhuu''ti? ``ullapanaadhippaayo aha.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa; aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. ta.m bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``atthaayasmato uttarimanussadhammo''ti? ``naavuso, dukkara.m a~n~na.m byaakaatu''nti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi -- ``ye kho te bhagavato saavakaa te eva.m vadeyyu.m. aha~ncamhi na bhagavato saavako. kacci nu kho aha.m paaraajika.m aapatti.m aapanno''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. ``ki.mcitto tva.m, bhikkhuu''ti? ``anullapanaadhippaayo aha.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti ^a^T1.0206^ea^.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. ta.m bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``atthaayasmato uttarimanussadhammo''ti? ``aaraadhaniiyo kho, aavuso, dhammo aaraddhaviiriyenaa''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. ta.m bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``maa kho, aavuso, bhaayii''ti. naaha.m, aavuso, maccuno bhaayaamii''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. ta.m bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``maa kho, aavuso, bhaayii''ti. ``yo nuunaavuso, vippa.tisaarii assa so bhaayeyyaa''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0138^ea^ kho pana samayena ^a^P3.0103^ea^ a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. ta.m bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``atthaayasmato uttarimanussadhammo''ti? ``aaraadhaniiyo kho, aavuso, dhammo sammaapayuttenaa''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0142^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu ^a^T1.0207^ea^ gilaano hoti. ta.m bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``atthaayasmato uttarimanussadhammo''ti? ``aaraadhaniiyo kho, aavuso, dhammo aaraddhaviiriyenaa''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. ta.m bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``atthaayasmato uttarimanussadhammo''ti? ``aaraadhaniiyo kho, aavuso, dhammo yuttayogenaa''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. ta.m bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``kaccaavuso, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya''nti? ``naavuso, sakkaa yena vaa tena vaa adhivaasetu''nti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. ta.m bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``kaccaavuso khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya''nti? ``naavuso, sakkaa puthujjanena adhivaasetu''nti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``ki.mcitto tva.m, bhikkhuu''ti? ``ullapanaadhippaayo aha.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, paaraajikassa; aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro braahma.no bhikkhuu nimantetvaa etadavoca -- ``aayantu, bhonto arahanto''ti. tesa.m kukkucca.m ahosi -- ``maya~ncamha na arahanto {anarahanto (sii0)}. aya~nca braahma.no amhe ^a^T1.0208^ea^ arahantavaadena samudaacarati. katha.m nu kho amhehi pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anaapatti, bhikkhave, pasaadabha~n~ne''ti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0139^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro braahma.no bhikkhuu nimantetvaa etadavoca -- ``nisiidantu, bhonto arahanto''ti... ``bhu~njantu, bhonto arahanto''ti... ``tappentu, bhonto arahanto''ti... ``gacchantu, bhonto arahanto''ti. tesa.m kukkucca.m ahosi -- ``maya~ncamha na arahanto ^a^M0.0143^ea^. aya~nca braahma.no amhe arahantavaadena samudaacarati. katha.m nu kho amhehi pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anaapatti, bhikkhave, pasaadabha~n~ne''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapati. sopi evamaaha -- ``mayhampi, aavuso, aasavaa pahiinaa''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``aapatti.m tva.m, bhikkhu, aapanno paaraajika''nti.

[03]tena kho ^a^P3.0104^ea^ pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapati. sopi evamaaha -- ``mayhampi, aavuso, ete dhammaa sa.mvijjantii''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``aapatti.m tva.m, bhikkhu, aapanno paaraajika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapati. sopi evamaaha -- ``ahampaavuso, tesu dhammesu sandissaamii''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``aapatti.m tva.m ^a^T1.0209^ea^, bhikkhu, aapanno paaraajika''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m ~naatakaa etadavocu.m -- ``ehi, bhante, agaara.m ajjhaavasaa''ti. ``abhabbo kho, aavuso, maadiso agaara.m ajjhaavasitu''nti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m ~naatakaa etadavocu.m -- ``ehi, bhante, kaame paribhu~njaa''ti. ``aava.taa me, aavuso, kaamaa''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m ~naatakaa etadavocu.m -- ``abhiramasi, bhante''ti? ``abhirato aha.m, aavuso, paramaaya abhiratiyaa''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi. ``ye kho te bhagavato saavakaa te eva.m vadeyyu.m! aha~ncamhi na bhagavato saavako. kacci ^a^V0.0140^ea^ nu kho aha.m paaraajika.m aapatti.m aapanno''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. ``ki.mcitto tva.m, bhikkhuu''ti? ``anullapanaadhippaayo aha.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, anullapanaadhippaayassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0144^ea^ kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu katika.m katvaa a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase vassa.m upagacchi.msu -- ``yo imamhaa aavaasaa pa.thama.m pakkamissati ta.m maya.m arahaati jaanissaamaa''ti. a~n~nataro bhikkhu ^a^T1.0210^ea^ -- ``ma.m arahaati jaanantuu''ti, tamhaa aavaasaa pa.thama.m pakkaami. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``aapatti.m tva.m, bhikkhu, aapanno paaraajika''nti.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ {imaani vatthuni sa.m0 ni0 2.202 aagataani} tena samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca lakkha.no aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano gijjhakuu.te pabbate viharanti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivara.m aadaaya yenaayasmaa lakkha.no tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m lakkha.na.m etadavoca -- ``aayaamaavuso lakkha.na, raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya pavisissaamaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa lakkha.no aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa ^a^P3.0105^ea^ orohanto a~n~natarasmi.m padese sita.m paatvaakaasi. atha kho aayasmaa lakkha.no aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, aavuso moggallaana, hetu ko paccayo sitassa paatukammaayaa''ti? ``akaalo kho, aavuso lakkha.na, etassa pa~nhassa {pa~nhassa byaakara.naaya (syaa0)}. bhagavato ma.m santike eta.m pa~nha.m pucchaati. atha kho aayasmaa ca lakkha.no aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano ^a^T1.0211^ea^ raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa lakkha.no aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``idhaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto a~n~natarasmi.m padese sita.m paatvaakaasi. ko nu kho, aavuso moggallaana, hetu ko paccayo sitassa paatukammaayaa''ti? ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa phaasu.lantarikaahi vitu.denti {vitudenti vitacchenti viraajenti (syaa0)}. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho, evaruupopi naama satto bhavissati! evaruupopi ^a^V0.0141^ea^ naama ^a^M0.0145^ea^ yakkho bhavissati! evaruupopi naama attabhaavappa.tilaabho bhavissatii'''ti! bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``uttarimanussadhamma.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ullapatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi ^a^T1.0212^ea^ -- ``cakkhubhuutaa vata, bhikkhave, saavakaa viharanti. ~naa.nabhuutaa vata, bhikkhave, saavakaa viharanti. yatra hi naama saavako evaruupa.m ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa sakkhi.m vaa karissati. pubbeva me so, bhikkhave, satto di.t.tho ahosi. api caaha.m na byaakaasi.m. aha~nceta.m byaakareyya.m pare ca me na saddaheyyu.m. ye me na saddaheyyu.m tesa.m ta.m assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe goghaatako ahosi. so tassa kammassa vipaakena bahuuni vassaani bahuuni vassasataani bahuuni vassasahassaani bahuuni vassasatasahassaani niraye paccitvaa tasseva kammassa vipaakaavasesena evaruupa.m attabhaavappa.tilaabha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. sacca.m, bhikkhave, moggallaano aaha. anaapatti, bhikkhave, moggallaanassaa''ti.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m ma.msapesi.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti vibhajjenti {vitudenti vitacchenti viraajenti (syaa0)}. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m ^a^P3.0106^ea^ karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe goghaatako ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m ma.msapi.n.da.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti vibhajjenti. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe saaku.niko ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m nicchavi.m purisa.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti vibhajjenti. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... ^a^M0.0146^ea^ eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe orabbhiko ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m asiloma.m purisa.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m ^a^V0.0142^ea^. tassa te asii uppatitvaa uppatitvaa tasseva kaaye nipatanti. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe suukariko ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m sattiloma.m purisa.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tassa taa sattiyo uppatitvaa uppatitvaa tasseva kaaye nipatanti. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe maagaviko ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m usuloma.m purisa.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tassa te usuu uppatitvaa uppatitvaa tasseva kaaye nipatanti. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe kaara.niko ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m suuciloma.m purisa.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tassa taa suuciyo uppatitvaa uppatitvaa tasseva ^a^T1.0214^ea^ kaaye nipatanti. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe saarathiko ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m suuciloma.m purisa.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tassa taa suuciyo siise pavisitvaa mukhato nikkhamanti; mukhe pavisitvaa urato nikkhamanti; ure pavisitvaa udarato nikkhamanti; udare pavisitvaa uuruuhi nikkhamanti; uuruusu pavisitvaa ja"nghaahi nikkhamanti; ja"nghaasu pavisitvaa paadehi nikkhamanti. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe suucako ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m kumbha.n.da.m purisa.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. so gacchantopi teva a.n.de khandhe aaropetvaa gacchati, nisiidantopi tesveva a.n.desu nisiidati. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi ^a^M0.0147^ea^ kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti vibhajjenti. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe gaamakuu.to ahosi...pe0....
[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m purisa.m guuthakuupe sasiisaka.m nimugga.m...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe paaradaariko ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m ^a^V0.0143^ea^, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m ^a^P3.0107^ea^ purisa.m guuthakuupe sasiisaka.m nimugga.m ubhohi hatthehi guutha.m khaadanta.m...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe du.t.thabraahma.no ^a^T1.0215^ea^ ahosi. so kassapassa sammaasambuddhassa paavacane bhikkhusa"ngha.m bhattena nimantetvaa do.niyo {do.niyo (itipi)} guuthassa puuraapetvaa kaala.m aarocaapetvaa etadavoca -- `ato {ito (syaa0) aho (itipi)}, bhonto, yaavadattha.m bhu~njantu ceva harantu caa'''ti...pe0....

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m nicchavi.m itthi.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti vibhajjenti. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... esaa, bhikkhave, itthii imasmi.myeva raajagahe aticaarinii ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m itthi.m duggandha.m ma"nguli.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti vibhajjenti. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... esaa, bhikkhave, itthii imasmi.myeva raajagahe ikkha.nikaa ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m itthi.m uppakka.m okilini.m okirini.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... esaa, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0216^ea^, itthii kaali"ngassa ra~n~no aggamahesii ahosi. saa issaapakataa sapatti.m a"ngaaraka.taahena okiri...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m asiisaka.m kabandha.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tassa ure akkhiini ceva honti mukha~nca. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti vibhajjenti. so ^a^M0.0148^ea^ suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe haariko naama coraghaatako ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m ^a^V0.0144^ea^, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m bhikkhu.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tassa sa"nghaa.tipi aadittaa sampajjalitaa sajotibhuutaa, pattopi aaditto sampajjalito sajotibhuuto, kaayabandhanampi aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m, kaayopi aaditto sampajjalito sajotibhuuto. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kassapassa sammaasambuddhassa paavacane paapabhikkhu ahosi...pe0....

[03]``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m bhikkhuni.m... addasa.m sikkhamaana.m... addasa.m saama.nera.m... addasa.m saama.neri.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tassaa sa"nghaa.tipi aadittaa sampajjalitaa sajotibhuutaa, pattopi aaditto sampajjalito sajotibhuuto, kaayabandhanampi aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m, kaayopi aaditto ^a^T1.0217^ea^ sampajjalito sajotibhuuto. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho, evaruupopi naama satto bhavissati! evaruupopi naama yakkho bhavissati! evaruupopi naama attabhaavappa.tilaabho bhavissatii'''ti! bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``uttarimanussadhamma.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ullapatii''ti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``cakkhubhuutaa vata, bhikkhave, saavakaa viharanti. ~naa.nabhuutaa vata ^a^P3.0108^ea^, bhikkhave, saavakaa viharanti. yatra hi naama saavako evaruupa.m ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa sakkhi.m vaa karissati! pubbeva me saa, bhikkhave, saama.nerii di.t.thaa ahosi. api caaha.m na byaakaasi.m. aha~nceta.m byaakareyya.m pare ca me na saddaheyyu.m. ye me na saddaheyyu.m tesa.m ta.m assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. esaa, bhikkhave, saama.nerii kassapassa sammaasambuddhassa paavacane paapasaama.nerii ahosi. saa tassa kammassa vipaakena bahuuni vassaani bahuuni vassasataani bahuuni vassasahassaani bahuuni vassasatasahassaani niraye paccitvaa tasseva kammassa vipaakaavasesena evaruupa.m attabhaavappa.tilaabha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. sacca.m, bhikkhave, moggallaano aaha. anaapatti, bhikkhave, moggallaanassaa''ti.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M0.0149^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yataaya.m, aavuso, tapodaa sandati so daho acchodako siitodako saatodako setako suppatittho rama.niiyo pahuutamacchakacchapo cakkamattaani ca padumaani pupphantii''ti. bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano eva.m vakkhati -- `yataaya.m, aavuso ^a^V0.0145^ea^, tapodaa sandati so daho acchodako siitodako saatodako setako suppatittho rama.niiyo pahuutamacchakacchapo cakkamattaani ^a^T1.0218^ea^ ca padumaani pupphantii'ti. atha ca panaaya.m tapodaa kuthitaa sandati. uttarimanussadhamma.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ullapatii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``yataaya.m, bhikkhave, tapodaa sandati so daho acchodako siitodako saatodako setako suppatittho rama.niiyo pahuutamacchakacchapo cakkamattaani ca padumaani pupphanti. api caaya.m, bhikkhave, tapodaa dvinna.m mahaanirayaana.m antarikaaya aagacchati. tenaaya.m tapodaa kuthitaa sandati. sacca.m, bhikkhave, moggallaano aaha. anaapatti, bhikkhave, moggallaanassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro licchaviihi saddhi.m sa"ngaamento pabhaggo ahosi. atha raajaa pacchaa sena.m sa"nka.d.dhitvaa licchavayo paraajesi. sa"ngaame ca nandi carati -- ``ra~n~naa licchavii pabhaggaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``raajaa, aavuso, licchaviihi pabhaggo''ti. bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano eva.m vakkhati -- `raajaa ^a^T1.0219^ea^, aavuso, licchaviihi pabhaggo'ti! sa"ngaame ca nandi.m carati -- `ra~n~naa licchavii pabhaggaa'ti! uttarimanussadhamma.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ullapatii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``pa.thama.m, bhikkhave, raajaa licchaviihi pabhaggo. atha ^a^P3.0109^ea^ raajaa pacchaa sena.m sa"nka.d.dhitvaa licchavayo paraajesi. sacca.m, bhikkhave, moggallaano aaha. anaapatti, bhikkhave, moggallaanassaa''ti.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, sappinikaaya nadiyaa tiire aane~nja.m samaadhi.m samaapanno naagaana.m ogayha uttarantaana.m ko~nca.m karontaana.m sadda.m assosi''nti. bhikkhuu ^a^M0.0150^ea^ ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano aane~nja.m samaadhi.m samaapanno sadda.m sossati! uttarimanussadhamma.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ullapatii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``attheso, bhikkhave, samaadhi so ca kho aparisuddho. sacca.m, bhikkhave, moggallaano aaha. anaapatti, bhikkhave, moggallaanassaa''ti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa sobhito bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aha.m, aavuso, pa~nca kappasataani ^a^V0.0146^ea^ anussaraamii''ti. bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa sobhito eva.m vakkhati -- `aha.m, aavuso ^a^T1.0220^ea^, pa~nca kappasataani anussaraamii'ti! uttarimanussadhamma.m aayasmaa sobhito ullapatii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``atthesaa, bhikkhave, sobhitassa. saa ca kho ekaayeva jaati. sacca.m, bhikkhave, sobhito aaha. anaapatti, bhikkhave, sobhitassaati.
[06] catutthapaaraajika.m samatta.m.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ uddi.t.thaa kho aayasmanto cattaaro paaraajikaa dhammaa, yesa.m bhikkhu a~n~natara.m vaa a~n~natara.m vaa aapajjitvaa na labhati bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sa.mvaasa.m, yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, paaraajiko hoti asa.mvaaso. tatthaayasmante pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? dutiyampi pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? tatiyampi pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? parisuddhetthaayasmanto, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamiiti.
[06] paaraajika.m ni.t.thita.m.
[06] tassuddaana.m --
[21] methunaadinnaadaana~nca, manussaviggahuttari.
[22] paaraajikaani cattaari, chejjavatthuu asa.msayaati..
[06] paaraajikaka.n.da.m ni.t.thita.m.
[06] ime ^a^T1.0221^ea^ kho panaayasmanto terasa sa"nghaadisesaa
[06] dhammaa uddesa.m aagacchanti.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P3.0110^ea^ ^a^M0.0151^ea^ ^a^V0.0147^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa seyyasako anabhirato brahmacariya.m carati. so tena kiso hoti luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto. addasa kho aayasmaa udaayii aayasmanta.m seyyasaka.m kisa.m luukha.m dubba.n.na.m uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaata.m dhamanisanthatagatta.m. disvaana aayasmanta.m seyyasaka.m etadavoca -- ``kissa tva.m, aavuso seyyasaka, kiso luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto? kacci no tva.m, aavuso seyyasaka, anabhirato brahmacariya.m carasii''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``tena hi tva.m, aavuso seyyasaka, yaavadattha.m bhu~nja yaavadattha.m supa yaavadattha.m nhaaya. yaavadattha.m bhu~njitvaa yaavadattha.m supitvaa yaavadattha.m nhaayitvaa yadaa te anabhirati uppajjati raago citta.m anuddha.mseti tadaa hatthena upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocehii''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso, kappati evaruupa.m kaatu''nti? ``aama, aavuso. ahampi eva.m karomii''ti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa seyyasako yaavadattha.m bhu~nji yaavadattha.m supi yaavadattha.m nhaayi. yaavadattha.m bhu~njitvaa yaavadattha.m supitvaa yaavadattha.m nhaayitvaa yadaa anabhirati uppajjati raago citta.m ^a^V0.0148^ea^ anuddha.mseti tadaa hatthena upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocesi ^a^T1.0222^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa seyyasako aparena samayena va.n.navaa ahosi pii.nindriyo pasannamukhava.n.no vippasannachaviva.n.no. atha kho aayasmato seyyasakassa sahaayakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m seyyasaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``pubbe kho tva.m, aavuso seyyasaka, kiso ahosi luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto. so daani tva.m etarahi va.n.navaa pii.nindriyo pasannamukhava.n.no ^a^P3.0111^ea^ vippasannachaviva.n.no. ki.m nu kho tva.m, aavuso seyyasaka, bhesajja.m karosii''ti? ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, bhesajja.m karomi ^a^M0.0152^ea^. apicaaha.m yaavadattha.m bhu~njaami yaavadattha.m supaami yaavadattha.m nhaayaami. yaavadattha.m bhu~njitvaa yaavadattha.m supitvaa yaavadattha.m nhaayitvaa yadaa me anabhirati uppajjati raago citta.m anuddha.mseti tadaa hatthena upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocemii''ti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, aavuso seyyasaka, yeneva hatthena saddhaadeyya.m bhu~njasi teneva hatthena upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocesii''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocessatii''ti!

[03]atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m seyyasaka.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa aayasmanta.m seyyasaka.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, seyyasaka, hatthena upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocesii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti ^a^T1.0223^ea^. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisa, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, hatthena upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocessasi! nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena viraagaaya dhammo desito no saraagaaya, visa~n~nogaaya dhammo desito no sa~n~nogaaya, anupaadaanaaya dhammo desito no saupaadaanaaya! tattha naama tva.m, moghapurisa, mayaa viraagaaya dhamme desite saraagaaya cetessasi, visa~n~nogaaya dhamme desite sa~n~nogaaya cetessasi, anupaadaanaaya dhamme desite saupaadaanaaya cetessasi! nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena raagaviraagaaya dhammo desito, madanimmadanaaya pipaasavinayaaya aalayasamugghaataaya va.t.tupacchedaaya ta.nhakkhayaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya nibbaanaaya dhammo desito? nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena kaamaana.m pahaana.m akkhaata.m, kaamasa~n~naana.m pari~n~naa akkhaataa, kaamapipaasaana.m pa.tivinayo akkhaato, kaamavitakkaana.m samugghaato akkhaato, kaamapari.laahaana.m vuupasamo akkhaato? neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m vaa bhiyyobhaavaaya. atha khveta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana~nceva appasaadaaya, pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathattaayaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m seyyasaka.m ^a^P3.0112^ea^ anekapariyaayena ^a^M0.0153^ea^ vigarahitvaa dubbharataaya...pe0... ``eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03]^b^``sa~ncetanikaa sukkavissa.t.thi^eb^ {visa.t.thi (sii0 syaa0)} ^b^sa"nghaadiseso''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0224^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu pa.niitabhojanaani bhu~njitvaa mu.t.thassatii asampajaanaa nidda.m okkamanti. tesa.m mu.t.thassatiina.m asampajaanaana.m nidda.m okkamantaana.m supinantena asuci muccati. tesa.m kukkucca.m ahosi -- ``bhagavataa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m -- `sa~ncetanikaa sukkavissa.t.thi sa"nghaadiseso'ti. amhaaka~nca supinantena asuci muccati. atthi cettha cetanaa labbhati. kacci nu kho maya.m sa"nghaadisesa.m aapatti.m aapannaa''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``atthesaa, bhikkhave, cetanaa; saa ca kho abbohaarikaati. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0251^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa udaayii ara~n~ne viharati. tassaayasmato vihaaro abhiruupo hoti dassaniiyo paasaadiko, majjhegabbho, samantaapariyaagaaro, supa~n~natta.m ma~ncapii.tha.m bhisibimbohana.m, paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m supa.t.thita.m, parive.na.m susamma.t.tha.m. bahuu manussaa aayasmato udaayissa vihaarapekkhakaa aagacchanti. a~n~nataropi braahma.no sapajaapatiko yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``icchaama maya.m bhoto udaayissa ^a^V0.0172^ea^ vihaara.m pekkhitu''nti. ``tena hi, braahma.na, pekkhassuu''ti, avaapura.na.m {apaapura.na.m (syaa0)} aadaaya gha.tika.m ugghaa.tetvaa kavaa.ta.m pa.naametvaa vihaara.m paavisi. sopi kho braahma.no aayasmato udaayissa pi.t.thito paavisi. saapi kho braahma.nii tassa braahma.nassa pi.t.thito paavisi. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii ekacce vaatapaane vivaranto ekacce vaatapaane thakento gabbha.m anuparigantvaa pi.t.thito aagantvaa tassaa braahma.niyaa a"ngama"ngaani paraamasi. atha kho so braahma.no aayasmataa udaayinaa saddhi.m pa.tisammoditvaa agamaasi. atha kho so braahma.no attamano attamanavaaca.m nicchaaresi -- ``u.laaraa ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa ye ime ^a^T1.0252^ea^ evaruupe ara~n~ne viharanti. bhavampi udaayii u.laaro yo evaruupe ara~n~ne viharatii''ti.

[03]eva.m vutte saa braahma.nii ta.m braahma.na.m etadavoca ^a^P3.0120^ea^ -- ``kuto tassa u.laarattataa! yatheva me tva.m a"ngama"ngaani paraamasi evameva me sama.no udaayii a"ngama"ngaani paraamasii''ti. atha kho so braahma.no ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``alajjino ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dussiilaa musaavaadino. ime hi naama dhammacaarino samacaarino brahmacaarino saccavaadino ^a^M0.0173^ea^ siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa pa.tijaanissanti! natthi imesa.m saama~n~na.m natthi imesa.m brahma~n~na.m, na.t.tha.m imesa.m saama~n~na.m na.t.tha.m imesa.m brahma~n~na.m, kuto imesa.m saama~n~na.m kuto imesa.m brahma~n~na.m, apagataa ime saama~n~naa apagataa ime brahma~n~naa. katha~nhi naama sama.no udaayii mama bhariyaaya a"ngama"ngaani paraamasissati! na hi sakkaa kulitthiihi kuladhiitaahi kulakumaariihi kulasu.nhaahi kuladaasiihi aaraama.m vaa vihaara.m vaa gantu.m. sace {sace hi (syaa0)} kulitthiyo kuladhiitaro {kuladhiitaayo (sii0 syaa0)} kulakumaariyo kulasu.nhaayo kuladaasiyo aaraama.m vaa vihaara.m vaa gaccheyyu.m, taapi sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa duuseyyu''nti!

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0193^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa itthii navaratta.m kambala.m paarutaa hoti. a~n~nataro bhikkhu saaratto ta.m itthi.m etadavoca -- ``lohita.m kho te, bhaginii''ti. saa na pa.tivijaani. ``aamaayya, navaratto kambalo''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi ``bhagavataa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m, kacci nu kho aha.m sa"nghaadisesa.m aapatti.m aapanno''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, sa"nghaadisesassa; aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa itthii kharakambala.m paarutaa hoti. a~n~nataro bhikkhu saaratto ta.m itthi.m etadavoca -- ``kakkasaloma.m kho te, bhaginii''ti. saa na pa.tivijaani. ``aamaayya, kharakambalako''ti. tassa kukkucca.m ^a^M0.0191^ea^ ahosi...pe0... ``anaapatti, bhikkhu, sa"nghaadisesassa; aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0286^ea^ ^a^V0.0195^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa udaayii saavatthiya.m kuluupako hoti, bahukaani kulaani upasa"nkamati. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa itthii matapatikaa abhiruupaa hoti dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena tassaa itthiyaa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P3.0132^ea^ pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho saa itthii yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m itthi.m aayasmaa udaayii dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho saa itthii aayasmataa udaayinaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``vadeyyaatha, bhante, yena attho. pa.tibalaa maya.m ayyassa daatu.m yadida.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara''nti.

[03]``na ^a^M0.0193^ea^ kho te, bhagini, amhaaka.m dullabhaa yadida.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa. apica, yo amhaaka.m dullabho ta.m dehii''ti. ``ki.m, bhante''ti? ``methunadhamma''nti. ``attho ^a^T1.0287^ea^, bhante''ti? ``attho, bhaginii''ti. ``ehi, bhante''ti, ovaraka.m pavisitvaa saa.taka.m nikkhipitvaa ma~ncake uttaanaa nipajji. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii yena saa itthii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa -- ``ko ima.m vasala.m duggandha.m aamasissatii''ti, ni.t.thuhitvaa pakkaami. atha kho saa itthii ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``alajjino ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dussiilaa musaavaadino. ime hi naama dhammacaarino samacaarino brahmacaarino saccavaadino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa pa.tijaanissanti! natthi imesa.m saama~n~na.m natthi imesa.m brahma~n~na.m, na.t.tha.m imesa.m saama~n~na.m na.t.tha.m imesa.m brahma~n~na.m, kuto imesa.m saama~n~na.m kuto imesa.m brahma~n~na.m, apagataa ime saama~n~naa apagataa ime brahma~n~naa. katha~nhi naama sama.no udaayii ma.m saama.m methunadhamma.m yaacitvaa, `ko ima.m vasala.m duggandha.m aamasissatii''ti ni.t.thuhitvaa pakkamissati! ki.m me paapaka.m ki.m me duggandha.m, kassaaha.m kena haayaamii''ti? a~n~naapi itthiyo ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``alajjino ime sama.naa ^a^V0.0196^ea^ sakyaputtiyaa dussiilaa musaavaadino...pe0... katha~nhi naama sama.no udaayii imissaa saama.m methunadhamma.m ^a^T1.0288^ea^ yaacitvaa, `ko ima.m vasala.m duggandha.m aamasissatii'ti ni.t.thuhitvaa pakkamissati! ki.m imissaa paapaka.m ki.m imissaa duggandha.m, kassaaya.m kena haayatii''ti? assosu.m kho bhikkhuu taasa.m itthiina.m ujjhaayantiina.m khiyyantiina.m vipaacentiina.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa udaayii maatugaamassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasissatii''ti!

[03]atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m udaayi.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa ^a^P3.0133^ea^ aayasmanta.m udaayi.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, udaayi, maatugaamassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasasii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisa, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, maatugaamassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasissasi! nanu mayaa ^a^M0.0194^ea^, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena viraagaaya dhammo desito no saraagaaya...pe0... kaamapari.laahaana.m vuupasamo akkhaato? neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa itthii kuluupaka.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kathaaha.m, bhante, subhagaa assa''nti? ``tena hi ^a^T1.0294^ea^, bhagini, aggadaana.m dehii''ti. ``ki.m, bhante, aggadaana''nti? ``methunadhamma''nti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``aapatti.m tva.m, bhikkhu, aapanno sa"nghaadisesa''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa itthii kuluupaka.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kenaaha.m, bhante, ayya.m upa.t.themii''ti? ``aggadaanena, bhaginii''ti. ``ki.m, bhante, aggadaana''nti? ``methunadhamma''nti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``aapatti.m tva.m, bhikkhu, aapanno sa"nghaadisesa''nti.
[06] tena ^a^M0.0197^ea^ ^a^V0.0200^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa itthii kuluupaka.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kathaaha.m,

[03] bhante, sugati.m gaccheyya''nti? ``tena hi, bhagini, aggadaana.m dehii''ti. ``ki.m, bhante, aggadaana''nti? ``methunadhamma''nti. tassa kukkucca.m ahosi...pe0... ``aapatti.m tva.m, bhikkhu, aapanno sa"nghaadisesa''nti.
[06] attakaamapaaricariyasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0295^ea^ ^a^P3.0135^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa udaayii saavatthiya.m kuluupako hoti. bahukaani kulaani upasa"nkamati. yattha passati kumaaraka.m vaa apajaapatika.m, kumaarika.m vaa apatika.m, kumaarakassa maataapituuna.m santike kumaarikaaya va.n.na.m bha.nati -- ``amukassa kulassa kumaarikaa abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa pa.n.ditaa byattaa medhaavinii dakkhaa analasaa. channaa saa kumaarikaa imassa kumaarakassaa''ti. te eva.m vadanti -- ``ete kho, bhante, amhe na jaananti -- `ke vaa ime kassa vaa'ti. sace, bhante, ayyo daapeyya aaneyyaama maya.m ta.m kumaarika.m imassa kumaarakassaa''ti. kumaarikaaya maataapituuna.m santike kumaarakassa va.n.na.m bha.nati -- ``amukassa kulassa kumaarako abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii dakkho analaso. channaaya.m kumaarikaa tassa kumaarakassaa''ti {channo so kumaarako imissaa kumaarikaayaati (syaa0)}. te eva.m vadanti -- ``ete kho, bhante, amhe na jaananti -- `ke vaa ime kassa vaa'ti, kismi.m viya kumaarikaaya vattu.m. sace, bhante, ayyo yaacaapeyya dajjeyyaama maya.m ima.m kumaarika.m tassa kumaarakassaa''ti. eteneva upaayena aavaahaanipi kaaraapeti ^a^T1.0296^ea^, vivaahaanipi kaaraapeti, vaareyyaanipi kaaraapeti.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarissaa puraa.naga.nakiyaa dhiitaa abhiruupaa hoti dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa. tirogaamakaa aajiivakasaavakaa aagantvaa ta.m ga.naki.m etadavocu.m -- ``dehaayye, ima.m kumaarika.m amhaaka.m kumaarakassaa''ti. saa evamaaha -- ``aha.m khvayyo {khvayyaa (syaa0), khvaayyo (ka0)} tumhe ^a^M0.0198^ea^ na jaanaami -- `ke vaa ime kassa vaa'ti. aya~nca me ekadhiitikaa, tirogaamo ca gantabbo, naaha.m dassaamii''ti. manussaa te aajiivakasaavake etadavocu.m -- ``kissa tumhe, ayyo ^a^V0.0201^ea^, aagatatthaa''ti? ``idha maya.m, ayyo, amuka.m naama ga.naki.m dhiitara.m yaacimhaa amhaaka.m kumaarakassa. saa evamaaha -- `aha.m, khvayyo tumhe na jaanaami -- ke vaa ime kassa vaa'ti. aya~nca me ekadhiitikaa, tirogaamo ca gantabbo, naaha.m dassaamii''ti. ``kissa tumhe, ayyo, ta.m ga.naki.m dhiitara.m yaacittha? nanu ayyo udaayii vattabbo. ayyo udaayii daapessatii''ti.

[03]atha kho te aajiivakasaavakaa ^a^P3.0136^ea^ yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha maya.m, bhante, amuka.m naama ga.naki.m dhiitara.m yaacimhaa amhaaka.m kumaarakassa. saa evamaaha -- `aha.m khvayyo tumhe na jaanaami -- ke vaa ime kassa vaati. aya~nca me ekadhiitikaa, tirogaamo ca gantabbo, naaha.m dassaamii'ti. saadhu, bhante, ayyo ta.m ga.naki.m dhiitara.m daapetu amhaaka.m kumaarakassaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii yena saa ga.nakii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m ga.naki.m etadavoca -- ``kissimesa.m dhiitara.m na ^a^T1.0297^ea^ desii''ti? ``aha.m khvayya, ime na jaanaami -- `ke vaa ime kassa vaa'ti. aya~nca me ekadhiitikaa, tirogaamo ca gantabbo, naaha.m dassaamii''ti. ``dehimesa.m. aha.m ime jaanaamii''ti. ``sace, bhante, ayyo jaanaati, dassaamii''ti. atha kho saa ga.nakii tesa.m aajiivakasaavakaana.m dhiitara.m adaasi. atha kho te aajiivakasaavakaa ta.m kumaarika.m netvaa maasa.myeva su.nisabhogena bhu~nji.msu. tato aparena daasibhogena bhu~njanti.

[03]atha kho saa kumaarikaa maatuyaa santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``ahamhi duggataa dukkhitaa, na sukha.m labhaami. maasa.myeva ma.m su.nisabhogena bhu~nji.msu. tato aparena daasibhogena bhu~njanti. aagacchatu me maataa, ma.m nessatuu''ti. atha kho saa ga.nakii yena te aajiivakasaavakaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te aajiivakasaavake etadavoca -- ``maayyo, ima.m kumaarika.m daasibhogena bhu~njittha. su.nisabhogena ima.m kumaarika.m bhu~njathaa''ti. te evamaaha.msu -- ``natthamhaaka.m tayaa saddhi.m aahaaruupahaaro, sama.nena saddhi.m amhaaka.m aahaaruupahaaro ^a^M0.0199^ea^. gaccha tva.m. na maya.m ta.m jaanaamaa''ti. atha kho saa ga.nakii tehi aajiivakasaavakehi apasaaditaa punadeva saavatthi.m paccaaga~nchi. dutiyampi kho saa kumaarikaa maatuyaa santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``ahamhi duggataa dukkhitaa, na sukha.m labhaami. maasa.myeva ma.m su.nisabhogena bhu~nji.msu. tato aparena daasibhogena bhu~njanti. aagacchatu me maataa, ma.m nessatuu''ti. atha kho saa ga.nakii yenaayasmaa ^a^T1.0298^ea^ udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m ^a^V0.0202^ea^ etadavoca -- ``saa kira, bhante, kumaarikaa duggataa dukkhitaa, na sukha.m labhati. maasa.myeva na.m su.nisabhogena bhu~nji.msu. tato aparena daasibhogena bhu~njanti. vadeyyaatha, bhante -- `maayyo, ima.m kumaarika.m daasibhogena bhu~njittha. su.nisabhogena ima.m kumaarika.m bhu~njithaa'''ti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa udaayii yena te aajiivakasaavakaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te aajiivakasaavake etadavoca -- ``maayyo, ima.m kumaarika.m daasibhogena bhujjittha. su.nisabhogena ima.m kumaarika.m bhu~njathaa''ti. te evamaaha.msu -- ``natthamhaaka.m tayaa saddhi.m aahaaruupahaaro, ga.nakiyaa saddhi.m amhaaka.m aahaaruupahaaro. sama.nena bhavitabba.m abyaava.tena. sama.no ^a^P3.0137^ea^ assa susama.no, gaccha tva.m, na maya.m ta.m jaanaamaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii tehi aajiivakasaavakehi apasaadito punadeva saavatthi.m paccaaga~nchi. tatiyampi kho saa kumaarikaa maatuyaa santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``ahamhi duggataa dukkhitaa, na sukha.m labhaami. maasa.myeva ma.m su.nisabhogena bhu~nji.msu. tato aparena daasibhogena bhu~njanti. aagacchatu me maataa, ma.m nessatuu''ti. dutiyampi kho saa ga.nakii yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``saa kira, bhante, kumaarikaa duggataa dukkhitaa, na sukha.m labhati. maasa.myeva na.m su.nisabhogena bhu~nji.msu. tato aparena daasibhogena bhu~njanti. vadeyyaatha, bhante -- `maayyo, ima.m kumaarika.m daasibhogena bhu~njittha, su.nisabhogena ima.m ^a^T1.0299^ea^ kumaarika.m bhu~njathaa'''ti. ``pa.thama.mpaaha.m tehi aajiivakasaavakehi apasaadito. gaccha tva.m. naaha.m gamissaamii''ti.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ atha kho saa ga.nakii ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``eva.m duggato hotu ayyo udaayii, eva.m dukkhito hotu ayyo udaayii, eva.m ^a^M0.0200^ea^ maa sukha.m labhatu ayyo udaayii, yathaa me kumaarikaa duggataa dukkhitaa na sukha.m labhati paapikaaya sassuyaa paapakena sasurena paapakena saamikenaa''ti. saapi kho kumaarikaa ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``eva.m duggato hotu ayyo udaayii, eva.m dukkhito hotu ayyo udaayii, eva.m maa sukha.m labhatu ayyo udaayii, yathaaha.m duggataa dukkhitaa na sukha.m labhaami paapikaaya sassuyaa paapakena sasurena paapakena saamikenaa''ti. a~n~naapi itthiyo asantu.t.thaa sassuuhi vaa sasurehi vaa saamikehi vaa, taa eva.m oyaacanti -- ``eva.m duggato hotu ayyo udaayii, eva.m dukkhito hotu ayyo udaayii, eva.m maa sukha.m labhatu ayyo udaayii, yathaa maya.m duggataa dukkhitaa na ^a^V0.0203^ea^ sukha.m labhaama paapikaahi sassuuhi paapakehi sasurehi paapakehi saamikehii''ti. yaa pana taa itthiyo santu.t.thaa sassuuhi vaa sasurehi vaa saamikehi vaa taa eva.m aayaacanti -- ``eva.m sukhito hotu ayyo udaayii, eva.m sajjito hotu ayyo udaayii, eva.m sukhamedho {sukhamedhito (sii0 ka0)} hotu ayyo udaayii, yathaa maya.m sukhitaa sajjitaa sukhamedhaa bhaddikaahi sassuuhi bhaddakehi sasurehi bhaddakehi saamikehii''ti.

[03]assosu.m ^a^T1.0300^ea^ kho bhikkhuu ekaccaana.m itthiina.m oyaacantiina.m ekaccaana.m itthiina.m aayaacantiina.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa udaayii sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjissatii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m udaayi.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, udaayi, sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjasii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 299^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo^eb^ ^a^P3.0138^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhu sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjeyya, itthiyaa vaa purisamati.m purisassa vaa itthimati.m, jaayattane vaa jaarattane vaa, sa"nghaadiseso''^eb^ti.
[03]eva~ncida.m ^a^M0.0201^ea^ bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa dhuttaa uyyaane paricaarentaa a~n~natarissaa vesiyaa santike duuta.m paahesu.m -- ``aagacchatu uyyaane, paricaaressaamaa''ti. saa evamaaha -- ``aha.m khvayyo tumhe na jaanaami -- `ke vaa ime kassa vaa'ti. aha~ncamhi bahubha.n.daa bahuparikkhaaraa, bahinagara~nca gantabba.m. naaha.m gamissaamii''ti. atha kho so duuto tesa.m dhuttaana.m etamattha.m aarocesi. eva.m vutte, a~n~nataro puriso ^a^T1.0301^ea^ te dhutte etadavoca -- ``kissa tumhe ayyo eta.m vesi.m yaacittha? nanu ayyo udaayii vattabbo! ayyo udaayii uyyojessatii''ti. eva.m vutte, a~n~nataro upaasako ta.m purisa.m etadavoca -- ``maayyo eva.m avaca. na kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m evaruupa.m kaatu.m. naayyo udaayii eva.m karissatii''ti. eva.m vutte, ``karissati na karissatii''ti abbhutamaka.msu. atha kho te dhuttaa yenaayasmaa ^a^V0.0204^ea^ udaayii tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha maya.m, bhante, uyyaane paricaarentaa asukaaya naama vesiyaa santike duuta.m pahi.nimhaa -- `aagacchatu uyyaane, paricaaressaamaa'ti. saa evamaaha -- `aha.m khvayyo tumhe na jaanaami -- ke vaa ime kassa vaati, aha~ncamhi bahubha.n.daa bahuparikkhaaraa, bahinagara~nca gantabba.m. naaha.m gamissaamii'ti. saadhu, bhante, ayyo ta.m vasi.m uyyojetuu''ti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa udaayii yena saa vesii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m vesi.m etadavoca -- ``kissimesa.m na gacchasii''ti? ``aha.m khvayya ime na jaanaami -- `ke vaa ime kassa vaa'ti. aha~ncamhi bahubha.n.daa bahuparikkhaaraa, bahinagara~nca gantabba.m. naaha.m gamissaamii''ti. ``gacchimesa.m. aha.m ime jaanaamii''ti. ``sace, bhante, ayyo jaanaati aha.m gamissaamii''ti. atha kho te dhuttaa ta.m vesi.m aadaaya uyyaana.m agama.msu. atha kho so upaasako ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyo udaayii ta"nkha.nika.m sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjissatii''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tassa upaasakassa ujjhaayantassa khiyyantassa ^a^T1.0302^ea^ vipaacentassa. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa udaayii ta"nkha.nika.m sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjissatii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m ^a^M0.0202^ea^ udaayi.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato ^a^P3.0139^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, udaayi, ta"nkha.nika.m sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjasii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, ta"nkha.nika.m sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjissasi? neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03]atha ^a^M0.0219^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo raajagahe vassa.mvu.t.tho yena aa.lavii tena pakkaami. anupubbena yena aa.lavii tadavasari. tatra suda.m aayasmaa mahaakassapo aa.laviya.m viharati aggaa.lave cetiye. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aa.lavi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. manussaa ^a^T1.0330^ea^ aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m passitvaa ubbijjantipi uttasantipi palaayantipi a~n~nenapi gacchanti a~n~nenapi mukha.m karonti dvaarampi thakenti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aa.laviya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkanto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``pubbaaya.m, aavuso, aa.lavii subhikkhaa ahosi sulabhapi.n.daa sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m; etarahi panaaya.m aa.lavii dubbhikkhaa dullabhapi.n.daa, na sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. ko nu kho, aavuso, hetu ko paccayo, yenaaya.m aa.lavii dubbhikkhaa dullabhapi.n.daa, na sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu''nti? atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaakassapassa etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena aa.lavii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena aa.lavii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa aa.laviya.m viharati aggaa.lave cetiye. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo ^a^V0.0225^ea^ bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa aa.lavake bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, sa~n~naacikaayo ku.tiyo kaaraapetha assaamikaayo attuddesikaayo appamaa.nikaayo ^a^T1.0331^ea^. taayo na ni.t.thaana.m gacchanti. te tumhe yaacanabahulaa vi~n~nattibahulaa viharatha -- `purisa.m detha purisatthakara.m detha...pe0... ti.na.m detha mattika.m dethaa'ti. manussaa upaddutaa yaacanaaya upaddutaa vi~n~nattiyaa bhikkhuu disvaa ubbijjantipi uttasantipi palaayantipi a~n~nenapi gacchanti a~n~nenapi mukha.m karonti dvaarampi thakenti, gaavimpi disvaa palaayanti bhikkhuuti ma~n~namaanaa''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, sa.myaacikaayo ku.tiyo kaaraapessatha assaamikaayo attuddesikaayo appamaa.nikaayo! taayo na ^a^M0.0220^ea^ ni.t.thaana.m gacchanti. te tumhe yaacanabahulaa vi~n~nattibahulaa viharissatha -- `purisa.m detha purisatthakara.m detha...pe0... ti.na.m detha mattika.m dethaa'ti! neta.m moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0...'' vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^T1.0332^ea^, bhikkhave, dve bhaataro isayo ga"nga.m nadi.m upanissaaya vihari.msu. atha kho, bhikkhave, ma.nika.n.tho ^a^P3.0146^ea^ naagaraajaa ga"nga.m nadi.m uttaritvaa yena kani.t.tho isi tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa kani.t.tha.m isi.m sattakkhattu.m bhogehi parikkhipitvaa uparimuddhani mahanta.m pha.na.m karitvaa a.t.thaasi. atha kho, bhikkhave, kani.t.tho isi tassa naagassa bhayaa kiso ahosi luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto. addasa kho, bhikkhave, je.t.tho isi kani.t.tha.m isi.m kisa.m luukha.m dubba.n.na.m uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaata.m dhamanisanthatagatta.m. disvaana kani.t.tha.m isi.m etadavoca -- ``kissa tva.m, bho, kiso luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto''ti? ``idha, bho, ma.nika.n.tho naagaraajaa ga"nga.m nadi.m uttaritvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m sattakkhattu.m bhogehi parikkhipitvaa uparimuddhani mahanta.m pha.na.m karitvaa a.t.thaasi. tassaaha.m, bho, naagassa bhayaa {bhayaamhi (sii0)} kiso luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto''ti. ``icchasi pana tva.m, bho, tassa naagassa anaagamana''nti? ``icchaamaha.m, bho, tassa naagassa anaagamana''nti. ``api pana tva.m, bho, tassa naagassa ki~nci passasii''ti? ``passaamaha.m, bho, ma.nimassa {ma.nissa (sii0 ka0)} ka.n.the pilandhana''nti. ``tena hi tva.m, bho, ta.m naaga.m ma.ni.m yaaca -- `ma.ni.m me, bho, dehi; ma.ninaa me attho'''ti.

[03]atha kho, bhikkhave, ma.nika.n.tho naagaraajaa ga"nga.m nadi.m uttaritvaa yena kani.t.tho isi tenupasa"nkami ^a^V0.0226^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m ^a^T1.0333^ea^ a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho, bhikkhave, ma.nika.n.tha.m naagaraajaana.m kani.t.tho isi etadavoca -- ``ma.ni.m me, bho, dehi; ma.ninaa me attho''ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, ma.nika.n.tho naagaraajaa -- `bhikkhu ma.ni.m yaacati, bhikkhussa ma.ninaa attho'ti khippa~n~neva agamaasi. dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, ma.nika.n.tho naagaraajaa ga"nga.m nadi.m uttaritvaa yena kani.t.tho isi tenupasa"nkami. addasa ^a^M0.0221^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, kani.t.tho isi ma.nika.n.tha.m naagaraajaana.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana ma.nika.n.tha.m naagaraajaana.m etadavoca -- ``ma.ni.m me, bho, dehi; ma.ninaa me attho''ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, ma.nika.n.tho naagaraajaa -- ``bhikkhu ma.ni.m yaacati, bhikkhussa ma.ninaa attho''ti tatova pa.tinivatti. tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, ma.nika.n.tho naagaraajaa ga"nga.m nadi.m uttarati. addasa kho, bhikkhave, kani.t.tho isi ma.nika.n.tha.m naagaraajaana.m ga"nga.m nadi.m uttaranta.m. disvaana ma.nika.n.tha.m naagaraajaana.m etadavoca -- ``ma.ni.m me, bho, dehi; ma.ninaa me attho''ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, ma.nika.n.tho naagaraajaa kani.t.tha.m isi.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] {jaa0 1.3.7 ma.nika.n.thajaatakepi} ``mamannapaana.m ^a^P3.0147^ea^ vipula.m u.laara.m,
[27] uppajjatiimassa ma.nissa hetu.
[26] ta.m te na dassa.m atiyaacakosi.
[22] na caapi te assamamaagamissa.m..
[21] {jaa0 1.3.8 ma.nika.n.thajaatakepi} ``susuu yathaa sakkharadhotapaa.nii.
[27] taasesi ^a^T1.0334^ea^ ma.m selamaayaacamaano.
[26] ta.m te na dassa.m atiyaacakosi.
[22] na caapi te assamamaagamissa''nti..

[03]atha kho, bhikkhave, ma.nika.n.tho naagaraajaa -- ``bhikkhu ma.ni.m yaacati, bhikkhussa ma.ninaa attho''ti pakkaami. tathaa pakkantova {tadaapakkantova (ka0)} ahosi, na puna paccaaga~nchi. atha kho, bhikkhave, kani.t.tho isi tassa naagassa dassaniiyassa adassanena bhiyyosomattaaya kiso ahosi luukho dubba.n.no, uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto. addasa kho, bhikkhave, je.t.tho isi kani.t.tha.m isi.m bhiyyosomattaaya kisa.m luukha.m dubba.n.na.m uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaata.m dhamanisanthatagatta.m. disvaana kani.t.tha.m isi.m etadavoca -- ``kissa tva.m, bho, bhiyyosomattaaya kiso luukho dubba.n.no ^a^V0.0227^ea^ uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto''ti? ``tassaaha.m, bho, naagassa dassaniiyassa adassanena bhiyyosomattaaya kiso luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto''ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, je.t.tho isi kani.t.tha.m isi.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] {jaa0 1.3.9 ma.nika.n.thajaatakepi} ``na ^a^M0.0222^ea^ ta.m yaace yassa piya.m jigiise,
[27] videsso {desso (sii0), desso ca (syaa0)} hoti atiyaacanaaya.
[26] naago ^a^T1.0335^ea^ ma.ni.m yaacito braahma.nena.
[22] adassana~n~neva tadajjhagamaa''ti..
[03]tesa~nhi naama, bhikkhave, tiracchaanagataana.m paa.naana.m amanaapaa bhavissati yaacanaa amanaapaa vi~n~natti. kima"nga.m {kima"nga (sii0)} pana manussabhuutaana.m!

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro bhikkhu himavantapasse viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tassa kho, bhikkhave, vanasa.n.dassa aviduure mahanta.m ninna.m pallala.m. atha kho,

[03] vaasaaya upagacchati. atha kho, bhikkhave, so bhikkhu tassa saku.nasa"nghassa saddena ubbaa.lho yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca ^a^P3.0148^ea^ -- `kacci, bhikkhu, khamaniiya.m kacci yaapaniiya.m kaccisi appakilamathena addhaana.m aagato? kuto ca tva.m, bhikkhu, aagacchasii'ti? `khamaniiya.m, bhagavaa, yaapaniiya.m, bhagavaa. appakilamathena caaha.m, bhante, addhaana.m aagato. atthi, bhante, himavantapasse mahaavanasa.n.do. tassa kho pana, bhante, vanasa.n.dassa aviduure mahanta.m ninna.m pallala.m. atha kho, bhante, mahaasaku.nasa"ngho tasmi.m pallale divasa.m gocara.m caritvaa saaya.m ta.m vanasa.n.da.m vaasaaya upagacchati. tato aha.m, bhagavaa, aagacchaami -- tassa saku.nasa"nghassa saddena ubbaa.lho'ti. `icchasi pana tva.m, bhikkhu, tassa saku.nasa"nghassa anaagamana'nti ^a^T1.0336^ea^? `icchaamaha.m, bhagavaa, tassa saku.nasa"nghassa anaagamana'nti. `tena hi tva.m, bhikkhu, tattha gantvaa ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m tikkhattu.m saddamanussaavehi -- su.nantu me, bhonto saku.naa, yaavatikaa imasmi.m vanasa.n.de vaasa.m upagataa, pattena me attho. ekeka.m me, bhonto, patta.m dadantuu'ti. rattiyaa majjhima.m yaama.m... rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m tikkhattu.m saddamanussaavehi -- `su.nantu ^a^V0.0228^ea^ me, bhonto saku.naa, yaavatikaa imasmi.m vanasa.n.de vaasa.m upagataa, pattena me attho. ekeka.m me, bhonto, patta.m dadantuu'ti.

[03]``atha ^a^M0.0223^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, so bhikkhu tattha gantvaa ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m tikkhattu.m saddamanussaavesi -- `su.nantu me, bhonto saku.naa, yaavatikaa imasmi.m vanasa.n.de vaasa.m upagataa, pattena me attho. ekeka.m me, bhonto, patta.m dadantuu'ti. rattiyaa majjhima yaama.m... rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m tikkhattu.m saddamanussaavesi -- `su.nantu me, bhonto saku.naa, yaavatikaa imasmi.m vanasa.n.de vaasa.m upagataa, pattena me attho. ekeka.m me, bhonto, patta.m dadantuu'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, so saku.nasa"ngho -- `bhikkhu patta.m yaacati bhikkhussa pattena attho'ti tamhaa vanasa.n.daa pakkaami. tathaa pakkantova ahosi na puna paccaaga~nchi. tesa~nhi naama, bhikkhave, tiracchaanagataana.m paa.naana.m amanaapaa bhavissati yaacanaa amanaapaa vi~n~natti. kima"nga.m pana manussabhuutaana.m''!
[03] 346^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa pitaa ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m ^a^T1.0337^ea^ gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] `apaaha.m te na jaanaami, ra.t.thapaala bahuu janaa.
[22] {jaa0 1.7.54} te ma.m sa"ngamma yaacanti, kasmaa ma.m tva.m na yaacasii'ti..
[21] {jaa0 1.7.55} `yaacako appiyo hoti, yaaca.m adadamappiyo.
[22] tasmaaha.m ta.m na yaacaami, maa me videssanaa ahuu'ti..
[03]``so hi naama, bhikkhave, ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto saka.m pitara.m eva.m vakkhati. kima"nga.m pana jano jana.m!

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ ``gihiina.m, bhikkhave, dussa.mharaani bhogaani sambhataanipi durakkhiyaani ^a^P3.0149^ea^. tattha naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, eva.m dussa.mharesu bhogesu sambhatesupi durakkhiyesu yaacanabahulaa vi~n~nattibahulaa viharissatha -- `purisa.m detha, purisatthakara.m detha, go.na.m detha, saka.ta.m detha, vaasi.m detha, parasu.m detha, ku.thaari.m detha, kudaala.m detha, nikhaadana.m detha, valli.m detha, ve.lu.m detha, mu~nja.m detha ^a^V0.0229^ea^, pabbaja.m detha, ti.na.m detha, mattika.m dethaa''ti! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ ^b^``sa~n~naacikaaya pana bhikkhunaa ku.ti.m kaarayamaanena assaamika.m attuddesa.m pamaa.nikaa kaaretabbaa. tatrida.m pamaa.na.m -- diighaso dvaadasa^eb^ ^a^M0.0224^ea^ ^b^vidatthiyo, sugatavidatthiyaa; tiriya.m sattantaraa. bhikkhuu abhinetabbaa vatthudesanaaya. tehi bhikkhuuhi vatthu desetabba.m ^a^T1.0338^ea^ -- anaarambha.m {anaarabbha.m (ka0)} saparikkamana.m. saarambhe {saarabbhe (ka0)} ce bhikkhu vatthusmi.m aparikkamane sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kaareyya, bhikkhuu vaa anabhineyya vatthudesanaaya, pamaa.na.m vaa atikkaameyya, sa"nghaadiseso''^eb^ti.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ ^b^sa~n~naacikaa^eb^ naama saya.m yaacitvaa purisampi purisatthakarampi go.nampi saka.tampi vaasimpi parasumpi ku.thaarimpi kudaalampi nikhaadanampi vallimpi ve.lumpi mu~njampi pabbajampi ti.nampi mattikampi.
[03]^b^ku.ti^eb^ naama ullittaa vaa hoti avalittaa vaa ullittaavalittaa vaa.
[03]^b^kaarayamaanenaa^eb^ti karonto vaa kaaraapento vaa.
[03]^b^assaamika^eb^nti na a~n~no koci saamiko hoti, itthii vaa puriso vaa gaha.t.tho vaa pabbajito vaa.
[03]^b^attuddesa^eb^nti attano atthaaya.
[03]^b^pamaa.nikaa kaaretabbaa. tatrida.m pamaa.na.m -- diighaso dvaadasa vidatthiyo, sugatavidatthiyaa^eb^ti baahirimena maanena.
[03]^b^tiriya.m sattantaraa^eb^ti abbhantarimena maanena.

[03]^b^bhikkhuu abhinetabbaa vatthudesanaayaa^eb^ti tena ku.tikaarakena bhikkhunaa ku.tivatthu.m sodhetvaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa vu.d.dhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa ^a^V0.0230^ea^ a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``aha.m, bhante, sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kattukaamo assaamika.m attuddesa.m. soha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m ku.tivatthuolokana.m yaacaamii''ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbaa. tatiyampi ^a^P3.0150^ea^ yaacitabbaa. sace ^a^T1.0339^ea^ sabbo sa"ngho ussahati ku.tivatthu.m oloketu.m, sabbena sa"nghena oloketabba.m. no ce sabbo sa"ngho ussahati ku.tivatthu.m oloketu.m, ye tattha honti bhikkhuu byattaa pa.tibalaa saarambha.m anaarambha.m saparikkamana.m aparikkamana.m jaanitu.m te yaacitvaa sammannitabbaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu ^a^M0.0225^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kattukaamo assaamika.m attuddesa.m. so sa"ngha.m ku.tivatthuolokana.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama~nca itthannaama~nca bhikkhuu sammanneyya itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ku.tivatthu.m oloketu.m. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kattukaamo assaamika.m attuddesa.m. so sa"ngha.m ku.tivatthuolokana.m yaacati. sa"ngho itthannaama~nca itthannaama~nca bhikkhuu sammannati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ku.tivatthu.m oloketu.m. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa ca itthannaamassa ca bhikkhuuna.m sammuti {sammati (syaa0)} itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ku.tivatthu.m oloketu.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammataa sa"nghena itthannaamo ca itthannaamo ca bhikkhuu itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ku.tivatthu.m oloketu.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ tehi sammatehi bhikkhuuhi tattha gantvaa ku.tivatthu oloketabba.m, saarambha.m anaarambha.m saparikkamana.m aparikkamana.m jaanitabba.m. sace saarambha.m hoti ^a^T1.0340^ea^ aparikkamana.m, `maa idha karii'ti vattabbo. sace anaarambha.m hoti saparikkamana.m, sa"nghassa aarocetabba.m -- `anaarambha.m saparikkamana'nti. tena ku.tikaarakena bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa vu.d.dhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``aha.m, bhante, sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kattukaamo assaamika.m attuddesa.m ^a^V0.0231^ea^. soha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m ku.tivatthudesana.m yaacaamii''ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbaa. tatiyampi yaacitabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kattukaamo assaamika.m attuddesa.m. so sa"ngha.m ku.tivatthudesana.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ku.tivatthu.m deseyya. esaa ~natti.
