[03] 380^b^.^eb^ {ida.m vatthu cuu.lava0 189} tena ^a^T1.0367^ea^ ^a^P3.0158^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmataa dabbena mallaputtena jaatiyaa sattavassena arahatta.m sacchikata.m hoti. ya.m ki~nci {ya~nca ki~nci (sii0 ka0)} saavakena pattabba.m sabba.m tena anuppatta.m hoti. natthi cassa ki~nci uttari kara.niiya.m, katassa vaa paticayo. atha kho aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``mayaa kho jaatiyaa sattavassena arahatta.m sacchikata.m. ya.m ki~nci saavakena pattabba.m sabba.m mayaa anuppatta.m. natthi ca me ki~nci 30.0250 uttari kara.niiya.m, katassa vaa paticayo. kinnu kho aha.m sa"nghassa veyyaavacca.m kareyya''nti?

[03]atha kho aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~napeyya.m bhattaani ca uddiseyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa ^a^M0.0244^ea^ dabbo mallaputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi mayaa kho jaatiyaa sattavassena arahatta.m sacchikata.m, ya.m ki~nci saavakena pattabba.m, sabba.m mayaa anupatta.m, natthi ^a^T1.0368^ea^ ca me ki~nci uttari kara.niiya.m, katassa vaa paticayo, ki.m nu kho aha.m sa"nghassa veyyaavacca.m kareyya''nti. tassa mayha.m bhante, etadahosi ya.mnuunaaha.m ``sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~napeyya.m bhattaani ca uddiseyyanti. icchaamaha.m, bhante, sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~napetu.m bhattaani ca uddisitu''nti. ``saadhu saadhu, dabba. tena hi tva.m, dabba, sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~napehi bhattaani ca uddisaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho dabba.m mallaputta.m senaasanapa~n~naapaka~nca bhattuddesaka~nca sammannatu. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m dabbo mallaputto yaacitabbo. yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 381^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m sa"ngho aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m senaasanapa~n~naapaka~nca bhattuddesaka~nca ^a^P3.0159^ea^ sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m senaasanapa~n~naapaka~nca bhattuddesaka~nca sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa senaasanapa~n~naapakassa ca bhattuddesakassa ca sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto senaasanapa~n~naapako ca bhattuddesako ca. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii ^a^T1.0369^ea^, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 382^b^.^eb^ sammato ^a^V0.0251^ea^ ca panaayasmaa dabbo mallaputto sabhaagaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti. ye te bhikkhuu suttantikaa tesa.m ekajjha.m senaasana.m ^a^M0.0245^ea^ pa~n~napeti -- ``te a~n~nama~n~na.m suttanta.m sa"ngaayissantii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu vinayadharaa tesa.m ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- ``te a~n~nama~n~na.m vinaya.m vinicchinissantii''ti {vinicchissantiiti (ka0)}. ye te bhikkhuu dhammakathikaa tesa.m ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- ``te a~n~nama~n~na.m dhamma.m saakacchissantii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu jhaayino tesa.m ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- ``te a~n~nama~n~na.m na byaabaadhissantii''ti {na byaabaahissantiiti (ka0)}. ye te bhikkhuu tiracchaanakathikaa kaayada.lhibahulaa {kaayada.d.dhibahulaa (sii0)} viharanti tesampi ekajjha.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- ``imaayapime aayasmanto ratiyaa acchissantii''ti. yepi te bhikkhuu vikaale aagacchanti tesampi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa teneva aalokena senaasana.m pa~n~napeti. apisu bhikkhuu sa~ncicca vikaale aagacchanti -- ``maya.m aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m passissaamaa''ti.

[03]te aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- ``amhaaka.m, aavuso dabba, senaasana.m pa~n~napehii''ti. te aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto eva.m vadeti -- ``katthaayasmantaa ^a^T1.0370^ea^ icchanti, kattha pa~n~napemii''ti? te sa~ncicca duure apadisanti -- ``amhaaka.m, aavuso dabba, gijjhakuu.te pabbate senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, corapapaate senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, isigilipasse kaa.lasilaaya.m senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, vebhaarapasse sattapa.n.niguhaaya.m senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, siitavane sappaso.n.dikapabbhaare senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, gotamakakandaraaya.m senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, tindukakandaraaya.m senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, tapodakandaraaya.m senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, tapodaaraame senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, jiivakambavane ^a^P3.0160^ea^ senaasana.m pa~n~napehi. amhaaka.m, aavuso, maddakucchismi.m migadaaye senaasana.m pa~n~napehii''ti.

[03]tesa.m aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa a"nguliyaa jalamaanaaya purato purato gacchati. tepi teneva aalokena aayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito gacchanti. tesa.m aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto eva.m senaasana.m pa~n~napeti -- ``aya.m ma~nco, ida.m pii.tha.m, aya.m bhisi, ida.m bimbohana.m, ida.m vacca.t.thaana.m, ida.m passaava.t.thaana.m ^a^M0.0246^ea^, ida.m paaniiya.m, ida.m paribhojaniiya.m, aya.m ^a^T1.0371^ea^ kattarada.n.do, ida.m sa"nghassa katikasa.n.thaana.m, ima.m kaala.m pavisitabba.m, ima.m kaala.m ^a^V0.0252^ea^ nikkhamitabba''nti. tesa.m aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto eva.m senaasana.m pa~n~napetvaa punadeva ve.luvana.m paccaagacchati.

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhuumajakaa {bhummajakaa (sii0 syaa0)} bhikkhuu navakaa ceva honti appapu~n~naa ca. yaani sa"nghassa laamakaani senaasanaani taani tesa.m paapu.nanti laamakaani ca bhattaani. tena kho pana samayena raajagahe manussaa icchanti theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m abhisa"nkhaarika.m pi.n.dapaata.m daatu.m sappimpi telampi uttaribha"ngampi. mettiyabhuumajakaana.m pana bhikkhuuna.m paakatika.m denti yathaarandha.m ka.naajaka.m bila"ngadutiya.m. te pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkantaa there bhikkhuu pucchanti -- ``tumhaaka.m, aavuso, bhattagge ki.m ahosi? tumhaaka.m, aavuso, bhattagge ki.m ahosii''ti? ekacce theraa eva.m vadanti -- ``amhaaka.m, aavuso, sappi ahosi tela.m ahosi uttaribha"nga.m ahosii''ti. mettiyabhuumajakaa pana bhikkhuu eva.m vadanti -- ``amhaaka.m, aavuso, na ki~nci ahosi, paakatika.m yathaarandha.m ka.naajaka.m bila"ngadutiya''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati sa"nghassa catukkabhatta.m deti niccabhatta.m. so bhattagge saputtadaaro upati.t.thitvaa parivisati ^a^T1.0372^ea^. a~n~ne odanena pucchanti, a~n~ne suupena pucchanti, a~n~ne telena pucchanti, a~n~ne uttaribha"ngena pucchanti. tena kho pana samayena kalyaa.nabhattikassa gahapatino bhatta.m svaatanaaya mettiyabhuumajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m uddi.t.tha.m hoti. atha kho kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati aaraama.m agamaasi kenacideva kara.niiyena. so yenaayasmaa dabbo mallaputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho kalyaa.nabhattika.m gahapati.m ^a^P3.0161^ea^ aayasmaa dabbo mallaputto dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati aayasmataa dabbena mallaputtena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m etadavoca -- ``kassa, bhante, amhaaka.m ghare svaatanaaya bhatta.m uddi.t.tha''nti? ``mettiyabhuumajakaana.m kho, gahapati, bhikkhuuna.m tumhaaka.m ^a^M0.0247^ea^ ghare svaatanaaya bhatta.m uddi.t.tha''nti. atha kho kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati anattamano ahosi -- ``katha~nhi naama paapabhikkhuu amhaaka.m ghare bhu~njissantii''ti! ghara.m gantvaa daasi.m aa.naapesi -- ``ye, je, sve bhattikaa aagacchanti te ko.t.thake aasana.m pa~n~napetvaa ka.naajakena bila"ngadutiyena parivisaa''ti. ``eva.m ayyaa''ti kho saa daasii kalyaa.nabhattikassa gahapatino paccassosi.

[03]atha ^a^V0.0253^ea^ kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu -- ``hiyyo kho, aavuso, amhaaka.m kalyaa.nabhattikassa gahapatino ghare ^a^T1.0373^ea^ bhatta.m uddi.t.tha.m, sve amhe kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati saputtadaaro upati.t.thitvaa parivisissati; a~n~ne odanena pucchissanti, a~n~ne suupena pucchissanti, a~n~ne telena pucchissanti, a~n~ne uttaribha"ngena pucchissantii''ti. te teneva somanassena na cittaruupa.m rattiyaa supi.msu. atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivara.m aadaaya yena kalyaa.nabhattikassa gahapatino nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami.msu. addasaa kho saa daasii mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu duuratova aagacchante. disvaana ko.t.thake aasana.m pa~n~napetvaa mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``nisiidatha, bhante''ti. atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho na taava bhatta.m siddha.m bhavissati! yathaa {yaava (sii0)} maya.m ko.t.thake nisiideyyaamaa''ti {nisiidaapiiyeyyaamaati (sii0), nisiidaapiiyaamaati (syaa0)}. atha kho saa daasii ka.naajakena bila"ngadutiyena upagacchi -- ``bhu~njatha, bhante''ti. ``maya.m kho, bhagini, niccabhattikaa''ti. ``jaanaami ayyaa niccabhattikaattha. apicaaha.m hiyyova gahapatinaa aa.nattaa -- `ye, je, sve bhattikaa aagacchanti te ko.t.thake aasana.m pa~n~napetvaa ka.naajakena bila"ngadutiyena parivisaa'ti. bhu~njatha, bhante''ti. atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu -- ``hiyyo kho, aavuso, kalyaa.nabhattiko gahapati aaraama.m agamaasi dabbassa mallaputtassa santike. nissa.msaya.m kho maya.m dabbena mallaputtena gahapatino antare {santike (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} paribhinnaa''ti. te teneva domanassena ^a^T1.0374^ea^ na cittaruupa.m bhu~nji.msu. atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu pacchaabhatta.m ^a^P3.0162^ea^ pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkantaa aaraama.m gantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tisaametvaa bahaaraamako.t.thake sa"nghaa.tipallatthikaaya nisiidi.msu tu.nhiibhuutaa ma"nkubhuutaa pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa pajjhaayantaa appa.tibhaanaa.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0248^ea^ kho mettiyaa bhikkhunii yena mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``vandaami, ayyaa''ti. eva.m vutte mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu naalapi.msu. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho mettiyaa bhikkhunii mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``vandaami, ayyaa''ti. tatiyampi kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu naalapi.msu. ``kyaaha.m ayyaana.m aparajjhaami? kissa ma.m ayyaa naalapantii''ti? ``tathaa hi pana tva.m, bhagini, amhe dabbena mallaputtena vihe.thiiyamaane ajjhupekkhasii''ti? ``kyaaha.m, ayyaa, karomii''ti? ``sace kho tva.m, bhagini, iccheyyaasi ajjeva bhagavaa dabba.m mallaputta.m naasaapeyyaa''ti. ``kyaaha.m, ayyaa, karomi, ki.m mayaa sakkaa kaatu''nti? ``ehi tva.m, bhagini, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m eva.m vadehi -- `ida.m, bhante, nacchanna.m nappatiruupa.m. ^a^V0.0254^ea^ yaaya.m, bhante, disaa abhayaa aniitikaa anupaddavaa saaya.m disaa sabhayaa saiitikaa saupaddavaa. yato nivaata.m tato savaata.m {pavaata.m (sii0 syaa0)}. udaka.m ma~n~ne aaditta.m. ayyenamhi dabbena mallaputtena duusitaa'''ti. ``eva.m, ayyaa''ti kho mettiyaa bhikkhunii mettiyabhuumajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^T1.0375^ea^ ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho mettiyaa bhikkhunii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m, bhante, nacchanna.m nappatiruupa.m. yaaya.m, bhante, disaa abhayaa aniitikaa anupaddavaa saaya.m disaa sabhayaa saiitikaa saupaddavaa. yato nivaata.m tato savaata.m. udaka.m ma~n~ne aaditta.m! ayyenamhi dabbena mallaputtena duusitaa''ti.

[03] 384^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sarasi tva.m, dabba, evaruupa.m kattaa yathaaya.m bhikkhunii aahaa''ti? ``yathaa ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa...pe0... tatiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m etadavoca -- ``sarasi tva.m, dabba, evaruupa.m kattaa yathaaya.m bhikkhunii aahaa''ti? ``yathaa ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti. ``na kho, dabba, dabbaa eva.m nibbe.thenti. sace tayaa kata.m katanti vadehi, sace tayaa akata.m akatanti vadehii''ti. ``yato aha.m, bhante, jaato naabhijaanaami supinantenapi methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitaa, pageva jaagaro''ti! atha ^a^M0.0249^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, mettiya.m bhikkhuni.m naasetha ^a^P3.0163^ea^. ime ca bhikkhuu anuyu~njathaa''ti. ida.m vatvaa bhagavaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03]atha kho te bhikkhuu mettiya.m bhikkhuni.m naasesu.m. atha kho mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``maavuso, mettiya.m bhikkhuni.m naasetha. na saa ki~nci aparajjhati. amhehi saa ussaahitaa kupitehi anattamanehi caavanaadhippaayehii''ti. ``ki.m ^a^T1.0376^ea^ pana tumhe, aavuso, aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msethaa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msessantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msethaa''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho ^a^V0.0255^ea^ bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msessatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0386^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohantaa addasa.msu chagalaka.m {chakalaka.m (syaa0)} ajikaaya vippa.tipajjanta.m. disvaana ^a^P3.0167^ea^ evamaaha.msu -- ``handa maya.m, aavuso, ima.m chagalaka.m dabba.m mallaputta.m naama karoma. ima.m ajika.m mettiya.m naama bhikkhuni.m karoma. eva.m maya.m voharissaama. pubbe maya.m, aavuso, dabba.m mallaputta.m sutena avocumhaa. idaani pana amhehi saama.m di.t.tho mettiyaaya bhikkhuniyaa vippa.tipajjanto''ti. te ta.m chagalaka.m dabba.m mallaputta.m naama ^a^V0.0262^ea^ aka.msu. ta.m ajika.m mettiya.m naama bhikkhuni.m aka.msu. te bhikkhuuna.m aarocesu.m -- ``pubbe maya.m, aavuso, dabba.m mallaputta.m sutena avocumhaa. idaani pana amhehi saama.m di.t.tho mettiyaaya bhikkhuniyaa vippa.tipajjanto''ti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``maavuso, eva.m avacuttha. naayasmaa dabbo mallaputto eva.m karissatii''ti.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0256^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sarasi tva.m, dabba, evaruupa.m kattaa yathayime bhikkhuu aaha.msuu''ti? ``yathaa ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa...pe0... tatiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m ^a^T1.0387^ea^ etadavoca -- ``sarasi tva.m, dabba, evaruupa.m kattaa yathayime bhikkhuu aaha.msuu''ti? ``yathaa ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti. ``na kho, dabba, dabbaa eva.m nibbe.thenti. sace tayaa kata.m katanti vadehi, sace tayaa akata.m akatanti vadehii''ti. ``yato aha.m, bhante, jaato naabhijaanaami supinantenapi methunadhamma.m pa.tisevitaa, pageva jaagaro''ti! atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhuve, ime bhikkhuu anuyu~njathaa''ti. ida.m vatvaa bhagavaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ {ida.m vatthu cuu.lava0 343} tena ^a^T1.0398^ea^ ^a^P3.0171^ea^ ^a^M0.0263^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho devadatto yena kokaaliko ka.tamodakatissako {ka.tamorakatissako (sii0 syaa0)} kha.n.dadeviyaa putto samuddadatto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa kokaalika.m ka.tamodakatissaka.m kha.n.dadeviyaa putta.m samuddadatta.m etadavoca -- ``etha maya.m, aavuso, sama.nassa gotamassa sa"nghabheda.m karissaama cakkabheda''nti. eva.m vutte kokaaliko devadatta.m etadavoca -- ``sama.no kho, aavuso, gotamo mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo. katha.m maya.m sama.nassa gotamassa sa"nghabheda.m karissaama cakkabheda''nti? ``etha maya.m, aavuso, sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nca vatthuuni yaacissaama -- `bhagavaa, bhante, anekapariyaayena appicchassa santu.t.thassa sallekhassa dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa {viiriyaarabbhassa (ka0)} va.n.navaadii. imaani, bhante, pa~nca vatthuuni anekapariyaayena appicchataaya santu.t.thiyaa sallekhaaya dhutataaya paasaadikataaya apacayaaya viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattanti. saadhu, bhante, bhikkhuu yaavajiiva.m aara~n~nikaa assu; yo gaamanta.m osareyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m pi.n.dapaatikaa assu; yo nimantana.m saadiyeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m pa.msukuulikaa assu; yo gahapaticiivara.m saadiyeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m rukkhamuulikaa assu; yo channa.m upagaccheyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m macchama.msa.m ^a^T1.0399^ea^ na khaadeyyu.m; yo macchama.msa.m khaadeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyyaa'ti. imaani sama.no gotamo naanujaanissati. te maya.m imehi pa~ncahi ^a^V0.0270^ea^ vatthuuhi jana.m sa~n~naapessaamaati. sakkaa kho, aavuso, imehi pa~ncahi vatthuuhi sama.nassa gotamassa sa"nghabhedo kaatu.m cakkabhedo. luukhapasannaa hi, aavuso, manussaa''ti.

[03]atha kho devadatto sapariso yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho devadatto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhagavaa, bhante, anekapariyaayena appicchassa...pe0... viiriyaarambhassa va.n.navaadii. imaani, bhante, pa~nca vatthuuni anekapariyaayena appicchataaya...pe0... viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattanti. saadhu, bhante, bhikkhuu ^a^M0.0264^ea^ yaavajiiva.m aara~n~nikaa assu; yo gaamanta.m osareyya vajja.m na.m phuseyya...pe0... yaavajiiva.m macchama.msa.m na khaadeyyu.m, yo macchama.msa.m khaadeyya vajja.m na.m phuseyyaa''ti. ``ala.m, devadatta, yo icchati aara~n~niko hotu, yo icchati gaamante viharatu; yo icchati pi.n.dapaatiko ^a^P3.0172^ea^ hotu, yo ^a^T1.0400^ea^ icchati nimantana.m saadiyatu; yo icchati pa.msukuuliko hotu, yo icchati gahapaticiivara.m saadiyatu. a.t.thamaase kho mayaa, devadatta, rukkhamuulasenaasana.m anu~n~naata.m, tiko.tiparisuddha.m macchama.msa.m -- adi.t.tha.m asuta.m aparisa"nkita''nti. atha kho devadatto -- ``na bhagavaa imaani pa~nca vatthuuni anujaanaatii''ti ha.t.tho udaggo sapariso u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ atha kho devadatto sapariso raajagaha.m pavisitvaa pa~ncahi vatthuuhi jana.m sa~n~naapesi -- ``maya.m, aavuso, sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nca vatthuuni yaacimhaa -- `bhagavaa, bhante, anekapariyaayena appicchassa santu.t.thassa sallekhassa dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa va.n.navaadii. imaani, bhante, pa~nca vatthuuni anekapariyaayena appicchataaya santu.t.thiyaa sallekhaaya dhutataaya paasaadikataaya apacayaaya viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattanti. saadhu, bhante, bhikkhuu yaavajiiva.m aara~n~nikaa assu; yo gaamanta.m osareyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m pi.n.dapaatikaa assu; yo nimantana.m saadiyeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m pa.msukuulikaa assu; yo gahapaticiivara.m saadiyeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m rukkhamuulikaa assu; yo channa.m upagaccheyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyya. yaavajiiva.m macchama.msa.m na khaadeyyu.m; yo macchama.msa.m khaadeyya, vajja.m na.m phuseyyaa'ti. imaani sama.no gotamo naanujaanaati ^a^T1.0401^ea^. te maya.m imehi pa~ncahi vatthuuhi samaadaaya vattaamaa''ti. tattha ye te manussaa assaddhaa appasannaa dubbuddhino te evamaaha.msu -- ``ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dhutaa sallekhavuttino, sama.no pana gotamo baahulliko baahullaaya cetetii''ti. ye ^a^V0.0271^ea^ pana te manussaa saddhaa pasannaa pa.n.ditaa byattaa buddhimanto te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama devadatto bhagavato sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamissati cakkabhedaayaa''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti ^a^M0.0265^ea^ -- ``katha~nhi naama devadatto sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamissati cakkabhedaayaa''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu devadatta.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, devadatta, sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamasi cakkabhedaayaa''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamissasi cakkabhedaaya! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu samaggassa sa"nghassa bhedaaya parakkameyya, bhedanasa.mvattanika.m vaa adhikara.na.m samaadaaya paggayha ti.t.theyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi evamassa vacaniiyo -- `maayasmaa samaggassa sa"nghassa bhedaaya parakkami, bhedanasa.mvattanika.m vaa ^a^T1.0402^ea^ adhikara.na.m samaadaaya paggayha a.t.thaasi. sametaayasmaa sa"nghena. samaggo hi sa"ngho sammodamaano avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu viharatii'ti. eva~nca so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano tatheva pagga.nheyya^eb^ ^a^P3.0173^ea^^b^, so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasitabbo tassa pa.tinissaggaaya. yaavatatiya~nce samanubhaasiyamaano ta.m pa.tinissajjeyya, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce pa.tinissajjeyya, sa"nghaadiseso''^eb^ti.
[03] 412^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^samaggo^eb^ naama ^b^sa"ngho^eb^ samaanasa.mvaasako samaanasiimaaya.m .thito.
[03]^b^bhedaaya parakkameyyaa^eb^ti -- ``katha.m ime naanaa assu, vinaa assu, vaggaa assuu''ti pakkha.m pariyesati, ga.na.m bandhati.
[03]^b^bhedanasa.mvattanika.m vaa adhikara.na^eb^nti a.t.thaarasabhedakaravatthuuni.

[03]ye ^a^M0.0266^ea^ passanti, ye su.nanti, tehi vattabbo -- ``maayasmaa samaggassa sa"nghassa bhedaaya parakkami, bhedanasa.mvattanika.m vaa adhikara.na.m samaadaaya paggayha a.t.thaasi. sametaayasmaa sa"nghena. samaggo hi sa"ngho sammodamaano avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu viharatii''ti. dutiyampi vattabbo. tatiyampi vattabbo. sace pa.tinissajjati, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce pa.tinissajjati, aapatti dukka.tassa. sutvaa na vadanti ^a^T1.0403^ea^, aapatti dukka.tassa. so bhikkhu sa"nghamajjhampi aaka.d.dhitvaa vattabbo -- ``maayasmaa samaggassa sa"nghassa bhedaaya parakkami, bhedanasa.mvattanika.m vaa adhikara.na.m samaadaaya paggayha a.t.thaasi. sametaayasmaa sa"nghena. samaggo hi sa"ngho sammodamaano avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu viharatii''ti. dutiyampi vattabbo. tatiyampi vattabbo. sace pa.tinissajjati, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce pa.tinissajjati, aapatti dukka.tassa. so bhikkhu samanubhaasitabbo -- ``eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, samanubhaasitabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu samaggassa sa"nghassa bhedaaya parakkamati. so ta.m vatthu.m na pa.tinissajjati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m samanubhaaseyya tassa vatthussa pa.tinissaggaaya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu samaggassa sa"nghassa bhedaaya parakkamati. so ta.m vatthu.m na pa.tinissajjati. sa"ngho itthannaama.m ^a^P3.0174^ea^ bhikkhu.m samanubhaasati tassa vatthussa ^a^V0.0273^ea^ pa.tinissaggaaya. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno samanubhaasanaa tassa vatthussa pa.tinissaggaaya, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu samaggassa sa"nghassa bhedaaya parakkamati. so ta.m vatthu.m na pa.tinissajjati. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m samanubhaasati tassa vatthussa pa.tinissaggaaya. yassaayasmato ^a^T1.0404^ea^ khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno samanubhaasanaa tassa vatthussa pa.tinissaggaaya, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``samanubha.t.tho sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu tassa vatthussa pa.tinissaggaaya. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 417^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0405^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena devadatto sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamati cakkabhedaaya. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``adhammavaadii devadatto, avinayavaadii devadatto. katha~nhi naama devadatto sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamissati cakkabhedaayaa''ti! eva.m vutte kokaaliko ka.tamodakatissako kha.n.dadeviyaa putto samuddadatto te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``maayasmanto eva.m avacuttha. dhammavaadii ^a^P3.0175^ea^ devadatto, vinayavaadii devadatto. amhaaka~nca devadatto chanda~nca ruci~nca aadaaya voharati jaanaati no bhaasati amhaaka.mpeta.m khamatii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu devadattassa ^a^M0.0268^ea^ sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamantassa anuvattakaa bhavissanti vaggavaadakaa''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu te anuvattake bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu devadattassa sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamantassa anuvattakaa honti vaggavaadakaa''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa devadattassa sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamantassa anuvattakaa bhavissanti vaggavaadakaa ^a^T1.0406^ea^! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 418^b^.^eb^ ^b^``tasseva kho pana bhikkhussa bhikkhuu honti anuvattakaa vaggavaadakaa eko vaa dve vaa tayo vaa. te eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `maayasmanto eta.m bhikkhu.m ki~nci avacuttha. dhammavaadii ceso bhikkhu, vinayavaadii ceso bhikkhu. amhaaka~nceso bhikkhu chanda~nca ruci~nca aadaaya voharati jaanaati no bhaasati amhaakampeta.m khamatii'ti, te bhikkhuu bhikkhuuhi evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `maayasmanto eva.m avacuttha, na ceso bhikkhu dhammavaadii, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavaadii, maayasmantaanampi sa"nghabhedo ruccittha, sametaayasmantaana.m sa"nghena, samaggo hi sa"ngho sammodamaano ^a^V0.0275^ea^ avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu viharatii'ti. eva~nca te bhikkhuu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaanaa tatheva pagga.nheyyu.m, te bhikkhuu bhikkhuuhi yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasitabbaa tassa pa.tinissaggaaya. yaavatatiya~nce samanubhaasiyamaanaa ta.m pa.tinissajjeyyu.m, icceta.m kusala.m, no ce pa.tinissajjeyyu.m, sa"nghaadiseso''^eb^ti.
[03] 419^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasseva kho panaa^eb^ti tassa sa"nghabhedakassa bhikkhuno.

[03]^b^vaggavaadakaa^eb^ti tassa va.n.naaya pakkhaaya .thitaa honti.

[03]^b^eko vaa dve vaa tayo vaa^eb^ti eko vaa hoti dve vaa tayo vaa. te eva.m vadeyyu.m -- ``maayasmanto eta.m bhikkhu.m ki~nci avacuttha, dhammavaadii ceso ^a^T1.0407^ea^ ^a^M0.0269^ea^ bhikkhu, vinayavaadii ceso bhikkhu, amhaaka~nceso bhikkhu chanda~nca ruci~nca aadaaya voharati ^a^P3.0176^ea^ jaanaati no bhaasati amhaaka.mpeta.m khamatii'ti.

[03]ye passanti ye su.nanti tehi vattabbaa -- ``maayasmanto eva.m avacuttha. na ceso bhikkhu dhammavaadii, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavaadii. maayasmantaanampi sa"nghabhedo ruccittha. sametaayasmantaana.m sa"nghena. samaggo hi sa"ngho sammodamaano avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu viharatii''ti. dutiyampi vattabbaa. tatiyampi vattabbaa. sace pa.tinissajjanti, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce pa.tinissajjanti, aapatti dukka.tassa. sutvaa na vadanti, aapatti dukka.tassa. te bhikkhuu sa"nghamajjhampi aaka.d.dhitvaa vattabbaa -- ``maayasmanto eva.m avacuttha. na ceso ^a^V0.0276^ea^ bhikkhu dhammavaadii, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavaadii. maayasmantaanampi sa"nghabhedo ruccittha. sametaayasmantaana.m sa"nghena. samaggo hi sa"ngho sammodamaano avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu viharatii''ti. dutiyampi vattabbaa. tatiyampi vattabbaa. sace pa.tinissajjanti, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce pa.tinissajjanti, aapatti dukka.tassa. te bhikkhuu samanubhaasitabbaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, samanubhaasitabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 432^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu kaasiisu vassa.mvu.t.tho saavatthi.m ^a^T1.0417^ea^ gacchanto bhagavanta.m dassanaaya, yena kii.taagiri ^a^P3.0181^ea^ tadavasari. atha kho so bhikkhu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kii.taagiri.m pi.n.daaya paavisi paasaadikena abhikkantena pa.tikkantena aalokitena vilokitena sami~njitena pasaaritena okkhittacakkhu iriyaapathasampanno. manussaa ta.m bhikkhu.m passitvaa evamaaha.msu -- ``kvaaya.m abalabalo viya mandamando viya bhaaku.tikabhaaku.tiko viya? ko imassa upagatassa pi.n.daka.m dassati? amhaaka.m pana ayyaa assajipunabbasukaa sa.nhaa sakhilaa sukhasambhaasaa mihitapubba"ngamaa ehisvaagatavaadino abbhaaku.tikaa uttaanamukhaa pubbabhaasino. tesa.m kho naama pi.n.do daatabbo''ti.

saddhivihaarikaa''ti.

[03]``katha.m maya.m, bhante, assajipunabbasukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^P3.0183^ea^ kii.taagirismaa pabbaajaniiyakamma.m karoma? ca.n.daa te bhikkhuu pharusaa''ti. ``tena hi tumhe, saariputtaa, bahukehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m gacchathaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho saariputtamoggallaanaa bhagavato paccassosu.m. ``eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, kaatabba.m. pa.thama.m assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu codetabbaa. codetvaa saaretabbaa. saaretvaa aapatti.m ropetabbaa ^a^T1.0423^ea^. aapatti.m ropetvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu ^a^M0.0279^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. ime assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu kuladuusakaa paapasamaacaaraa. imesa.m paapakaa samaacaaraa dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. kulaani ca imehi du.t.thaani dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho assajipunabbasukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m kii.taagirismaa pabbaajaniiyakamma.m kareyya -- `na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhuuhi kii.taagirismi.m vatthabba'nti. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ime assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu kuladuusakaa paapasamaacaaraa. imesa.m paapakaa samaacaaraa dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. kulaani ca imehi du.t.thaani dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. sa"ngho assajipunabbasukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m kii.taagirismaa pabbaajaniiyakamma.m karoti -- `na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhuuhi kii.taagirismi.m vatthabba'nti. yassaayasmato ^a^V0.0286^ea^ khamati assajipunabbasukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m kii.taagirismaa pabbaajaniiyakammassa kara.na.m -- `na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhuuhi kii.taagirismi.m vatthabba'nti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho...pe0... so bhaaseyya.

[03]``kata.m sa"nghena assajipunabbasukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m kii.taagirismaa pabbaajaniiyakamma.m -- `na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhuuhi kii.taagirismi.m vatthabba'nti. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 435^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T1.0426^ea^ kho saariputtamoggallaanappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho kii.taagiri.m gantvaa assajipunabbasukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m kii.taagirismaa pabbaajaniiyakamma.m akaasi -- `na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhuuhi kii.taagirismi.m vatthabba'nti. te sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakammakataa na sammaa vattanti, na loma.m paatenti, na netthaara.m vattanti, na bhikkhuu khamaapenti, akkosanti paribhaasanti chandagaamitaa dosagaamitaa mohagaamitaa bhayagaamitaa paapenti, pakkamantipi, vibbhamantipi. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakammakataa na sammaa vattissanti, na loma.m paatessanti, na netthaara.m vattissanti, na bhikkhuu khamaapessanti ^a^P3.0184^ea^, akkosissanti paribhaasissanti, chandagaamitaa dosagaamitaa mohagaamitaa bhayagaamitaa paapessanti pakkamissantipi vibbhamissantipii''ti ^a^M0.0280^ea^! atha kho te bhikkhuu assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakammakataa na sammaa vattanti...pe0... vibbhamantipii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... eva~nca ^a^T1.0425^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 436^b^.^eb^ ^b^``bhikkhu paneva a~n~natara.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharati kuladuusako paapasamaacaaro. tassa kho paapakaa samaacaaraa dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, kulaani ca tena du.t.thaani dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmaa kho kuladuusako ^a^V0.0287^ea^ paapasamaacaaro, aayasmato kho paapakaa samaacaaraa dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, kulaani caayasmataa du.t.thaani dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. pakkamataayasmaa imamhaa aavaasaa. ala.m te idha vaasenaa'ti. eva~nca so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano te bhikkhuu eva.m vadeyya -- `chandagaamino ca bhikkhuu dosagaamino ca bhikkhuu mohagaamino ca bhikkhuu bhayagaamino ca bhikkhuu taadisikaaya aapattiyaa ekacca.m pabbaajenti ekacca.m na pabbaajentii'ti, so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi evamassa vacaniiyo -- `maayasmaa eva.m avaca. na ca bhikkhuu chandagaamino. na ca bhikkhuu dosagaamino. na ca bhikkhuu mohagaamino. na ca bhikkhuu bhayagaamino. aayasmaa kho kuladuusako paapasamaacaaro. aayasmato kho paapakaa samaacaaraa dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. kulaani caayasmataa du.t.thaani dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. pakkamataayasmaa imamhaa aavaasaa. ala.m te idha vaasenaa'ti. eva~nca so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano tatheva pagga.nheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasitabbo tassa pa.tinissaggaaya. yaavatatiya~nce samanubhaasiiyamaano ta.m pa.tinissajjeyya ^a^T1.0426^ea^, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce pa.tinissajjeyya, sa"nghaadiseso''^eb^ti.
[03] 437^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhikkhu paneva a~n~natara.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa^eb^ti gaamopi nigamopi nagarampi gaamo ceva nigamo ca.
[03]^b^upanissaaya viharatii^eb^ti tattha pa.tibaddhaa honti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa.
[03]^b^kula.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0281^ea^ naama cattaari kulaani -- khattiyakula.m, braahma.nakula.m, ^a^P3.0185^ea^ vessakula.m, suddakula.m.
[03]^b^kuladuusako^eb^ti kulaani duuseti pupphena vaa phalena vaa cu.n.nena vaa mattikaaya vaa dantaka.t.thena vaa ve.luyaa vaa {ve.lunaa vaa (syaa0)} vejjikaaya vaa ja"nghapesanikena vaa.
[03]^b^paapasamaacaaro^eb^ti maalaavaccha.m ropetipi ropaapetipi, si~ncatipi si~ncaapetipi, ocinaatipi ocinaapetipi, ganthetipi ganthaapetipi.
[03]^b^dissanti ceva suyyanti caa^eb^ti ye sa.mmukhaa te passanti, ye tirokkhaa te su.nanti.
[03]^b^kulaani^eb^ ^a^V0.0288^ea^ ^b^ca tena du.t.thaanii^eb^ti pubbe saddhaa hutvaa ta.m aagamma assaddhaa honti, pasannaa hutvaa appasannaa honti.
[03]^b^dissanti ceva suyyanti caa^eb^ti ye sa.mmukhaa te passanti, ye tirokkhaa te su.nanti.
[03]^b^so bhikkhuu^eb^ti yo so kuladuusako bhikkhu.

[03]^b^bhikkhuuhii^eb^ti a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi. ye passanti ye su.nanti. tehi vattabbo -- ``aayasmaa kho kuladuusako paapasamaacaaro. aayasmato kho paapakaa samaacaaraa dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. kulaani caayasmataa du.t.thaani dissanti ^a^T1.0427^ea^ ceva suyyanti ca. pakkamataayasmaa imamhaa aavaasaa. ala.m te idha vaasenaa''ti.

[03]eva~nca so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano te bhikkhuu eva.m vadeyya -- ``chandagaamino ca bhikkhuu, dosagaamino ca bhikkhuu, mohagaamino ca bhikkhuu, bhayagaamino ca bhikkhuu. taadisikaaya aapattiyaa ekacca.m pabbaajenti ekacca.m na pabbaajentii''ti.
[03]^b^so bhikkhuu^eb^ti yo so kammakato bhikkhu.

[03]^b^bhikkhuuhii^eb^ti a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi. ye passanti ye su.nanti tehi vattabbo -- ``maayasmaa eva.m avaca. na ca bhikkhuu chandagaamino, na ca bhikkhuu dosagaamino, na ca bhikkhuu mohagaamino, na ca bhikkhuu bhayagaamino. aayasmaa ^a^M0.0282^ea^ kho kuladuusako paapasamaacaaro. aayasmato kho paapakaa samaacaaraa dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. kulaani caayasmataa du.t.thaani dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. pakkamataayasmaa imamhaa aavaasaa. ala.m te idha vaasenaa''ti. dutiyampi vattabbo. tatiyampi vattabbo.

[03]sace pa.tinissajjati, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce pa.tinissajjati, aapatti dukka.tassa. sutvaa na vadanti, aapatti dukka.tassa. so bhikkhu sa"nghamajjhampi aaka.d.dhitvaa vattabbo -- ``maayasmaa eva.m avaca. na ca bhikkhuu chandagaamino, na ca bhikkhuu dosagaamino, na ca bhikkhuu mohagaamino, na ca bhikkhuu bhayagaamino. aayasmaa kho kuladuusako paapasamaacaaro. aayasmato ^a^V0.0289^ea^ kho paapakaa samaacaaraa dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. kulaani caayasmataa du.t.thaani dissanti ceva suyyanti ca. pakkamataayasmaa ^a^T1.0428^ea^ imamhaa aavaasaa. ala.m te idha vaasenaa''ti. dutiyampi vattabbo. tatiyampi vattabbo. sace pa.tinissajjati, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce pa.tinissajjati, aapatti dukka.tassa. so bhikkhu samanubhaasitabbo. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, samanubhaasitabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakammakato bhikkhuu chandagaamitaa dosagaamitaa mohagaamitaa bhayagaamitaa paapeti. so ta.m vatthu.m na pa.tinissajjati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m samanubhaaseyya tassa vatthussa pa.tinissaggaaya. esaa ~natti.

[03] 458^b^.^eb^ uddi.t.thaa ^a^T1.0444^ea^ ^a^P3.0194^ea^ kho aayasmanto dve aniyataa dhammaa. tatthaayasmante pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? dutiyampi pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? tatiyampi pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? parisuddhetthaayasmanto; tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamiiti.

[03] 459^b^.^eb^ tene ^a^M0.0294^ea^ ^a^V0.0302^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati gotamake cetiye. tena kho pana samayena bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m ticiivara.m anu~n~naata.m hoti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu -- ``bhagavataa ticiivara.m anu~n~naata''nti a~n~neneva ticiivarena gaama.m pavisanti, a~n~nena ticiivarena aaraame acchanti, a~n~nena ticiivarena nahaana.m otaranti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu atirekaciivara.m dhaaressantii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu chabbaggiye bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, atirekaciivara.m dhaarethaa''ti ^a^T2.0002^ea^? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, atirekaciivara.m dhaaressatha! neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 460^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu atirekaciivara.m dhaareyya, nissaggiya.m paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m ^a^V0.0303^ea^ bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 461^b^.^eb^ {mahaava0 347} tena kho pana samayena aayasmato aanandassa atirekaciivara.m uppanna.m hoti. aayasmaa ca aanando ta.m ciivara.m aayasmato saariputtassa daatukaamo hoti. aayasmaa ca saariputto saakete viharati. atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m -- `na atirekaciivara.m dhaaretabba'nti. ida~nca me atirekaciivara.m uppanna.m. aha~ncima.m ciivara.m aayasmato saariputtassa daatukaamo. aayasmaa ca ^a^P3.0196^ea^ saariputto saakete viharati. katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^M0.0295^ea^ aarocesi. ``kiivacira.m panaananda, saariputto aagacchissatii''ti? ``navama.m vaa, bhagavaa, divasa.m dasama.m vaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dasaahaparama.m atirekaciivara.m dhaaretu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 462^b^.^eb^ ^b^``ni.t.thitaciivarasmi.m bhikkhunaa ubbhatasmi.m ^a^T2.0003^ea^ kathine dasaahaparama.m atirekaciivara.m dhaaretabba.m. ta.m atikkaamayato nissaggiya.m paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 463^b^.^eb^ ^b^ni.t.thitaciivarasmi^eb^nti bhikkhuno ciivara.m kata.m vaa hoti na.t.tha.m vaa vina.t.tha.m vaa da.d.dha.m vaa ciivaraasaa vaa upacchinnaa.
[03]^b^ubbhatasmi.m kathine^eb^ti a.t.thanna.m maatikaana.m a~n~nataraaya maatikaaya ubbhata.m hoti, sa"nghena vaa antaraa ubbhata.m hoti.
[03]^b^dasaahaparama^eb^nti dasaahaparamataa dhaaretabba.m.
[03]^b^atirekaciivara.m^eb^ naama anadhi.t.thita.m avikappita.m.
[03]^b^ciivara.m^eb^ naama channa.m ciivaraana.m a~n~natara.m ciivara.m, vikappanupaga.m pacchima.m.

[03]^b^ta.m atikkaamayato nissaggiya.m hotii^eb^ {hotiiti ida.m pada.m sabbapotthakesu atthi, sikkhaapade pana natthi, evamuparipi} ti ekaadase aru.nuggamane nissaggiya.m hoti. nissajjitabba.m ^a^V0.0304^ea^ sa"nghassa vaa ga.nassa vaa puggalassa vaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, nissajjitabba.m. tena bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa vu.d.dhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ida.m me, bhante, ciivara.m dasaahaatikkanta.m nissaggiya.m, imaaha.m sa"nghassa nissajjaamii''ti. nissajjitvaa aapatti desetabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena aapatti ^a^T2.0004^ea^ pa.tiggahetabbaa. nissa.t.thaciivara.m daatabba.m.

[03] 464^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m ciivara.m itthannaamassa bhikkhuno nissaggiya.m sa"nghassa nissa.t.tha.m. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ima.m ciivara.m itthannaamassa bhikkhuno dadeyyaa''ti.

[03] 465^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0296^ea^ bhikkhunaa sambahule bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa vu.d.dhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- ``ida.m me, bhante, ciivara.m dasaahaatikkanta.m ^a^P3.0197^ea^ nissaggiya.m. imaaha.m aayasmantaana.m nissajjaamii''ti. nissajjitvaa aapatti desetabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena aapatti pa.tiggahetabbaa. nissa.t.thaciivara.m daatabba.m.

[03] 466^b^.^eb^ ``su.nantu me aayasmantaa. ida.m ciivara.m itthannaamassa bhikkhuno nissaggiya.m aayasmantaana.m nissa.t.tha.m. yadaayasmantaana.m pattakalla.m, aayasmantaa ima.m ciivara.m itthannaamassa bhikkhuno dadeyyu''nti.

[03] 467^b^.^eb^ tena bhikkhunaa eka.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ida.m me, aavuso, ciivara.m dasaahaatikkanta.m nissaggiya.m. imaaha.m aayasmato nissajjaamii''ti. nissajjitvaa aapatti desetabbaa. tena bhikkhunaa aapatti pa.tiggahetabbaa. nissa.t.thaciivara.m daatabba.m -- ``ima.m ciivara.m aayasmato dammii''ti.

[03] 468^b^.^eb^ dasaahaatikkante atikkantasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. dasaahaatikkante ^a^T2.0005^ea^ vematiko, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. dasaahaatikkante anatikkantasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m ^a^V0.0305^ea^. anadhi.t.thite adhi.t.thitasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. avikappite vikappitasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. avissajjite vissajjitasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. ana.t.the na.t.thasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. avina.t.the vina.t.thasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. ada.d.dhe da.d.dhasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. avilutte viluttasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.

[03]nissaggiya.m ciivara.m anissajjitvaa paribhu~njati, aapatti dukka.tassa. dasaahaanatikkante atikkantasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. dasaahaanatikkante vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. dasaahaanatikkante anatikkantasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 469^b^.^eb^ anaapatti antodasaaha.m adhi.t.theti, vikappeti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, .dayhati, acchinditvaa ga.nhanti, vissaasa.m ga.nhanti, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.

[03] 470^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0297^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu nissa.t.thaciivara.m na denti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``na ^a^T2.0006^ea^, bhikkhave, nissa.t.thaciivara.m na daatabba.m. yo na dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[06] kathinasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 471^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0007^ea^ ^a^P3.0198^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu bhikkhuuna.m hatthe ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa santaruttarena janapadacaarika.m pakkamanti. taani ciivaraani cira.m nikkhittaani ka.n.nakitaani honti. taani bhikkhuu otaapenti. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto te bhikkhuu taani ciivaraani otaapente. disvaana yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kassimaani, aavuso, ciivaraani ka.n.nakitaanii''ti? atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato ^a^V0.0306^ea^ aanandassa etamattha.m aarocesu.m. aayasmaa aanando ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu bhikkhuuna.m hatthe ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa santaruttarena janapadacaarika.m pakkamissantii''ti! atha kho aayasmaa aanando te bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhuuna.m hatthe ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa santaruttarena janapadacaarika.m pakkamantii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa bhikkhuuna.m hatthe ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa santaruttarena janapadacaarika.m pakkamissanti ^a^T2.0008^ea^! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 472^b^.^eb^ ^b^``ni.t.thitaciivarasmi.m bhikkhunaa ubbhatasmi.m kathine ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticiivarena vippavaseyya, nissaggiya.m paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosambiya.m gilaano hoti. ~naatakaa tassa bhikkhuno santike duuta.m paahesu.m -- ``aagacchatu bhadanto, maya.m, upa.t.thahissaamaa''ti. bhikkhuupi evamaaha.msu -- ``gacchaavuso ^a^M0.0298^ea^, ~naatakaa ta.m upa.t.thahissantii''ti. so evamaaha -- ``bhagavataavuso, sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m -- `na ticiivarena vippavasitabba'nti. aha~ncamhi gilaano. na sakkomi ticiivara.m aadaaya pakkamitu.m. naaha.m gamissaamii''ti ^a^P3.0199^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanassa bhikkhuno ticiivarena avippavaasasammuti.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabbaa. tena gilaanena bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa vu.d.dhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m, bhante, gilaano. na sakkomi ticiivara.m aadaaya pakkamitu.m. soha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m ticiivarena avippavaasasammuti.m yaacaamii'ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbaa. tatiyampi yaacitabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ^a^T2.0009^ea^ ~naapetabbo --

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu gilaano. na sakkoti ticiivara.m ^a^V0.0307^ea^ aadaaya pakkamitu.m. so sa"ngha.m ticiivarena avippavaasasammuti.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ticiivarena avippavaasasammuti.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo bhikkhu gilaano. na sakkoti ticiivara.m aadaaya pakkamitu.m. so sa"ngha.m ticiivarena avippavaasasammuti.m yaacati. sa"ngho itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ticiivarena avippavaasasammuti.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ticiivarena avippavaasasammutiyaa daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dinnaa sa"nghena itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ticiivarena avippavaasasammuti. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.
[03]eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 475^b^.^eb^ ^b^``ni.t.thitaciivarasmi.m bhikkhunaa ubbhatasmi.m kathine ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticiivarena vippavaseyya, a~n~natra bhikkhusammutiyaa, nissaggiya.m paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 476^b^.^eb^ ^b^``ni.t.thitaciivarasmi^eb^nti bhikkhuno ciivara.m kata.m vaa hoti na.t.tha.m vaa vina.t.tha.m vaa da.d.dha.m vaa ciivaraasaa vaa upacchinnaa.
[03]^b^ubbhatasmi.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0299^ea^ ^b^kathine^eb^ti a.t.thanna.m maatikaana.m a~n~nataraaya maatikaaya ubbhata.m hoti, sa"nghena vaa antaraa ubbhata.m hoti.
[03]^b^ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticiivarena vippavaseyyaa^eb^ti sa"nghaa.tiyaa vaa uttaraasa"ngena vaa antaravaasakena ^a^T2.0010^ea^ vaa.
[03]^b^a~n~natra bhikkhusammutiyaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa bhikkhusammuti.m.

[03]^b^nissaggiya.m hotii^eb^ti saha aru.nuggamanaa {aru.nuggamanena (sii0 syaa0)} nissaggiya.m hoti. nissajjitabba.m sa"nghassa vaa ga.nassa ^a^V0.0308^ea^ vaa puggalassa vaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, nissajjitabba.m...pe0... ida.m me, bhante ^a^P3.0200^ea^, ciivara.m rattivippavuttha.m {ratti.m vippavuttha.m (sii0)} a~n~natra bhikkhusammutiyaa nissaggiya.m, imaaha.m sa"nghassa nissajjaamiiti...pe0... dadeyyaati...pe0... dadeyyunti...pe0... aayasmato dammiiti.

[03] 477^b^.^eb^ gaamo ekuupacaaro naanuupacaaro. nivesana.m ekuupacaara.m naanuupacaara.m. udosito ekuupacaaro naanuupacaaro. a.t.to ekuupacaaro naanuupacaaro. maa.lo ekuupacaaro naanuupacaaro. paasaado ekuupacaaro naanuupacaaro. hammiya.m ekuupacaara.m naanuupacaara.m. naavaa ekuupacaaraa naanuupacaaraa. sattho ekuupacaaro naanuupacaaro. khetta.m ekuupacaara.m naanuupacaara.m. dha~n~nakara.na.m ekuupacaara.m naanuupacaara.m. aaraamo ekuupacaaro naanuupacaaro. vihaaro ekuupacaaro naanuupacaaro. rukkhamuula.m ekuupacaara.m naanuupacaara.m. ajjhokaaso ekuupacaaro naanuupacaaro.

[03] 478^b^.^eb^ ^b^gaamo ekuupacaaro^eb^ naama ekakulassa gaamo hoti parikkhitto ca ^a^T2.0011^ea^. antogaame ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antogaame vatthabba.m. aparikkhitto hoti, yasmi.m ghare ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m ghare vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ naanaakulassa gaamo hoti parikkhitto ca. yasmi.m ghare ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m ghare vatthabba.m sabhaaye vaa dvaaramuule vaa, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m. sabhaaya.m gacchantena hatthapaase ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa sabhaaye vaa vatthabba.m dvaaramuule vaa, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m. sabhaaye ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa sabhaaye vaa vatthabba.m dvaaramuule vaa, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m. aparikkhitto hoti, yasmi.m ghare ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m ghare vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 480^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa ^a^M0.0300^ea^ nivesana.m hoti parikkhitta~nca, naanaagabbhaa naanaaovarakaa. antonivesane ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antonivesane vatthabba.m. aparikkhitta.m hoti, yasmi.m gabbhe ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m gabbhe vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 481^b^.^eb^ naanaakulassa nivesana.m hoti parikkhitta~nca, naanaagabbhaa naanaaovarakaa. yasmi.m gabbhe ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m gabbhe vatthabba.m dvaaramuule vaa, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m ^a^V0.0309^ea^. aparikkhitta.m hoti, yasmi.m gabbhe ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m gabbhe vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa ^a^T2.0012^ea^ na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 482^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa udosito hoti parikkhitto ca, naanaagabbhaa naanaaovarakaa ^a^P3.0201^ea^. antoudosite ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antoudosite vatthabba.m. aparikkhitto hoti, yasmi.m gabbhe ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m gabbhe vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 483^b^.^eb^ naanaakulassa udosito hoti parikkhitto ca, naanaagabbhaa naanaaovarakaa. yasmi.m gabbhe ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m gabbhe vatthabba.m dvaaramuule vaa, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m. aparikkhitto hoti, yasmi.m gabbhe ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m gabbhe vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa a.t.to hoti, antoa.t.te ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antoa.t.te vatthabba.m. naanaakulassa a.t.to hoti, naanaagabbhaa naanaaovarakaa. yasmi.m gabbhe ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m gabbhe vatthabba.m dvaaramuule vaa, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa maa.lo hoti, antomaa.le ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antomaa.le vatthabba.m. naanaakulassa maa.lo hoti naanaagabbhaa naanaaovarakaa, yasmi.m gabbhe ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m gabbhe vatthabba.m dvaaramuule vaa, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 486^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa paasaado hoti, antopaasaade ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antopaasaade vatthabba.m. naanaakulassa paasaado hoti, naanaagabbhaa ^a^T2.0013^ea^ ^a^M0.0301^ea^ naanaaovarakaa. yasmi.m gabbhe ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m gabbhe vatthabba.m dvaaramuule vaa, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 487^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa hammiya.m hoti. antohammiye ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antohammiye vatthabba.m. naanaakulassa hammiya.m hoti, naanaagabbhaa naanaaovarakaa. yasmi.m gabbhe ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m gabbhe vatthabba.m dvaaramuule vaa, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 488^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa naavaa hoti. antonaavaaya ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antonaavaaya vatthabba.m ^a^V0.0310^ea^. naanaakulassa naavaa hoti naanaagabbhaa naanaaovarakaa. yasmi.m ovarake ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m ovarake vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 489^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa sattho hoti. satthe ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa purato vaa pacchato vaa sattabbhantaraa na vijahitabbaa, passato abbhantara.m na vijahitabba.m. naanaakulassa sattho hoti, satthe ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa hatthapaasaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 490^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa khetta.m hoti parikkhitta~nca. antokhette ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antokhette vatthabba.m. aparikkhitta.m hoti, hatthapaasaa na vijahitabba.m. naanaakulassa khetta.m hoti parikkhitta~nca. antokhette ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa dvaaramuule vaa vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa ^a^T2.0014^ea^ vaa na vijahitabba.m. aparikkhitta.m hoti, hatthapaasaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 491^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa dha~n~nakara.na.m hoti parikkhitta~nca. antodha~n~nakara.ne ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antodha~n~nakara.ne vatthabba.m. aparikkhitta.m hoti, hatthapaasaa na vijahitabba.m. naanaakulassa dha~n~nakara.na.m hoti parikkhitta~nca. antodha~n~nakara.ne ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa dvaaramuule vaa vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m. aparikkhitta.m hoti, hatthapaasaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 492^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa aaraamo hoti parikkhitto ca. antoaaraame ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antoaaraame vatthabba.m. aparikkhitto hoti, hatthapaasaa na vijahitabba.m. naanaakulassa aaraamo hoti parikkhitto ca. antoaaraame ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa dvaaramuule vaa vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m. aparikkhitto hoti, hatthapaasaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 493^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa ^a^P3.0202^ea^ ^a^M0.0302^ea^ vihaaro hoti parikkhitto ca. antovihaare ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antovihaare vatthabba.m. aparikkhitto hoti, yasmi.m vihaare ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m vihaare vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m. naanaakulassa vihaaro hoti parikkhitto ca. yasmi.m vihaare ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m vihaare vatthabba.m dvaaramuule vaa, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m. aparikkhitto hoti ^a^T2.0015^ea^, yasmi.m vihaare ciivara.m nikkhitta.m hoti tasmi.m vihaare vatthabba.m, hatthapaasaa vaa na vijahitabba.m.

[03] 494^b^.^eb^ ekakulassa ^a^V0.0311^ea^ rukkhamuula.m hoti, ya.m majjhanhike kaale samantaa chaayaa pharati, antochaayaaya ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa antochaayaaya vatthabba.m. naanaakulassa rukkhamuula.m hoti, hatthapaasaa na vijahitabba.m.
[03]ajjhokaaso ekuupacaaro naama agaamake ara~n~ne samantaa sattabbhantaraa ekuupacaaro, tato para.m naanuupacaaro.

[03] 495^b^.^eb^ vippavutthe vippavutthasa~n~nii a~n~natra bhikkhusammutiyaa, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. vippavutthe vematiko, a~n~natra bhikkhusammutiyaa, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. vippavutthe avippavutthasa~n~nii, a~n~natra bhikkhusammutiyaa, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. appaccuddha.te paccuddha.tasa~n~nii...pe0... avissajjite vissajjitasa~n~nii... ana.t.the na.t.thasa~n~nii... avina.t.the vina.t.thasa~n~nii... ada.d.dhe da.d.dhasa~n~nii...pe0... avilutte viluttasa~n~nii, a~n~natra bhikkhusammutiyaa, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.

[03]nissaggiya.m ciivara.m anissajjitvaa paribhu~njati, aapatti dukka.tassa ^a^T2.0016^ea^. avippavutthe vippavutthasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. avippavutthe vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. avippavutthe avippavutthasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 496^b^.^eb^ anaapatti antoaru.ne paccuddharati, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, .dayhati, acchinditvaa ga.nhanti, vissaasa.m ga.nhanti, bhikkhusammutiyaa, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] udositasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0017^ea^ ^a^M0.0303^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno akaalaciivara.m uppanna.m hoti. tassa ta.m ^a^V0.0312^ea^ ciivara.m kayiramaana.m nappahoti. atha kho ^a^P3.0203^ea^ so bhikkhu ta.m ciivara.m ussaapetvaa punappuna.m vimajjati. addasaa kho bhagavaa senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto ta.m bhikkhu.m ta.m ciivara.m ussaapetvaa punappuna.m vimajjanta.m. disvaana yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kissa tva.m, bhikkhu, ima.m ciivara.m ussaapetvaa punappuna.m vimajjasii''ti? ``ida.m me, bhante, akaalaciivara.m uppanna.m. kayiramaana.m nappahoti. tenaaha.m ima.m ciivara.m ussaapetvaa punappuna.m vimajjaamii''ti. ``atthi pana te, bhikkhu, ciivarapaccaasaa''ti? ``atthi, bhagavaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa, bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, akaalaciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa ciivarapaccaasaa nikkhipitu''nti.

[03] 498^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu -- ``bhagavataa anu~n~naata.m akaalaciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa ciivarapaccaasaa nikkhipitu''nti akaalaciivaraani pa.tiggahetvaa ^a^T2.0018^ea^ atirekamaasa.m nikkhipanti. taani ciivaraani ciivarava.mse bha.n.dikaabaddhaani ti.t.thanti. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto taani ciivaraani ciivarava.mse bha.n.dikaabaddhaani ti.t.thante. disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kassimaani, aavuso, ciivaraani ciivarava.mse bha.n.dikaabaddhaani ti.t.thantii''ti? ``amhaaka.m, aavuso, akaalaciivaraani ciivarapaccaasaa nikkhittaanii''ti. ``kiivacira.m panaavuso, imaani ciivaraani nikkhittaanii''ti? ``atirekamaasa.m, aavuso''ti. aayasmaa aanando ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu akaalaciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa atirekamaasa.m nikkhipissantii''ti! atha kho aayasmaa aanando te bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu akaalaciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa atirekamaasa.m nikkhipantii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa akaalaciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa atirekamaasa.m nikkhipissanti! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 499^b^.^eb^ ^b^``ni.t.thitaciivarasmi.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0304^ea^ ^b^bhikkhunaa ubbhatasmi.m kathine bhikkhuno paneva akaalaciivara.m uppajjeyya, aaka"nkhamaanena bhikkhunaa pa.tiggahetabba.m. pa.tiggahetvaa khippameva kaaretabba.m. nocassa paaripuuri, maasaparama.m tena bhikkhunaa ^a^T2.0019^ea^ ta.m ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m uunassa paaripuuriyaa satiyaa paccaasaaya. tato ce uttari {uttari.m (sii0 syaa0)} nikkhipeyya, satiyaapi paccaasaaya, nissaggiya.m paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 500^b^.^eb^ ^b^ni.t.thitaciivarasmi^eb^nti ^a^P3.0204^ea^ ^a^V0.0313^ea^ bhikkhuno ciivara.m kata.m vaa hoti na.t.tha.m vaa vina.t.tha.m vaa da.d.dha.m vaa ciivaraasaa vaa upacchinnaa.
[03]^b^ubbhatasmi.m kathine^eb^ti a.t.thanna.m maatikaana.m a~n~nataraaya maatikaaya ubbhata.m hoti, sa"nghena vaa antaraa ubbhata.m hoti.
[03]^b^akaalaciivara.m^eb^ naama anatthate kathine ekaadasamaase uppanna.m, atthate kathine sattamaase uppanna.m, kaalepi aadissa dinna.m, eta.m akaalaciivara.m naama.
[03]^b^uppajjeyyaa^eb^ti uppajjeyya sa"nghato vaa ga.nato vaa ~naatito vaa mittato vaa pa.msukuula.m vaa attano vaa dhanena.
[03]^b^aaka"nkhamaanenaa^eb^ti icchamaanena pa.tiggahetabba.m.
[03]^b^pa.tiggahetvaa khippameva kaaretabba^eb^nti dasaahaa kaaretabba.m.
[03]^b^no cassa paaripuurii^eb^ti kayiramaana.m nappahoti.
[03]^b^maasaparama.m tena bhikkhunaa ta.m ciivara.m nikkhipitabba^eb^nti maasaparamataa nikkhipitabba.m.
[03]^b^uunassa paaripuuriyaa^eb^ti uunassa paaripuuratthaaya.
[03]^b^satiyaa paccaasaayaa^eb^ti paccaasaa hoti sa"nghato vaa ga.nato vaa ~naatito vaa mittato vaa pa.msukuula.m vaa attano vaa dhanena.

[01] ^b^tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya satiyaapi paccaasaayaa^eb^ti tadahuppanne ^a^T2.0020^ea^ muulaciivare paccaasaaciivara.m uppajjati, dasaahaa kaaretabba.m. dviihuppanne muulaciivare paccaasaaciivara.m uppajjati, dasaahaa kaaretabba.m. tiihuppanne muulaciivare...pe0... catuuhuppanne... pa~ncaahuppanne... chaahuppanne... sattaahuppanne... a.t.thaahuppanne ^a^M0.0305^ea^... navaahuppanne... dasaahuppanne muulaciivare paccaasaaciivara.m uppajjati, dasaahaa kaaretabba.m ^a^V0.0314^ea^. ekaadase uppanne...pe0... dvaadase uppanne... terase uppanne... cuddase uppanne... pannarase uppanne... so.lase uppanne... sattarase uppanne... a.t.thaarase uppanne... ekuunaviise uppanne... viise uppanne muulaciivare paccaasaaciivara.m uppajjati, dasaahaa kaaretabba.m. ekaviise uppanne muulaciivare paccaasaaciivara.m uppajjati, navaahaa kaaretabba.m. dvaaviise uppanne...pe0... teviise uppanne... catuviise uppanne... pa~ncaviise uppanne... chabbiise uppanne... sattaviise uppanne... a.t.thaviise uppanne... ekuunati.mse uppanne muulaciivare paccaasaaciivara.m uppajjati, ekaaha.m kaaretabba.m... ti.mse uppanne muulaciivare paccaasaaciivara.m uppajjati ^a^T2.0021^ea^, tadaheva adhi.t.thaatabba.m vikappetabba.m vissajjetabba.m. no ce adhi.t.theyya vaa vikappeyya vaa vissajjeyya vaa, ekati.mse aru.nuggamane nissaggiya.m hoti. nissajjitabba.m ^a^P3.0205^ea^ sa"nghassa vaa ga.nassa vaa puggalassa vaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, nissajjitabba.m...pe0... ida.m me, bhante, akaalaciivara.m maasaatikkanta.m nissaggiya.m, imaaha.m sa"nghassa nissajjaamiiti...pe0... dadeyyaati...pe0... dadeyyunti...pe0... aayasmato dammiiti.
[03]visabhaage uppanne muulaciivare paccaasaaciivara.m uppajjati, rattiyo ca sesaa honti, na akaamaa kaaretabba.m.

[03] 501^b^.^eb^ maasaatikkante atikkantasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. maasaatikkante vematiko nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. maasaatikkante anatikkantasa~n~nii nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. anadhi.t.thite adhi.t.thitasa~n~nii...pe0... avikappite vikappitasa~n~nii... avissajjite vissajjitasa~n~nii... ana.t.the na.t.thasa~n~nii... avina.t.the vina.t.thasa~n~nii... ada.d.dhe da.d.dhasa~n~nii... avilutte viluttasa~n~nii, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.

[03]nissaggiya.m ciivara.m anissajjitvaa paribhu~njati, aapatti dukka.tassa. maasaanatikkante atikkantasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa. maasaanatikkante vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. maasaanatikkante anatikkantasa~n~nii, anaapatti.
[03] 502^b^.^eb^ anaapatti antomaase adhi.t.theti, vikappeti, vissajjeti, nassati ^a^T2.0022^ea^, vinassati, .dayhati, acchinditvaa ga.nhanti, vissaasa.m ga.nhanti, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.
[06] tatiyakathinasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 503^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0023^ea^ ^a^M0.0306^ea^ ^a^V0.0315^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmato udaayissa puraa.nadutiyikaa bhikkhuniisu pabbajitaa hoti. saa aayasmato udaayissa santike abhikkha.na.m aagacchati. aayasmaapi udaayii tassaa bhikkhuniyaa santike abhikkha.na.m gacchati. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa udaayii tassaa bhikkhuniyaa santike bhattavissagga.m karoti. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena saa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tassaa bhikkhuniyaa purato a"ngajaata.m vivaritvaa aasane nisiidi. saapi kho bhikkhunii aayasmato udaayissa purato a"ngajaata.m vivaritvaa aasane nisiidi. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii saaratto tassaa bhikkhuniyaa a"ngajaata.m upanijjhaayi. tassa asuci mucci. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii ta.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca -- ``gaccha, bhagini, udaka.m aahara, antaravaasaka.m dhovissaamii''ti. ``aaharayya ^a^P3.0206^ea^, ahameva dhovissaamii''ti ta.m asuci.m ekadesa.m mukhena aggahesi ekadesa.m a"ngajaate pakkhipi. saa tena gabbha.m ga.nhi. bhikkhuniyo ^a^T2.0024^ea^ evamaaha.msu -- ``abrahmacaarinii aya.m bhikkhunii, gabbhinii''ti. ``naaha.m, ayye, abrahmacaarinii''ti bhikkhuniina.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuniyo ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyo udaayii bhikkhuniyaa puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapessatii''ti! atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa udaayii bhikkhuniyaa puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapessatii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m udaayi.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, udaayi, bhikkhuniyaa puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapesii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``~naatikaa te, udaayi, a~n~naatikaa''ti? ``a~n~naatikaa, bhagavaa''ti. ``a~n~naatako, moghapurisa, a~n~naatikaaya na jaanaati patiruupa.m vaa appatiruupa.m vaa paasaadika.m vaa apaasaadika.m vaa. tattha naama tva.m, moghapurisa, a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapessasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --

[03] 504^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo^eb^ ^a^M0.0307^ea^ ^a^V0.0316^ea^ ^b^pana bhikkhu a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapeyya vaa rajaapeyya vaa aako.taapeyya vaa, nissaggiya.m paacittiya''^eb^nti.
[03] 505^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^T2.0025^ea^ ^b^panaa^eb^ti yo yaadiso...pe0... ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti...pe0... aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuuti.
[03]^b^a~n~naatikaa^eb^ naama maatito vaa pitito vaa yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa asambaddhaa.
[03]^b^bhikkhunii^eb^ naama ubhatosa"nghe upasampannaa.
[03]^b^puraa.naciivara.m^eb^ naama saki.m nivatthampi saki.m paarutampi.

[03]dhovaati aa.naapeti, aapatti dukka.tassa. dhota.m nissaggiya.m hoti. rajaati aa.naapeti, aapatti dukka.tassa. ratta.m nissaggiya.m hoti. aako.tehiiti aa.naapeti, aapatti dukka.tassa. saki.m paa.nippahaara.m vaa muggarappahaara.m vaa dinne nissaggiya.m hoti. nissajjitabba.m sa"nghassa vaa ga.nassa vaa puggalassa vaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, nissajjitabba.m...pe0... ida.m me, bhante, puraa.naciivara.m a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa dhovaapita.m nissaggiya.m. imaaha.m sa"nghassa nissajjaamiiti...pe0... dadeyyaati...pe0... dadeyyunti...pe0... aayasmato dammiiti.

[03] 506^b^.^eb^ a~n~naatikaaya ^a^P3.0207^ea^ a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapeti, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. a~n~naatikaaya a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapeti rajaapeti, nissaggiyena aapatti dukka.tassa. a~n~naatikaaya ^a^T2.0026^ea^ a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapeti aako.taapeti, nissaggiyena aapatti dukka.tassa. a~n~naatikaaya a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapeti rajaapeti aako.taapeti, nissaggiyena aapatti dvinna.m dukka.taana.m.

[03]a~n~naatikaaya a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m rajaapeti, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. a~n~naatikaaya a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m rajaapeti aako.taapeti, nissaggiyena aapatti dukka.tassa. a~n~naatikaaya a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m rajaapeti dhovaapeti, nissaggiyena aapatti ^a^V0.0317^ea^ dukka.tassa. a~n~naatikaaya a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m rajaapeti aako.taapeti dhovaapeti, nissaggiyena aapatti dvinna.m dukka.taana.m.

[03]a~n~naatikaaya ^a^M0.0308^ea^ a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m aako.taapeti, nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m. a~n~naatikaaya a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m aako.taapeti dhovaapeti, nissaggiyena aapatti dukka.tassa. a~n~naatikaaya a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m aako.taapeti rajaapeti, nissaggiyena aapatti dukka.tassa. a~n~naatikaaya a~n~naatikasa~n~nii puraa.naciivara.m aako.taapeti dhovaapeti rajaapeti, nissaggiyena aapatti dvinna.m dukka.taana.m.

[03]a~n~naatikaaya vematiko...pe0... a~n~naatikaaya ~naatikasa~n~nii...pe0... a~n~nassa puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapeti, aapatti dukka.tassa. nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m dhovaapeti, aapatti dukka.tassa. ekatoupasampannaaya dhovaapeti, aapatti dukka.tassa. ~naatikaaya a~n~naatikasa~n~nii, aapatti dukka.tassa ^a^T2.0027^ea^. ~naatikaaya vematiko, aapatti dukka.tassa. ~naatikaaya ~naatikasa~n~nii, anaapatti.

[03] 507^b^.^eb^ anaapatti ~naatikaaya dhovantiyaa a~n~naatikaa dutiyaa hoti, avuttaa dhovati, aparibhutta.m dhovaapeti, ciivara.m .thapetvaa a~n~na.m parikkhaara.m dhovaapeti, sikkhamaanaaya, saama.neriyaa, ummattakassa, aadikammikassaati.

[03] 508^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0028^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii saavatthiya.m viharati. atha kho uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya ^a^P3.0208^ea^ saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkantaa yena andhavana.m tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. andhavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. tena kho pana samayena coraa ^a^V0.0318^ea^ katakammaa gaavi.m vadhitvaa ma.msa.m gahetvaa andhavana.m pavisi.msu. addasaa kho coragaama.niko uppalava.n.na.m bhikkhuni.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m ^a^M0.0309^ea^ nisinna.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``sace me puttabhaatukaa passissanti vihe.thissanti ima.m bhikkhuni''nti a~n~nena maggena agamaasi. atha kho so coragaama.niko ma.mse pakke varama.msaani gahetvaa pa.n.napu.ta.m {pa.n.nena pu.ta.m (syaa0)} bandhitvaa uppalava.n.naaya bhikkhuniyaa aviduure rukkhe aalaggetvaa -- ``yo passati sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa dinna.myeva haratuu''ti, vatvaa pakkaami. assosi kho uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii samaadhimhaa vu.t.thahitvaa tassa coragaama.nikassa ima.m vaaca.m bhaasamaanassa. atha kho uppalava.n.naa ^a^T2.0029^ea^ bhikkhunii ta.m ma.msa.m gahetvaa upassaya.m agamaasi. atha kho uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii tassaa rattiyaa accayena ta.m ma.msa.m sampaadetvaa uttaraasa"ngena bha.n.dika.m bandhitvaa vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa ve.luvane paccu.t.thaasi {paccupa.t.thaasi (?)}.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho hoti. aayasmaa udaayii ohiyyako hoti vihaarapaalo. atha kho uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``kaha.m, bhante, bhagavaa''ti? ``pavi.t.tho, bhagini, bhagavaa gaama.m pi.n.daayaa''ti. ``ima.m, bhante, ma.msa.m bhagavato dehii''ti. ``santappito tayaa, bhagini, bhagavaa ma.msena. sace me tva.m antaravaasaka.m dadeyyaasi, eva.m ahampi santappito bhaveyya.m antaravaasakenaa''ti. ``maya.m kho, bhante, maatugaamaa naama kicchalaabhaa. ida~nca me antima.m pa~ncama.m ciivara.m. naaha.m dassaamii''ti. ``seyyathaapi, bhagini, puriso hatthi.m datvaa kacche sajjeyya {vissajjeyya (syaa0)} evameva kho tva.m bhagini bhagavato ma.msa.m datvaa mayi antaravaasake sajjasii''ti {antaravaasaka.m na sajjasiiti (ka0), mayha.m antaravaasaka.m vissajjehiiti (syaa0)}. atha kho uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii aayasmataa udaayinaa nippii.liyamaanaa antaravaasaka.m datvaa upassaya.m agamaasi. bhikkhuniyo uppalava.n.naaya bhikkhuniyaa pattaciivara.m ^a^T2.0030^ea^ pa.tigga.nhantiyo uppalava.n.na.m bhikkhuni.m etadavocu.m -- ``kaha.m te, ayye, antaravaasako''ti? uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii bhikkhuniina.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuniyo ujjhaayanti khiyyanti ^a^P3.0209^ea^ vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyo udaayii bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m pa.tiggahessati kicchalaabho maatugaamo''ti. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa udaayii bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m pa.tiggahessatii''ti! atha ^a^M0.0310^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m udaayi.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, udaayi, bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m pa.tiggahesii''ti? ``sacca.m ^a^V0.0319^ea^, bhagavaa''ti. ``~naatikaa te, udaayi, a~n~naatikaa''ti? ``a~n~naatikaa, bhagavaa''ti. ``a~n~naatako, moghapurisa, a~n~naatikaaya na jaanaati patiruupa.m vaa appatiruupa.m vaa santa.m vaa asanta.m vaa. tattha naama tva.m, moghapurisa, a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa hatthato ciivara.m pa.tiggahessasi! neta.m moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 509^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa hatthato ciivara.m pa.tigga.nheyya, nissaggiya.m paacittiya''^eb^nti.

[03] 515^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0034^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame ^a^V0.0321^ea^. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto pa.t.to {pa.t.tho (syaa0 ka0)} hoti dhammi.m katha.m kaatu.m. atha kho a~n~nataro se.t.thiputto yenaayasmaa upanando sakyaputto tenupasa"nkami ^a^M0.0312^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m se.t.thiputta.m aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho so se.t.thiputto aayasmataa upanandena sakyaputtena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m etadavoca -- ``vadeyyaatha, bhante, yena attho. pa.tibalaa maya.m ayyassa ^a^P3.0211^ea^ daatu.m yadida.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara''nti. ``sace me tva.m, aavuso, daatukaamosi, ito eka.m saa.taka.m dehii''ti. ``amhaaka.m kho, bhante, kulaputtaana.m kismi.m viya ekasaa.taka.m gantu.m. aagamehi, bhante, yaava ghara.m gacchaami. ghara.m gato ito vaa eka.m saa.taka.m pahi.nissaami ^a^T2.0035^ea^ ito vaa sundaratara''nti. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto ta.m se.t.thiputta.m etadavoca ``sace me tva.m aavuso daatukaamosi ito eka.m saa.taka.m dehii''ti. amhaaka.m kho bhante kulaputtaana.m kismi.m viya ekasaa.taka.m gantu.m, aagamehi bhante yaava ghara.m gacchaami, ghara.m gato ito vaa eka.m saa.taka.m pahi.nissaami ito vaa sundarataranti. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto ta.m se.t.thiputta.m etadavoca ``sace me tva.m aavuso daatukaamosi, ito eka.m saa.taka.m dehii''ti. amhaaka.m kho bhante kulaputtaana.m kismi.m viya ekasaa.taka.m gantu.m, aagamehi bhante yaava ghara.m gacchaami, ghara.m gato ito vaa eka.m saa.taka.m pahi.nissaami ito vaa sundarataranti. ``ki.m pana tayaa, aavuso, adaatukaamena pavaaritena ya.m tva.m pavaaretvaa na desii''ti.

[03]atha kho so se.t.thiputto aayasmataa upanandena sakyaputtena nippii.liyamaano eka.m saa.taka.m datvaa agamaasi. manussaa ta.m se.t.thiputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``kissa tva.m ayyo ekasaa.tako aagacchasii''ti? atha kho so se.t.thiputto tesa.m manussaana.m etamattha.m aarocesi. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``mahicchaa ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa asantu.t.thaa. nayimesa.m sukaraa dhammanimantanaapi kaatu.m {nayime sukaraa dhammanimantanaayapi kaatu.m (syaa0)}. katha~nhi naama se.t.thiputtena dhammanimantanaaya kayiramaanaaya ^a^T2.0036^ea^ saa.taka.m gahessantii''ti! assosu.m ^a^M0.0313^ea^ kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto se.t.thiputta.m ciivara.m vi~n~naapessatii''ti! atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa ^a^V0.0322^ea^ bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, upananda, se.t.thiputta.m ciivara.m vi~n~naapesii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``~naatako te, upananda, a~n~naatako''ti? ``a~n~naatako, bhagavaa''ti. ``a~n~naatako, moghapurisa, a~n~naatakassa na jaanaati patiruupa.m vaa appatiruupa.m vaa santa.m vaa asanta.m vaa. tattha naama tva.m, moghapurisa, a~n~naataka.m se.t.thiputta.m ciivara.m vi~n~naapessasi! neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
[03] 516^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yo pana bhikkhu a~n~naataka.m gahapati.m vaa gahapataani.m vaa ciivara.m vi~n~naapeyya, nissaggiya.m paacittiya''^eb^nti.

[03] 517^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu saaketaa saavatthi.m ^a^P3.0212^ea^2 addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. antaraamagge coraa nikkhamitvaa te bhikkhuu acchindi.msu. atha kho te bhikkhuu -- ``bhagavataa pa.tikkhitta.m a~n~naataka.m gahapati.m vaa gahapataani.m vaa ciivara.m vi~n~naapetu''nti, kukkuccaayantaa ^a^T2.0037^ea^ na vi~n~naapesu.m. yathaanaggaava saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuu abhivaadenti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``sundaraa kho ime, aavuso, aajiivakaa ye ime bhikkhuusu abhivaadentii''ti. te evamaaha.msu -- ``na maya.m, aavuso, aajiivakaa, bhikkhuu maya''nti. bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m upaali.m etadavocu.m -- ``i"nghaavuso upaali, ime anuyu~njaahii''ti. atha kho aayasmataa upaalinaa anuyu~njiyamaanaa te bhikkhuu etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho aayasmaa upaali te bhikkhuu anuyu~njitvaa bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``bhikkhuu ime, aavuso. detha nesa.m ciivaraanii''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu naggaa aagacchissanti! nanu naama ti.nena vaa pa.n.nena vaa pa.ticchaadetvaa aagantabba''nti. atha kho te bhikkhuu te anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu ^a^M0.0314^ea^ aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, acchinnaciivarassa vaa na.t.thaciivarassa vaa a~n~naataka.m gahapati.m vaa gahapataani.m vaa ciivara.m vi~n~naapetu.m. ya.m aavaasa.m pa.thama.m upagacchati, sace tattha hoti sa"nghassa vihaaraciivara.m vaa uttaratthara.na.m vaa bhuumatthara.na.m vaa bhisicchavi vaa, ta.m gahetvaa paarupitu.m labhitvaa odahissaamii''ti ^a^V0.0323^ea^. no ce hoti sa"nghassa vihaaraciivara.m vaa uttaratthara.na.m vaa bhumatthara.na.m vaa ^a^T2.0038^ea^ bhisicchavi vaa ti.nena vaa pa.n.nena vaa pa.ticchaadetvaa aagantabba.m; na tveva naggena aagantabba.m. yo aagaccheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaatha --
